Summary Heading: Slow check in, construction, kids running at 7am!
Summary: The front desk had systems that were slow. At least that’s what they said for the check in which took about 30 minutes. I did notice that other people were being checked in faster than I was. I do believe that it may have been because I was not white. Honestly that’s what it felt like. Also, they were doing some sort of construction in the parking lot next to my car. I had left to Disneyland and when I returned suddenly there were workers with cement grinders grinding into the curb getting debris on my car. When I left in the morning there was no construction nor signs that would warn us. My car was washed and then it turned white. I left because I was had had enough.

Summary Heading: Reasonable Stay close to Disneyland, Just don't expect a breakfast.
Summary: This is a good budget conscience hotel that is over the freeway from Disneyland.   It would be a long walk with kids (especially at the end of a day) but they do have a shuttle system that does do frequent stops.   The rooms are nice and hit above the typical Days Inn feel of a room.  Some rooms have a couch, like mine did, which can give you a bit more room to move about.   No problems the first time we stayed there back in July but this time our TV did not work and the safety chain was broken (maybe just a bad time).    However there are some limitations and the biggest one is their breakfast.   I would stress that you plan your own breakfast.  This is the only hotel I have ever been at (where there was a breakfast) where the waffles were cut in half and the same with the
Manager Response: Dear Michael -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property. Summary: I have stayed here numerous times - the room is always clean. They just finished a round of room renovations and are now updating the continental breakfast space... the only issue is that the parking is limited and they do a terrible job monitoring that each room only gets one space and making sure that cars only park in one space....    Besides the parking issues, this place is a great bang for the buck. Close to the park (less than five minutes) and included parking and breakfast - can't beat it!

Summary Heading: WIsh it could have been more
Summary: We pulled into the property and I was very dismayed. I understand that they have lobby construction going on but what a mess! They didn't even try to conceal the mess. The man that check us in was extremely unfriendly. Our room was just like it was pictured except not clean. There was even a disgusting, stained, smelly "pull out couch" in the room that I would not allow my children to sit on. How hard is it to wipe down walls or surfaces in a room? The walls in the room and bathroom were dirty and gross. When the fireworks at Disneyland started at 930, it sounded like the Olympic Door Slamming Team was in the next room. The noise went on for a long time. This wasn't normal pop pop pop of fireworks, it was loud and booming. I do not recommend this place for families that see the

Summary: The room was large, bed was as advertised in size (I've had reservations for two beds and gotten one before. Not this chain though), sheets appeared to be clean, a/c worked well but only if the curtains weren't closed and catching all the cold air. AC unit looked like it hadn't been cleaned in a while, bathroom was ok, tub was super slippery and the mat they offered was small in comparison to the size of the tub. I slipped once and thought that was it, that's how I was gonna die. The shower curtain had easy release hooks so that was of no help in catching me. It was sheer luck that I didn't eat it in there. There was a toenail on the floor when I first arrived and it remained there the entire duration of the trip. The carpet had hair stuck to it but was otherwise ok. Parking was

Summary Heading: Great Location, Lowsy Breakfast, No Housekeeping
Summary: While this was a great location for a family trip to Disneyland, the breakfast was minimal compared to most other places I've stayed (mostly carbs; no fruits, eggs, etc.). When we returned to our room late after a long day at Disneyland, we found the do not disturb sign on the outside of our door, which we did not put there, and the room had not been serviced by housekeeping. As a result we had to use dirty towels and did not have enough soap and shampoo for whole family the following day. Also, the bed seemed like it was not level, like it was leaning to one side a bit and the pillows were lumpy.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest-   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We appreciate all feedback from our guests and use it to improve both our customer service and our facilities.  We are so pleased to see that you had a good stay with us.  We have read your comments and will see what we can do about them.  Thank you for letting us know.  We know that you have choices in lodging and we hope that you always stay at the Days Inn whenever you are in the area.  Please come visit us again soon!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: I would like a refund!  I used my hard earned wyndham rewards points for a dirty motel, with a dirty carpet and stained bed comforter.  It was really bad.  This motel needs to be cleaned up and it is not a good representation of your chain.  Very unhappy customers.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -  Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to write a review of our property. Summary: Stayed at this hotel because it was the best rate for our small family to go to Disneyland!  Quiet location, and convenient parking.   The room: seemed clean enough but had some quirks. The bed was a king size (which I THOUGHT was going to be nice because I personally think they are more comfortable), but the bed was slumped in the middle. So when my husband and I slept at night we kept rolling to the middle of the bed (annoying). When we were about to check out of our hotel on the last day, I asked my husband to look under all of the fixtures to see if we left any of my sons' toys. He looked and explained that the bed was pinned onto the wall by strips of wood, an odd design he thought. (Maybe thats why the bed was slumped to the middle?? I don't know.)  One of the light

Summary: I have read hundreds of reviews on this property. It was more than suitable for my family of 4 for the six nights we stayed there. As for the parking and Wi-Fi we didn't have any issues. I guess it depends on how many guests are there. The breakfast room was a joke, we walked in and right back out. Few more shuttle runs to Disneyland would be great. Pool should be open an extra hour, my boys were disappointed every night when we were kicked out. Also the ladys on the front desk were very nice and the men were all rude. We were very comfortable in our room and had an amazing trip.

Summary Heading: The staff was extremely rude, the rooms smelled, only 1...
Summary: The staff was extremely rude, the rooms smelled, only 1 washcloth left each of 3 days for a 4 person room, and for breakfast only offered cereal and waffles. Light switches were behind doors. They have a shuttle to Disney but stranded us there for 3 hrs during rain storm. I've stayed at others hotels in this area that were so much better. DO NOT stay at this place!!!

Summary Heading: A simple hotel with good location for Disney visitors

The hotel offers a free shuttle service to Disneyland.We (my husband and 2 girls, 5 and 8 years old) came back waking once to not to wait until te shuttle pass. It took us like 15min to get to the hotel The air conditioning made a noise that didn't let me sleep well the first day, the next days I could because I get used to the noise. I didn't ask for a solutiom to the hotel.

Beds are comfortable, pillows are soft, staff is friendly and courteous and, NO BLACK FEET!! Will definitely stay here again. 😁

More flexibility with the shuttle would be helpful but it worked and the few times that we had to walk back from Disney were fine.  Had a first floor room and it was nice and quiet (except when Disney fireworks were going off...LOL).  Super Shuttle went there from the LAX airport but the Disney Express doesn't.

Summary: The hotel had nice beds and pillows, so I slept well, and the shuttle (when it's actually on time) is very convenient for Disney visitors. But the hotel falls flat on the hospitality aspect of the hotel experience. The toilet paper was crumpled (not folded) at the end in my room, one of my towels had a stain that could only be described as having a "fecal matter" color to it, the parking lot was dirty and smelly, and the telephone in my room was ripped out of the wall. Not very happy with the stay. I slept good, so if you are a quick one night trip like I was, you're probably good, but if you're having an extended stay, find somewhere else.

Summary Heading: Very good location and nice folks.  Carpet is dingy.
Summary: Location is walkable to Disney and near plenty of food places from Jack in the Box to Ruth Chris steak house.  Rooms are in decent shape, there is a little pool, and a free breakfast (I used other options).  My only issue was the carpet was dingy.  It was so dirty that it made the soles of my feet black when I walked on it.  I was in room 112 in case you folks want to check this out.  I don't want to use the "M" word, but I suspect this may be an issue.

Summary: Overall I would give 3 out of 5 stars. I will not recommend to anyone nor stay here again.  Lost a star due to the lack of customer service. We stayed 5 nights, each of us traveling from a different location. 2 of us traveled by car and the front desk refused to give out a second parking permit even though when we checked in the manager said the parking was first come first served, no mention of limit to one car. There was space available each night but if we would have parked the second car there it would have been towed. Lost one star due to the poor quality of the breakfast.  It's only saving grace Is the location, cleanliness of the room, and the price.

Summary: I booked this place last minute, while checking out of a flea infested place my niece had booked. This place was clean, comfortable and close to the gas station, Starbucks, Taco Bell. We arrived very late after being at Disneyland the entire day. It is a long walk to Disneyland, during the day is easy but at night after all day of walking you will not make it back. The shuttle times weren't given to us by the front desk, I had requested a pack n play before check in and they said they would make a note. I was told upon check out it was first come first serve, technically my note was in before anyone else requested but apparently no one communicated. Overall it was a good stay. Close to the park, having a shuttle time will be a plus. You can see the fireworks at night. Will be

Summary Heading: If you're going to Disneyland, it's everything you want ...
Summary: If you're going to Disneyland, it's everything you want - close to the park (5 minute shuttle down one street), free shuttle, clean, free parking, breakfast included. I didn't give it a 5 because the breakfast could have had some protein - eggs, sausage and/or egg, even just peanut butter. It was just sugar and carbs - cereal, waffles, bread, juice. also, shuttle doesn't run from 1030 to 530, which is a negative (especially in the dead of summer) if you have young children/babies and want to take them back to the room for a nap and a break from the stimulation, or even just have lunch outside of the park. There's a shakey's next door and Starbucks across the street! 👍🏼

Summary: Upon checking in, I was not greeted promptly. Front desk staff were on their cell phones and talking to each other. I stood there long enough to think to myself, "Um, hello?" Being from Vegas, my standards might be a little higher than average. Breakfast was interesting, located in a motel room. Rooms were clean, comfortable and newly renovated. Pool was decent. Overall appearance of the property was clean and well kept. Not crazy far from Disneyland, there are others closer. Good rates, you get what you pay for, most of the time.

Summary Heading: Manager was dishonest and has refused to return our call twice now
Summary: Attempted to make a reservation online but it stated" room no longer available." Called and spoke with a woman who explained the rooms went fast. She asked for a confirmation number but I never received one because the room was not processed. Signed up for Whyndam rewards and booked my room. Had no issues checking in and signed off with no additional charges. When I got home I was charged for the room twice. We called the motel and he stated that he could not assist us, only customer service could because it was a past stay. We called customer service only to be told that the manager "flat out lied." Would be happy to provide the call reference number in follow up. We have called to speak with him twice now and he has been "out of the office" or "busy" but both times we were
Manager Response: Dear Cristal -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We appreciate feedback from guests such as yourselves and use it to improve both our customer service and our facilities.  We are sorry that you had a terrible time with your reservation.  It seems that we are unable to refund your money since it was a past stay but we will see what is going on.  Please email me at the following account:  Guest Services: customercare@daysinndisneyland.com   and I will attempt to help you sort through the matter.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: This hotel is not to bad a choice if you are looking for a economic alternative to the hotels across from Disneyland. There were a few cons,we booked this hotel because of the free shuttle service to Disneyland.The shuttle service needs some improvements to it, there is too big a time gap in service intervals as well as the shuttle bus is too small for the amount of people wanting to use it. But I must add it was free so take what you can get.The Breakfast was not the best,if you weren't there early the choices were not the best.It looked like they were doing a renovation to the breakfast room and they had move the breakfast into a temporary room . Are room was OK a little dated with the furnishings.The bed mattress was comfortable but there was something wrong with the box

You can't beat the value.

Summary: This place has few pros and cons. We were booked in there because of a shuttle to disneyland. Shuttle was too small, often late and absolutely terrible schedule. We ended up spending 100 dollars on taxi/uber/Lyft due to scheduling. We have little kids so we would leave in morning and wanted to be back after lunch. No shuttle after 10:30. Then one shuttle at 5:30...then nothing again till 8:30. We asked 3 days in a row for our room to be cleaned before 1pm. Didn't happen. We ran out of towels after 3 days of no service. 4th day room got cleaned as we were gone whole day. Pool was fantastic and you can watch fireworks right from hot tub or pool. Summary: After checking in; i realized the aircondition wasn't working and called front desk due to the heat factor, when they finally came; they unplugged it and stated they would come back and reset it. My family waited all night with no show by staff, we had to sleep with door cracked, In the morning we went to utilize restroom and clean ourselves to find there was only one face towel and two full towels. I then went to the front desk and stood there for 30 minutes to find that the front desk personnel was up in the dinning area eating breakfast with customers. i explained my situation and disappointment; and her response was maybe next time, didn't offer any discount or refund because it was clearly Days Inn's responsibility for bad service given. AT THIS POINT I WOULD INFORM

Summary Heading: This hotel was not very nice. The staff seemed annoyed...
Summary: This hotel was not very nice. The staff seemed annoyed anytime you asked for something. The Disney shuttle only runs first thing in the morning then late at night. You are stranded during the day if you need to return to the hotel. The continents brealfast consisted of stale cereal and bread, and there were gnats everywhere in the breakfast room. I would definitely not stay here again. I was very disappointed, especially for the price.

Summary: I thought staff had checked us in properly and two days later we were locked out of our hotel room.  The gentleman who was at the counter listened to my situation but did not say a word. He corrected the problem, I thought.   When we checked out we were overfilled and they had our room under another name.  The two men in the office were very rude and told me that I had to prove my reservation. I produced my reservation and they told me to leave and they would settle it later.OMG. I WANTED PROOF THEN I WAS NOT BEING OVERCHARGED. I had to watch my charge very carefully. Over a week later it was corrected.  The breakfast staff was awful and rude and we were monitored as to what we could take to eat. IT WAS NOT THE NEW BREAKFAST ROOM AS IT THE PICTURE.  IT WAS IN AN UPSTAIRS ROOM,
Manager Response: Dear Randy and Judy -  Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property. Summary: The rooms were clean and have plenty of room.  The pool was very enjoyable.  The location is great.  Definitely cheaper than some other places in the area, so we loved that.  I wish the breakfast started earlier than 7, but I love that they make the waffles for you.  Very efficient!  Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -  Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property. Summary: This was the 3rd time staying at this hotel in the past 10 years. Some great remodeling has taken place!! Only complaint would be the parking is awful!! Very small spaces. Front desk clerk seems annoyed when I asked him where we could park as the lot was full. A few things to improve. The shuttle was great!! Larger than it used to be. Still need to have more pick up times in the early afternoon and evening. Also the breakfast needs improvements. Not much but sugar and carb loaded choices. Also as far as the room, our couch was covered with stains. Cleaning it would have made the room much more appealing. Overall the location is perfect and is close enough to walk to Disney, as we did both evenings because no shuttle between 5 and 8:30 pm.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to write a review of our property. Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights. The free Disneyland shuttle they offer was a van that came every hour and only in the morning and night. We planned on coming back to the hotel so the little ones could nap but the van they had didn't run at those times . The breakfast was a joke all they had to offer was half a burnt waffle and toast. The room was small and the sofa bed that we had for the kids was right by the ac and we couldn't use it. The pillows were lumpy and flat. We only had one washcloth in our room. We also had a room on the second floor and with kids and luggage and no elevator made it very difficult to get in and out of our room. I was very disappointed and will not be staying there ever again.

Summary: I arrived at the Days Inn around 10 pm and had no problem parking.  The staff at the desk were all kind and helpful, and the rooms were clean and inviting.  The breakfast area I think is under construction, so they have a space upstairs that they are currently using.  The lady who worked that area was on top of refilling items as they ran out, as well as preparing the waffles for the guests.  The pool/hot tub area is the perfect setting to watch Disney's fireworks.  Speaking of Disney- they squeezed about 15 of us into the shuttle which was tight, but I was still grateful that we didn't have to walk.  We did end up walking back to our room at the end of the night, but that was by choice.  It was a quick, easy walk (maybe 15 min).  I will definitely book here again should we take

Summary: This Days Inn is my go-to when I visit Disneyland, which I do every three months for week-long stays.   They are a short walk away from Maingate & also have a trusty shuttle to and from the parks.   Over the past year they been renovating both their rooms and the lobby. The rooms are comfortable, clean and are now have very pleasant modern decor.  I have never had an issue with foul smelling rooms, paper-thin towels or rough, broken bathroom fans, non-functional appliances or unclean rooms like I have in other hotels.   I highly recommend it.

Summary: We stayed in the family bunk bed suite - which was very roomy, however the room was dirty. The walls and bunk bed area had visual splotches and stains. The bedding on the bunk beds was old. The toilet seat was very loose and the walls were rusting in the bathroom area.  The breakfast area was much too small for this size hotel. It was over 85 degrees in there every morning. Food options were poor. They intentionally only put out a couple of yogurts and when I asked for me, the server was grumpy about it. She fought me on the size of plate I wanted to use for my toast. Poor customer service.

I would stay there again. Just don't expect too much and you will enjoy your stay.

Summary: Days Inn on Harbor Blvd was perfect for our 2 night stay while exploring Disney and CA Adventure Parks. Convenient shuttle to get you to the park in the morning and back in the evening but also a quick 3/4 mile walk if you didn't want to wait or missed it. Clean, comfortable rooms. Always quiet when we came and went. Nice breakfast with cereal, toast, yogurt, waffles etc to get your day started. In the process of remodeling a new breakfast room downstairs which will be a nice addition. Never had time to use the pool or hot tub but it was chilly during our stay anyway. This is not a luxury hotel but it is just what we needed each night when we returned from the parks.
Manager Response: Dear Pam -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We appreciate all feedback and use it to improve both our customer service and our facilities.  We are so pleased to see that you had an excellent stay with us here at the Days Inn.  We love customers such as yourself and hope that you always stay with us whenever you are in the area.  Please come visit us soon!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: Our stay here overall was pleasant.  We spent 4 nights here and the room was clean and ready for us when we arrived. Unfortunately they do not have an elevator and we had a person in a wheelchair among our party so we got placed on two separate floors. The breakfast room was on the second floor and not handicap accessible which was not good for our family. When we reserved our room we were told that breakfast would include eggs, bacon, cereal, and fruit. Our hotel only offered cereal, toast, waffles, yogurt, bananas, milk, and coffee.The girl in charge seemed to have very strict instructions about things because she wouldn't allow my

Summary: Overall our stay was great at this Days Inn. The location is a little further than we usually like to stay but close enough for the price. The rooms were clean and the beds were probably the best I've slept on while on vacation. Very soft. The pillows were not so great but we had brought our own. Good amount of tv channels available. Worst part was the breakfast. Hardly any food choices. And the waffles were barely warm and were soggy. So we stuck with the bananas. But really, for the price, we would definitely stay here again.

Summary: This was a pretty clean hotel for the price.  A few minor changes and it could be a really great hotel for the price. First we were placed in a room in a very dark walkway at the end of the building.  No natural light so that was a real turnoff.  The rooms themselves have recently been redone and were pretty nice and clean mind you this hotel is OLD.  Improvements:  Better towels and it would have been nice to have more than one washcloth for four people in the room.  It does not pay to be frugal on these types of things.  Bed linens could have been a bit better as well, the beds although new are VERY firm so keep this in mind if your used to a softer bed. Breakfast, not one bit of protein and they run out of things rather quickly and are rather stingy on the amount of things
Manager Response: Eugenia C, Guest Relations Manager at Days Inn & Suites Anaheim at Disneyland Park, responded to this review Dear Lisa   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property. My only complaint would be that the wifi was very hit and miss but I never really rely on any hotel wifi...Will definitely be staying there again on our next trip!!!

Summary: We understood this hotel to be non-smoking.  While showering with the light/fan on, our room was filled with the smell of marijuana and cigarette smoke.  Turning off the fan helped a bit, but then in the middle of the night, we awakened to the entire room reeking of marijuana and the fan was not on.  It was not the atmosphere we wanted for ourselves, let alone our children.  Also, the man at the front desk was extremely rude to my husband when we stopped to ask for more towels for our room.  Other staff were helpful and friendly, but this man definitely needed a lesson in customer service.
Manager Response: Dear Kathryn -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We read all comments written by our guests and use them to improve both our service and our facilities.  We have a very strict non-smoking policy at our hotel and enforce it any time we see people smoking cigarettes, never mind marijuana.  We are so sorry that you were subjected to the smell.    We hope that you will give us another chance to show your family what an exceptional say can be at the Days Inn.  Please come back and stay with us again.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary Heading: Days Inn & Suites Anaheim at Disneyland Park

Summary Heading: Rooms were okay but the service overall was horrible
Summary: Had some issues when I tried to check in horrible customer service and basically they didn't even care. The morning breakfast they provide was horrible it's best to just go to IHOP or dennys instead. The shuttle to take you to Disney was so small it's faster to walk to Disney then to wait for the shuttle to take you. The only thing that was good about this hotel was the room but the tub kept getting clogged tried to fit it but couldn't but when housekeeping would clean fixed it but while taking showers it would be clogged definitely not worth the money to stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Dear Yesenia-   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to write a review of our property.  We read all comments and use them to improve both our service and our facilities.  We are sorry that the Days Inn did not provide an exceptional stay for you.  We are in the process of finishing up our remodel and will be sure to address all of the issues that you listed in your room.  We hope that you will give us another chance and come stay at the Days Inn again when you are in the area.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: Beds were uncomfortable. Bathroom curtain was dirty. Room was decent overall. Parking though free was tight. Shuttle experience back from the park was terrible - it was way too small. After a 40 minute wait (thinking we'd be first to board) it filled before we could ride. At least it looped right back vs. another hour but we nearly didn't fit the second trip either. 10:35 shuttle - seemed like the entire hotel was heading back at once. Not friendly when trying to extend a night. Stayed at another chain for last night and diffences and improvements in our experiences was huge and for a way lower rate too.
Manager Response: Dear Rozlyn-   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to write a review of our property.  We read all comments and use them to improve both our service and our facilities.  We are sorry that the Days Inn did not provide an exceptional stay for you.  Although our shuttle is small, it will always loop back to pick up people that are waiting to be picked up.    We hope that you will give us another chance and come stay at the Days Inn again when you are in the area.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: We were turned off not as much by the hotel but by the other people that were staying here. Very loud, lots of people coming in and out of one room, (definitely more than four). Hot-tub was an off greenish brown color. We didn't dare touch it or the pool. We watched a man drink 8 beers in the hot-tub and then crush the cans and throw them into the pool.  We watched the same man give a beer to his 8 or 9 year old daughter. Uh, not ok. Staff was nice but should consider putting more than one person at the front desk. There was a line to check in and out, phone was wringing the whole team. Asked for a room on the second floor and stayed right above the lobby, thankfully, as I can only imagine what else was going on around the parking lot. Not the nicest area. Room was semi-clean
Manager Response: Dear Celeste -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to write a review about our property.  We read all comments that are written by our guests and use them to improve both our service and our facilities.  We are sorry that you did not like the ambiance in our hotel.  We try our best to make sure that shenanigans like what you described do not happen at our hotel, but we obviously were not on the ball that night.   We hope that you will give us another chance and come back to experience our great staff and comfortable rooms again.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: Our room was excellent, clean, comfortable, modern, and nicely refurbished. Lots of hot water.  Wifi was sketchy and didn't work most of the time. Breakfast was mediocre, not much variety. Shuttle service to Disneyland was a huge plus. It seats 15 so we always got on by arriving about 10 minutes early.  A good pizza restaurant right next door.

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel for the price!
Summary: I brought a group of 50 high school students and 6 chaperones for 3 nights. The management team were very patient with our many requests and did not complain when our kids ate all the food in the breakfast room! The beds are very comfy, even the pillows. Some of the rooms have been redone but even though ours had not yet been redone, it was very nice except for some stains on the carpet and sofabed. I like that the sink is outside the bathroom so everyone can brush their teeth or dry hair while someone else showers. The hotel is relatively quiet and within easy walking distance to Disneyland, although they do have a free shuttle. There is a mini-mart next door and a Starbucks a block away. What more do you need?
Manager Response: Dear Ms.  Kennedy -   Thank you for choosing the Days Inn for your trip and also for writing a review of our property.  We value all feedback from our guests and use this information to improve both our service and our facilities.  We are so pleased that you had an amazing stay with us here at the Days Inn.  We hope that you will always choose us to host your high school students in the future.    We hope to see you again next year!  Thank you, The Management

Summary: Clean hotel. Person at check in seemed like he didn't like his job. Had a down stairs room. I was able to hear every single footstep people from the room above us. Even when they'd turn on the water. And flushed the toilet.

Summary: Room was very clean, breakfast was good, location was perfect. The 10 minute walk to the park was appreciated as an alternative to the shuttle which gave excellent service. The vantage point from the pool/hot tub for the evening fireworks was great!
Manager Response: Dear Charles -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to write a review of our property.  We read all comments written by our guests and use them to improve both our service and our facilities.    We are so pleased that you had an exceptional visit with us.  We love guests such as yourself and hope that you stay with us whenever you are in the area.  Please come again soon!  Sincerely,  The Management

Summary: The quality of the room was really good! Prices for the room rates could be lowered slightly, but overall really impressed with our stay! Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear Matthew-   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to write a review of our property.  We read all of the comments written about our place and use them to improve both our service and our faciliites.  We are pleased to see that you had an overall excellent experience staying with us.  We are renovating the dining room - we are moving it downstairs and it will be spacious and airy when we are finished.   We try to keep our prices competitive with the other hotels in the area and provide our guests with a good value for their money (breakfast, shuttle, free parking).    We hope that you come back again when we are finished and enjoy the new facilities.  We are excited to see your reaction when everything is finished.  Please come back soon!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: Great stay, the rooms are all remodeled and nice the beds were very comfortable will stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Marrit -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to write a review of our property.  We read all of the comments written about our place and use them to improve both our service and our faciliites.  We are pleased to see that you had an overall excellent experience staying with us.  We are renovating the dining room - we are moving it downstairs and it will be spacious and airy when we are finished.  In addition, there will be delicious new food offered in the breakfast area.    We hope that you come back again when we are finished and enjoy the new facilities.  We are excited to see your reaction when everything is finished.  Please come back soon!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: The place isn't  what I expected  I didn't know the hotel was tucked in the corner There was bugs in our room  My room was tucked in a corner and to get to my room you had to walk thru where the storage room was for the maids  It was just uncomfortable  The people in the front office was rude  Didn't really make you feel welcome  The continental breakfast wasn't really continental  Horribly presented all around
Manager Response: Dear Channah -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We read all comments and use your response to improve our service and our facilities.  We are so sorry that you had a visit at our hotel that was not what you had envisioned.  We pride ourselves on being a hotel that allows families and guests to stay in a comfortable room during the duration  of their stay.  We try to offer a basic breakfast of oatmeal, toast, yogurt, cereal and hot waffle (along with juice, milk and hot drinks) that would provide a start to their day.     We hope that you will give us another chance and come stay with us when we are finished with our remodel.  At that time we will have a spacious new dining room and will be offering delicious new food to our guests.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: Well-maintained, clean rooms. Close enough to Disneyland to walk, or drive, but the free shuttle is a great perk. Just make sure you show up early for the shuttle as it fills quickly. Breakfast was very nice, not cheap or cheesy. Staff was friendly and courteous.
Manager Response: Dear James -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We read all comments from our guests and use them to improve both our service and our facilities.  We are so pleased that you had an excellent stay with us at the Days Inn.  We really appreciate guests such as yourselves and hope that you always stay with us whenever you are in the area.    Come visit us soon!  The Management

Summary: Arrived here from a long 8hrs, my family really enjoyed the stay here. its our 2nd time and the rooms have improved. the kids loved the pool. the transportation from the room to Disneyland is great. its also a short drive from the Disney parking lot which is a plus. we will definitely continue to use this location for our future stays. breakfast condiments were great and simple, something to get when your on the go.
Manager Response: Dear Kraig -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to write a review of our property.  We read all of the comments written by our guests and use them to improve both our service and our facilities.  We are so pleased that you had an amazing stay with us here at the Days Inn.  We love having guests such as yourself and hope that you will stay with us whenever you are in the area.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: great value. rooms were very nice and clean and staff was very friendly. our shower didn't drain properly, but it wasn't horrible. one thing that we found odd was that they only provided one wash cloth. we brought our own bath items, so it wasn't a problem, but still weird. wifi didn't work for us. ice machine had no ice. they offer a decent breakfast, though the dining room does get crowded. the shuttle to the disney parks is nice, but i still wouldn't recommend taking advantage of it because it's basically an "if you snooze you lose" situation. it can only accommodate 15 people, so if you're not there early and there's not enough room, you have to wait for the next trip- 30 minutes later- and you can easily walk to the parks in that time. it's maybe a 10-15 minute drive
Manager Response: Dear Miranda  -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to write a review of our property.  We read all of the comments written by our guests and use them to improve both our service and our facilities.  We are so pleased that you had an excellent stay with us here at the Days Inn.  We are so sorry that the Wi-Fi was spotty - we are currently in the middle of a major renovation and the construction occasionally interferes with our operations. We are remodeling our dining room and, when finished, will have delicious new food offerings in a large and airy new space.  We love having guests such as yourself and hope that you will stay with us whenever you are in the area.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: Enjoyed our stay. Nice, clean rooms and very close to Disneyland. Only problem was the Wi-Fi, it kept turning off
Manager Response: Dear Brittany -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We read all reviews from our guests and use them to improve both our service and our facilities.  We are so pleased that you had an excellent stay with us here at the Days Inn.  We are sorry that you had issues with our wi-fi - during our current remodel we occasionally have had problems because of the construction.    We invite you to come back when we are all finished with the renovation and experience the spacious new dining room and delicious new food offerings that we will have.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: No hot water. There were three of us that stayed and we each tried taking a shower at different days and times and each time there was no hot water. It was always ice cold. We will not be back. It was recently remodeled which was nice, but it was not worth not having a warm shower.
Manager Response: Dear Holly-  Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We read all comments written by our guests and use them to improve our service and our facilities.    We are so sorry about the issue with the water heater.  We are in the middle of a major remodel of the dining area and the construction has impacted some things, this time it was the water heater.  It should not have affected our guests and we apologize for this.    We hope that you would consider coming back after we are finished with the renovation.  We will do everything we can to make your stay exceptional.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: Excellent stay. Check in was quick and easy. Shuttle was great. Breakfast was good, but some days food items would have a shortage and they would run out (orange juice, toast, etc.) Room was really clean. Definitely would recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Dear Sophie -  Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our hotel.  We read all comments from our guests and use them to improve both our service and our facilities.  We are so pleased to see that you had an excellent stay with us.  We are currently renovating our dining room and invite  you to come back when we are finished.  We will have a spacious and airy new eating area and delicious new food offerings.  We love guests such as yourselves and hope that you come back soon!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: We stayed at this hotel because of the decent price, free breakfast and parking, and that it was within walking distance to Disneyland.  The hotel itself wasn't too bad.  The rooms seem to be updated and the beds were comfortable.  The towels need to be replaced because many of the ones we received were falling apart.  The breakfast room could use a bit of updating and more space.  It was always pretty crowded and people were lining up to receive a lukewarm/cold waffle.  The hotel is nice enough to offer a free shuttle service to Disneyland but it is almost better to just walk.  People start lining up for the shuttle pretty early and you may not even be able to get on if you are not one of the first ones there.  From the hotel to the security check at Disneyland is only .8 mile.
Manager Response: Dear Dave -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We read all of the comments written by our guests and use them to improve both our service and our facilities.  We are so pleased that you still think that this hotel is a good value for the price - that is our goal as a lodging option.  We are in the middle of a major renovation of the dining room and when finished, will have a spacious new eating area and delicious new food offerings.    Please come visit us when we are finished with our remodel.  Thank you! The Mangement

Summary: Upgraded rooms made the hotel much nicer than it used to be. The bathroom had some slight cosmetic touch ups needed (dent in the wall and little hole in the wall by the door), but nice other than that. Excellent location for families on their Disneyland trip. Walked into the office when this mean old bitty was yelling like a psycho to the desk clerk. Poor guy was so calm and patient, we were very impressed. Good staff and decent hotel on a budget.
Manager Response: Dear Dennis -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We read all comments and use them to improve both our service and our facilities.  We are so pleased that you enjoyed our renovations.  Please know that we are still improving our hotel with a remodel of our dining area.  We hope that you will come back and enjoy our new facilities and delicious new food offerings when we are finished.  We hope to see you soon!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary Heading: DO NOT STAY AT THIS HOTEL!
Summary: Our stay was unpleasant and we will not be back to this hotel nor recommend it to anyone. We visit Anaheim twice a year for vacation, this was our first stay at this hotel and will not be back. Within a day of our stay, the hot water was not working. Three days we did not have access to hot water until we informed the front desk and they had to reset the boiler. One night it was not fixable, we were forced to heat up water in our hotel microwave to sponge bathe. Management was not helpful during this issue. Was told lie after lie, that it would be fixed in 20 min,it wasn't resolved until 10am the next day. A cleaning maid informed us that the hot water issue is a common thing but management ignores it.The GM did not arrive to the hotel to resolve this issue until the next day.
Manager Response: Dear Louie -  Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We read all comments written by our guests and use them to improve our service and our facilities.    We are so sorry about the issue with the water heater.  We are in the middle of a major remodel of the dining area and the construction has impacted some things, this time it was the water heater.  It should not have affected our guests and we apologize for this.    We hope that you would consider coming back after we are finished with the renovation.  We will do everything we can to make your stay exceptional.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: Lied about water heater working... waited until after checking to let everyone know that hot showers would work.
Manager Response: Dear Stephanie -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our hotel.  We read all comments and use them to improve both our service and our facilities.  We apologize for the lack of hot water during your stay.  Although it is not an excuse, we want to let you know that during the process of remodeling, sometimes things happen to our facilities and although we work around the clock to fix what happened, it still impacts our guests.  We take full responsibility and hope that you will come back again to stay with us when this upgrade is finished.    Please come visit us again.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: The staff are really friendly, the rooms were clean and it had a nice location.   Didn't like the continental breakfast, barely any selection.  They had free wifi but it didn't ever work. They have a nice pool which is super warm.  They have a shuttle that goes to Disneyland at certain times if you don't feel like waiting, it's about a 20 min walk to the park.
Manager Response: Dear Dale -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We read all comments that our guests write and use them to improve both our service and our facilities.  We apologize for the wifi and the breakfast.  We are currently in the middle of a major remodel; when we are finished we will have a spacious and airy new dining room and delicious new food offerings available.  Unfortunately, during the remodeling process we have had a few snafus with the phone and internet.  We invite you back to enjoy the new facilities when we are finished.  We hope to see you soon!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: front desk guy was very friendly and i ask him to get two rooms together and he do the best to give me what i ask for, breakfast was amazing staff on kitchen very friendly shuttle guy was very helpfull i will stay on this hotel my next disney trip by thanksgiving....
Manager Response: Dear Luis -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We are thrilled that you had an excellent stay and are coming back.  We can't wait to welcome you to our hotel again!  We love the fact that you honor our employees by letting us know that they are an asset to our hotel.  Please come back and stay with us soon!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: Was very happy with our stay, room was clean and front desk was courteous and helpful when I needed their assistance. Would definitely stay here again! Disneyland was just over the bridge, about a 30 minute walk with a 4 year old!
Manager Response: Dear Mary -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to write a review of our property.  We love reading comments from our guests and use them to improve both our service and our facilities.  We are so pleased that you had an exceptional stay with us.  We hope that you always stay with us whenever you are in the area.    Please come again soon!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary Heading: Good nice and clean place to stay
Summary: This motel is a nice clean cheap place to stay is in a great distance from Disneyland the only complaint would be to have a better breakfast all 5 days we were there there was waffles every morning and did not proved anything else
Manager Response: Dear Brittany  Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our hotel.  We read all of the comments made by our guests and use them to improve both our service and our facilities.  We are so pleased to see that you had an exceptional stay with us here at the Days Inn.  Please know that we are currently remodeling our breakfast area and, when finished, will have a spacious and airy new dining room for our guests with delicious new food offerings.   We hope that you will come back as soon as we are finished with our renovations and experience our new facilities.  Thank you! Warmly, The Management

Summary: I was very satisfied with this place...It was decent and the service is great...also the stuff they have for bf is satisfying...And all this for a good price I definitely will be going back...
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We read all comments written by our guests and use them to improve both our service and our facilities.  We are so pleased that you had an excellent stay with us.  We love guests such as yourselves and hope that you will stay with us whenever you are in the area.  Please come visit us soon!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: We had an overall good stay at the Days Inn hotel, but there were some things that would have made our stay better. The internet was NOT working at all in our room during our stay, however the internet did work in the breakfast room and near the lobby.  The first night in our room, the hot water wasn't working and when we told the staff they said that a maintenance worker was going to fix it that night (it was already midnight however), but the next day the water was nice and hot. The room was nice and the beds were super comfy. We had booked a stay for two nights but decided to go to Disneyland so added on a night. When we got the final bill, we were surprised to find out that we had been overcharged by $20 for the third night. When we had asked to extend our stay the third
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to write a detailed review.  We read all comments and use them to improve both our service and our facilities.  We are currently in the midst of a major remodel of our property.  The remodel encompasses the entire eating area and, when finished, will have a spacious and airy new dining room and delicious new food offerings.  During this remodel, we have had issues with internet and phones, but they are only temporary.  We apologize that they have affected your stay.  We hope that you will come back and stay with us when this renovation is complete and enjoy the new facilities.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: Arriving at about 11PM the people at the front desk were more than friendly helping us in the lobby. Getting into our room was amazing it was extremely clean and very nice! The beds were super comfortable as well as having the couch where another person could sleep. The microwave and fridge really helped allowing us to have food for us to eat after we got back from Disney. They have a free shuttle to disney which we did not use, but it was only a short walk to and from the park which was extremely nice!
Manager Response: Dear Nicolet  Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We love hearing comments from our guests and use them to improve both our service and our facilities.  We are so pleased that you had an exceptional stay with us here at the Days Inn.  We hope that you always stay with us  whenever you are in the area.    Come visit us soon!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: Nice clean room. The bed was very comfortable! I had an adjoining room with my family, and never heard a sound between the walls. The housekeeper kept the room so clean. The breakfast was good. I was impressed that they kept an employee in the breakfast room at all times, making the waffles and keeping the area clean. The only thing is the shuttle only runs first thing in the morning and last thing at night, it should run a few times more.
Manager Response: Dear Sandee -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We read all comments written and use them to improve our service and our facilities.  We are so pleased to see that you had an exceptional stay with us at the Days Inn.  We love having guests such as yourselves and hope that you always stay with us whenever you are in the area.  Please come visit us soon!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: The Motel was okay and very conveniently located. Unfortunately the internet in my room was not working properly. The breakfast was good. They have a free shuttle that runs during park hours. Parking is free.
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Keen -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and taking the time to review our property.  We love reading comments from our guests and use them to improve our service and our facilities.  We are so pleased that you love our location and our facilities.  We are so sorry, however, that the internet was spotty during your stay.  We are currently in the middle of a major renovation and sometimes the construction causes temporary issues at our hotel.    Please come back soon and stay with us when we are finished and enjoy our new facilities.  Thank you, The Management

Summary: We have stayed here several times while visiting the park.  The rooms are clean and recently remodeled, price is great and it's walking distance to the front gate of the park.
Manager Response: Dear John -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We read all comments written and use them to improve our service and our facilities.  We are so pleased to see that you had an excellent stay with us at the Days Inn.  We hope that you come stay with us whenever you are in the area.  We really look forward to regular guests such as yourselves and hope that we see you soon!  Sincerely, The Managment

Summary: The desk staff were very helpful. The shuttle was a great perk. We did walk to Disneyland a couple of times which wasn't too bad. We Ubered back to the hotel our last night. It was only $5.50 for all four of us. Great location and price.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -  Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We read all comments left by the guests and use them to better both our service and our facilities.  We are so pleased to see that you had an exceptional stay.  We really look forward to serving guests such as yourselves and hope that you stay with us whenever you are in the area.  Please come visit us soon!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: We were here to do three days of Disneyland and this was very good place to stay. The motel was very close to the park so close we walked to and from the park each day. The walk took us 20mins, my youngest that was walking is 5 years old. There is a shuttle but it only left at certain times.  The room itself was huge. We have a family of six and there was room for all of us. There were two queen beds and a castle bunk bed that the kids loved.
Manager Response: Dear Curtis -   Thank you for staying with us at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We read all comments written by our guests and use them to improve both our service and our facilities.  We are so pleased that you had an excellent stay with us and that you enjoyed our special Disneyland suite.  We  designed it especially for families such as yours and it is gratifying to see it in use!  We hope that you always come back to visit us here at the Days Inn.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: The front desk agents were all helpful and polite! My room was neat and tidy, they also have shuttle to Disneyland every morning! You could also walk to DT Disney or Dinsey parks, it's just around 20-25 mins walk.
Manager Response: Dear Akira -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We read every comment and use them to improve both our service and our facilities.  We are so pleased to see that you had an excellent stay with us.  It is so nice to see that you liked our location and the facilities.    We hope that you stay with us whenever you are in the area.  Please come visit us soon!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: I am a days inn employee in another city and stayed here during a trip to disneyland. I was very impressed with this property. The rooms were very clean and updated.. they had a really welcoming feeling..wifi worked great and was free.... pool was heated and great after a long day of walking around disneyland...staff was friendly and helpful....the employee attending to breakfast kept every thing clean and ready for the other guest.. there is a shuttle to get you to and from disneyland but if you happen to miss it the park is just down the street and closer then the disneyland parking lot is to the disneyland park. Really great stay and would absolutely want to return to this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -   Thank you for staying at our Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We are so pleased that you came to stay with us and were able to have a great stay. It is high praise indeed when someone that knows the industry, especially from the same brand, appreciates what we have done.  We hope that you will always come stay with use whenever you are in the area.    Thank you for your kind review!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: the only thing good about this motel is the price. Spend a  little more and you will enjoy yourself a lot more.  Very basic.  Really noisy and to top it off NO hot water one morning
Manager Response: Dear Jean -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We read all comments that are submitted and use them to improve our service and our facilities.  We are so sorry that you did not enjoy your stay with us.  We are in the process of renovating our hotel and hope that you will come back when we are finished.  Please give us another chance to provide you with an exceptional experience.  Sincerely, The Mangement

Summary: Upon entering hotel noticed cigeratte....  burns on bed sheets pubic hairs on bath towel stains on walls rudeness of several hotel employees.
Manager Response: Dear Edward -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to write a review of our hotel.  We read all of your comments and use them to improve our service and our facilities.  We are sorry that you had a bad experience at our property.  We will be talking to the cleaning staff and reviewing our procedures to make sure this does not happen again.  We hope that you will give us another chance to show you a better experience at our hotel by staying with us again.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: My sister and I stayed here before the renovations and felt it was a good value but since the renovations it's even better! The beds are very comfortable, the room was very clean, the only thing was the sofa sleeper isn't very comfortable but it worked out.  The staff is very friendly, I left my jacket in the room after we checked out and one of the housekeepers rushed it out before we left.  The front desk even helped me take care of a room adjustment for another trip we have planned for April.  I would definitely recommend this hotel as a clean and comfortable place to stay while visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Danielle-  Thank you for staying at the Days Inn (again!) and for taking the time to review our hotel.  We read every comment written and use them to improve our service and our facilities.  We are so pleased to see that you had an excellent stay with us.  We pride ourselves on helping our guests with whatever they need and it is so great of you to notice that!  We hope that you come stay with us whenever you are in the area.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary Heading: Will not be a returning customer
Summary: Front Desk person checked my family and I into a room that was not cleaned yet. There were dirty towels on the beds and in the bathroom. (>_<). GROSS. Switched rooms. Not any better. Uncomfortable stay. No WIFI, even though WIFI was listed to be free. We will not return to this facility!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We read all comments and use them to improve our service and our facilities.  We are sorry that you had a bad experience at our hotel.  We are in the process of upgrading our facilities for our guests and often the wi-fi and other amenities are temporarily compromised as a result.    We hope that you will give us another opportunity to improve upon your prior experience.  Please come stay with us again.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary Heading: Keep the price low and the shuttle running
Summary: If your looking for a hotel that offers a shuttle to Disney and don't want to pay the ridiculous prices other hotels charge. Then this is the hotel for you.
Manager Response: Dear Jesus -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We read all comments carefully and use them to improve our service and our facilities.  We are pleased to see that you had an excellent experience at our hotel.  We do try to offer everything we can to our guests within our price point and we are please that you were able to enjoy the use of our shuttle.  We hope that you stay with us whenever you are in the area.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: We had a great experience at this Days Inn. Our room was exceptionally clean, had all the amenities we needed, and the wi-fi wasn't an issue for us (it was high speed for us). The vending machine outside the room was broken, so that was annoying, but not a big enough deal to make a fuss. The hotel is within walking distance from the park and a myriad of places to eat breakfast if toast, waffles, and cereal aren't enough for you. We had a family of 9 next door and couldn't hear them (well, except for the youngest son constantly touching the handle to the door that would adjoin our rooms). We were very pleased with this location and would stay here again if we found ourselves in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Hans -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We read all comments made and use them to better our service and our facilities.  We are so pleased that you had a great experience at our hotel.  It is so nice to read that your stay made you want to stay here again.  We hope to see you again at the Days Inn soon.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary Heading: Good hotel to stay in when going to Disney
Summary: We stayed here when doing our family Disney vacation.  It was a really affordable option.  There is free shuttle service to Disney.  We were able to walk to Disney too.  There were lots of restaurants and shops close by.  We had free parking and the room was very clean.  My only complaint is the wifi wasn't good.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We ready all comments and use them to improve both our service and our facilities.  We are so pleased to see that you had an excellent stay.  We are sorry that the wi-fi affected your comfort - please be assured that we have attended to this matter.    Please come stay again with us whenever you are in the area.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: We stayed here for 7 nights and liked the place. We weren't going the Disneyland (have been there on previous trips) so being a short bus ride to Disneyland was not an issue for us.  The rooms were large, clean and comfortable. Décor was a little old but fine. If you're not driving the location is great as there are bus stops just outside to take you in which ever direction you want. Breakfast was included and while the buffet was basic it was fine for a start to the day.  The added bonus was every evening at around 7..30pm you could see the Disney fireworks from the courtyard, so you got the show every night for free.  They have a free shuttle to Disneyland that goes several times a day. They will also store your bags after checkout if you have a late flight and want to go out
Manager Response: Dear Alek -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We read all comments carefully and use them to improve both our service and our facilities.  We are so pleased to see that you had an excellent stay.  We love having guests such as yourself stay at our hotel and we invite you to come by whenever you are in the area.    Please come visit soon!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: If you like an unaccessible for wheelchairs, they had to move furniture in the accessible room so the wheelchair would fit. No smoking on the property was rediculous, not even outside
Manager Response: Dear Marie -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  Please know that we take all comments seriously and use them to improve our service and our facilities.  We have been remodeling our facilities and are still working out the placement of furniture, so we apologize that it was not ready.  Our hotel IS non-smoking, but guests can come to the smoking area that is designated in the front.    We hope that you come back again to stay with us and allow us the opportunity to provide you with an improved stay.   Thank you, The Management

Summary: the wifi was terrible.  the shower head needs too be cleaned in CLR but those are minor things.  it was a nice big room.  good bed and pillows.  not too noisy.  some noise from neighbors but no street noise.  breakfast was ok.....bread, cereal, coffee and juice.....i didnt pick this for the breakfast.  right across the street from the shuttle stop at the menage.  i liked it here and i will stay again
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We take all comments seriously and use them to improve our service and our facilities.  We are pleased to see that you had an over all excellent stay and we will most definitely look into the shower head and the wi-fi.  Please know that we are currently renovating the breakfast room and hope that you will come back to enjoy our new facilities and breakfast offerings.    Come visit us again soon!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: Stayed 3 nights with 2 kids. Rooms were nice. Internet was ok. Breakfast was not the best. Location was good. Only complaint was the shuttle didn't run after 5:30 until 8:30 but given the size of the hotel, it was kinda understandable. Still within walking distance of the parks.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We read all comments carefully and use them to improve our service and our facilities.  We are currently renovating our breakfast room - when it is done it will be large and airy.  We invite you to come back and experience our hotel when this remodel is finished.    Please come back and stay with us soon!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: I booked a two queen room with a pullout "sofabed". The "sofabed" was tiny and unless you weigh less than 20 lbs, you could not use it. Two adults would never fit, one adult either. The flimsy sheets on it were FILTHY and I had to go to front desk to ask for all new bedding for it and they brought ONE flat sheet! No blankets and no pillows. I had to go back to front desk to ask for pillows and towels. They had two bath towels, one of which was a bath mat towel, one face cloth and one hand towel. I had 4 people in the room! The bathtub is made of plastic and must be installed wrong because the floor of it was uneven and you have to catch your balance.The breaksfst is all carb waffles, cereals and some yogurt. Coffee was disgusting! The breakfast room is on 2nd floor and there is
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We read every comment carefully and use them to improve our service and our facilities.  We are so sorry that you did not have a satisfactory experience.  The sofabed is industry-standard sized; however, we are sorry that you were not prepared for that ahead of time.  We will be sure to review with housekeeping the about the amount of towels that are left in the room and when guests call for more.    Our shuttle driver will always come back to get guests that do not fit onto the shuttle for the first trip.    We are currently in the process of renovating the breakfast room to be on the second floor.  We invite you to come back to see our upgraded continental breakfast and new facilities when we are finished.   We hope that you will come again to stay with us and give us another opportunity to serve you.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: This motel is fine, nothing fancy, but nothing terrible either.  I can't complain about the cleanliness, but there were a couple small weird things I noticed:  no hooks for hand towels by the sink, we were only provided with 1 washcloth and 1 hand towel.  The breakfast leaves a little to be desired, but again, for the price. . . I would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  Please know that we take all comments seriously and use them to improve our service and our facilities.  We are pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel.  We are currently renovating our breakfast room and will be changing our breakfast offerings.  Please come back to stay with us and we hope to impress you with our new and improved facilities.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: The room was comfortable, but it could have been cleaner.  The wifi did not work in our room.  At 11:00pm there was an alarm going off either outside our room or in the adjacent room; I alerted the front desk and it was taken care of within 15 minutes.  There was nothing but cheap carbs for breakfast.  I'm Overall the stay was mediocre.  My only gripe is that the hotel should offer more trips to the park in the shuttle.  The shuttle was too full to take us and it was the off season.  We had to pay for a ride to the park.  It's not a huge deal, but they have the van, why not make more trips as to accommodate the number of guests???
Manager Response: Dear Jessica -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  Please know that we read all comments and use them to improve our service and our facilities.    Our shuttle service is offered at the times that most people need to go and return from Disneyland.  Our driver will always take people when the shuttle is full, so we are sorry that you missed it.  We hope that you will return to stay with us and see how much the breakfast room renovations will add to your stay.  Please come see us soon! Sincerely, The Management

Summary Heading: Nice room, needs more shuttle transports.
Summary: Rooms are clean and comfortable. Staff very nice. Shuttle does not make enough trips to and from the park. Done by 9:00 but first shuttle back was 10:30.  Goes to park every 1.5 hours from hotel. Would be nice to be able to call and get a shuttle.
Manager Response: Dear Tim -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We appreciate all comments and review them carefully to improve both our service and our facilities.   We are sorry that you misinterpreted our shuttle schedule.  Although we do not run all day long, we run every hour on the half hour in the morning, and then again starting at 5:30 in the afternoon.  We are also able to pick up whenever the shuttle driver is available.  We hope that you will come back to stay with us and give us another opportunity to improve your stay.  Please come visit us soon.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary Heading: Days Inn at South Harbor Anaheim
Summary: Hotel was clean and for the price it was good value.  They have breakfast, and the service was excellent.  The hotel has good lighting and they even have service to do to Disneyland resort.  I will certainly go back to Days Inn South Harbor Anaheim
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We appreciate all comments and will be using them to improve our service and our facilities.    We are so please to see that you had an excellent stay at the Days Inn.  We hope that you stay in our hotel whenever you are in the area.  Please come visit us soon!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: We have stayed here a couple times. We're fond of it because it's fairly inexpensive, within walking distance of Disneyland, and pretty nice! The rooms are big and clean; there's a bed and a love seat. The staff is also very friendly.  My only request would be having functional curtains. We've stayed on the first floor both times we've been here, and the curtains are gauzy and see-through and don't actually afford any privacy in the room at all.
Manager Response: Dear Elizabeth -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We appreciate all comments and will be using them to improve our service and our facilities.   We will definitely take your comments about the curtains into consideration.  We are pleased to see that you were satisfied with your stay.  We hope that you will always stay with us whenever you are in the area.   Sincerely, The Management

Summary: We stayed here one night to enjoy a day at Disney on a budget. At first I thought we would be able to walk but it's s little far. We used our rental car to drive and park. I would stay closer if you wanted to walk. The hotel was clean and comfortable. Breakfast was ok - not great. We wanted to make oatmeal but there was no hot water. However for the price this was a good choice.
Manager Response: Dear Rachel Lynn-   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We appreciate all of your comments and use them to improve our service and our facilities.    Please know that we are in the process of renovating our breakfast area.  We hope that you will come back when it is finished and enjoy the new facilities and food.    Come visit us soon!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: It was closed to Disneyland but the hotel in general doesn't deserve a 3 star the customer service at the front desk was horrible. My rate was changed from when I booked it and they wanted me to leave without the resolving the issue. I pushed for it to get resolved right away because I was leaving that same day. It is an experience I will never forget and I will never come back to this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We take all comments seriously and will use them to improve our service and our facilities.    We are sorry that you had a bad experience while checking in.  Our rates are set by the computer the day that you book it so it is difficult to see how it could have changed.  We hope that you will come back and give us another opportunity to improve your check-in experience.    Sincerely, The Management

Summary: All good, although I do not prefer open bath areas since the water tends to spread to the toilet area.. a tub or standing shower in preferable
Manager Response: Dear Aminder -  Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our hotel.  We always read all comments left by our guests and take each review seriously.  We are pleased to see that you had a great stay with us.  We hope that you stay with us whenever you are in the area.    Please come visit us soon!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: I really enjoyed our stay, room was very nice and beds very comfy. Internet didn't work that's only complaint we had.
Manager Response: Dear Sophia -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our hotel.  We read all comments carefully and us them to improve the service and our facilities for our guests.    We are so pleased to see that you had an excellent stay in our property.  We are sorry for our internet - with the rainy season we seem to have some connectivity problems.  This problem should be rectified when you come again.  Please come stay with us again soon!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: the hotel was basic...clean, reasonable rates, close to DL.  There was some construction in the laundry room area which started at 8am sharp each morning...they should have pushed the workers back to 9am...but otherwise..an adequate place
Manager Response: Dear Kathleen -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our hotel.  We appreciate all comments and will take them into careful consideration.  We are so sorry that you were disturbed by the construction.  We hope that you will come visit us again and enjoy the new facilities when we are finished.    Please come again soon.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: With three kids we specifically asked for a suite with two separate rooms divided by a door and were assured that's what we'd get. The hotel has no such rooms. There was a 2" cockroach in the bathroom the first night. The breakfast has no meat items and we were asked if we were finished while my 6 yr old daughter still had good on her plate because there was starting to be a line for the very limited number of tables. The wifi is so slow it's unusable. The room floor hasn't been shampooed since it was installed.  Other than that, you're really close to Disney and it was competitively priced!
Manager Response: Dear Kerry -  Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our hotel.  We read all comments and scruntinize them for ways that we can make each stay better.  Your feedback is taken very seriously.  We are sorry that you felt that your stay did not meet your expectations.  We are still in the process of renovating our hotel and in the near future will be working on the new breakfast room.  We hope that you will come back to stay with us and have a more satisfactory experience.    Sincerely, The Management

Summary: The bathroom could use some help, The breakfast was sad! The room was nice and the beds were comfortable. It was down the street of Disneyland and they offered free shuffle which was a plus! They had construction going on right out side my window which was not a good thing to wake up to. The service was very good all in all would stay their again.
