Manager Response: Dear Rhonda -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our hotel.  Please know that we take all comments seriously and will be scruntinizing them for ways to make your stay better.  We are so please to see that you enjoyed our newly remodeled rooms.  We are in the process of renovating the breakfast room so we are sorry that the noise interfered with your stay.  Please come back and stay with us and enjoy the newly expanded breakfast facilities.  We hope to see you soon! Sincerely, The Management

Summary: We enjoyed 3 nights at the hotel. Didn't have much of a chance to use the pool but we appreciated the hot tub after such long days walking. Breakfast was...meh. Beds were super comfy, it was quiet and the shower was amazing.
Manager Response: Dear Victoria -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our hotel.  Please know that we read all reviews carefully and use the information to make each stay better.  We are so please to see that you had a great experience with the rooms and facilities.  We are currently going into a major remodel of the breakfast area so we hope that you come back and enjoy the new and expanded facilities when they are done.  Please come visit us again soon!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary Heading: Great location to Disneyland - good price.
Summary: The rooms are a good size. Rooms are relatively modern and clean. Beds are comfortable. Carpets are a bit grungy (they are a dark colour and hide the dirt). Our feet were black from walking on the carpet. Breakfast is pretty basic but at least is is included. Toast, two types of cereal, apples and waffles. Bins outside the rooms aren't emptied very often. Because it is close to Disneyland families say here so beware kids may run around making noise in the mornings.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our hotel.  Please rest assured that we appreciate all of your comments and take them into careful consideration.  We are so pleased to hear that your visit was pleasant overall.  We hope that you come stay with us whenever you are in the area.    Please visit us soon!  Sincerely,  The Management

Summary: Newly remodeled, this hotel is a good deal for the price. Walking distance to Disneyland and you can see the Park's fireworks from the hotel pool.
Manager Response: Dear Cameron -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our hotel.  Please know that all comments are taken seriously and we do use them to improve the quality of our property.  We hope that you come stay with us every time you are in the area.   Come visit us soon!  Sincerely,  The Management

Summary: The room was recently renovated and huge. It is close to Disneyland (10-15 minutes by walk). They offer a free shuttle on specific hours, but we were unable to use the service either because the hours were not conveninent to us or it was always full. They should change the way the free shuttle works and have on demand shuttle to Disneyland and on specific hours return shuttle from Disneyland for people looking to use it. We were okay with walking but some people would find it far. The Wi-Fi was not working properly in our room since we were far in the back, but when outside, in front of the room, it was better. They offer free breakfast, which consist of basic continental but it is perfect for our needs. For the price we paid, we were more then happy and would go back anytime.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our hotel.  Please know that we welcome all of your comments and they will be taken seriously.  We are pleased to see that you were satisfied with your stay.  We will be renovating the breakfast room in the near future and hope that you will stay with us again to see the changes.    Please come visit us soon!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary Heading: The staff was vary helpful and friendly the room was clean...
Summary: The staff was vary helpful and friendly the room was clean and spacious the only thing is I wish they had better breakfast or more options other than that it's great
Manager Response: Dear Irene -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our hotel.    We are so pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay.  Please know that we are undertaking a full remodel of the breakfast area this spring.  We hope that you will return and enjoy the new facilities with us.    Please come stay with us any time you are in the area.  We hope to see you soon!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: The rooms were clean, spacious & comfortable.  The pool was heated (outside pool) warm enough for the kids to swim even though it was cloudy & "chilly" (for southern CA).  Front desk was friendly, helpful & knowledgeable.  Shuttle to Disney was available & convenient.
Manager Response: Dear Mary -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our hotel.  We really appreciate your comments which helps us know what we need to do to constantly improve our property.  We look forward to having you visit again and hope that every stay that you have at the Days Inn is exceptional.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: Old style hotel currently under refurbishment.  Staff were really great on arrival, hotel is at the rear of Denny's which handy.  Breakfast is basic but that's ok.  The pool could do with a refurb as well.  Would definiately stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Tony -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our hotel.  We appreciate all of your comments and hope you know that we take them all into consideration.  We are so pleased that you had a good experience at our property.  We ARE renovating everything right now, so we hope that you come back and stay with us again in the future.  We would love for you to see all of the improvements that we are making for our guests.  Come back soon!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: clean comfortable rooms quiet plenty of space bathroom worked well including shower one difficulty on check in we were assigened room 211 we get there and cant get in room after few knocks someone was inside room they told my son they were reassigned room cuz electricity went out in room they had the person that checked us in said is there a problem we said yes someone is asleep in that room already he checked his computer and said he was not aware someone moved there moved us to room 225 which is same size and had pullout bed as requested . also only other problem was their was not enough washc loths provided for bathing which was taken care of when  my wife talked with room service person from then on all was well day shift lady was fantastic courteous ansd she signed me up
Manager Response: Dear Jeff -  Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our hotel.  We sincerely appreciate feedback from our guests and please know that we take all information into consideration.    We are so please to see that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope that you will always be our guest when you and your family are in the area.  We look forward to seeing you soon.  Warmly, The Management

Summary Heading: Bend Over Backwards for my Family
Summary: Our weekend stay at the Days Inn Anaheim was the best experience we've had at the Anaheim hotels. We've been at the city five times and this one tops them all. Also My son left behind his laptop in the room after we checked out and the hotel staff gladly shipped it to us via UPS.
Manager Response: Dear Oscar -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn with your family and for taking the time to review our property.   We are so pleased that you had a great experience at our hotel and that your stay met all of your expectations.  We hope that you will always stay with us when you are in the area.  Come visit us soon! Sincerely, The Management

Summary: We have stated here several times and this year was the best..Rooms were upgraded from last time (tv, fridge, microwave)..This hotel is a good value to stay and the free shuttle service is great!
Manager Response: Dear Brian -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our hotel.    We are so pleased that you noticed and liked our renovation.  We always aim to improve you stay each time you come so we hope that you visit again.  It is guests like you that make it a pleasure to be in the industry.  Please come stay with us again soon.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: While we booked this hotel for the convenient location to Disney, several things were lacking. No conditioner was provided, odd. The password for the wifi was not provided in the room and I was put in hold with the front desk for 10 minutes then come to find out the connection was so slow I couldn't even check my email, useless. wasn't thrilled with the bedding or having my room right next to the stairs where we could hear screaming screaming children and other loud guests all night.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and taking the time to review our property.  We are sad to hear that your stay was not everything that you expected.  Usually we give the customers the wifi password with check-in, so we will be reminding our front desk people of this procedure so as to circumvent this happening to other guests.  Please know that we are always available at the front desk to address any issues that you have with your room, including the bedding.    We hope that you will come again and give us a chance to make your next stay with us nothing but exceptional.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary Heading: Great Value, 15 minute walk to park!
Summary: This place was great for my girlfriend and I to stay on Christmas night while at the Disneyland parks for the big day. It is only a 15 minute walk to the gates at a leisurely pace which is great considering it is noticeably cheaper in price than hotels with a 5-10 minute walk from the park. The beds are GREAT, so comfortable and the staff is super friendly. We especially appreciated Tanzina's efforts in making sure our stay was as pleasant as possible. My girlfriend and I were not planning on getting a room for the night, but decided we needed a nap in the early afternoon. The front desk said we could do an early check in of 2pm which was great and gave us tooth brushes and toothpaste since we came unprepared to stay the night. The complementary continental breakfast was way
Manager Response: Dear Brian -  Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our hotel.  We are so very please to hear your kind comments about our property and our staff.  We just finished a major renovation and it is so nice to hear that the guests are happy with the accommodations.  In addition, we love to hear guests that appreciate our hard-working staff.  We hope that you come stay with us again in the future whenever you are in the area.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: I had to ask twice for adequate towels.  Facility ran out of hot water in the AM.  Breakfast attendant was rude to a family member.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -  Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.    We are so sorry that your stay did not meet your every expectation.  We apologize for the towels and the hot water situation - the staff was trying the best it could to make sure that every guest request was attended to, and it seems yours was overlooked the first time.    We hope that you will give us another chance to address all of the issues that were not to your satisfaction and come stay with us again.  We are currently finishing a major renovation and hope that the results will please you if you come again.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: We had stayed here before, about 2 years ago, and had a positive experience. They've remodeled since then and the rooms are quite comfortable. I missed the lush tropical landscape, though. The heated pool is really nice, but the hot tub was not hot, so we didn't use it. I am not sure if they were aware at the front desk that the hot tub wasn't working. Their shuttle looked nice but we used Anaheim Resort Transit because you can ride that any time and there's a stop right in front of the Days Inn. All in all, this was another good experience and we'll probably stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Laura - Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We are pleased to hear that you were generally please with your stay here.  We are so sorry that the hot tub was not working properly during your stay and have had our on-site maintenance man address the issue already.  We hope that you will stay with us again and give us the chance to make sure that EVERYTHING is to your satisfaction during your next stay.    Sincerely, The Management

Summary Heading: great stay for a reasonable price near Disneyland
Summary: This was my first time staying in at a Wyndham property. The room was pretty much like it was told on the site. Spacious , clean and a great rate for a stay near Disneyland. They also have free shuttles all day long so you save on parking as well.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest - Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and thank you for taking the time to review our property.  We are pleased to hear that you had a highly satisfactory stay and that everything met your expectations.  We strive to make your stay pleasant and convenient at a very reasonable price.  We hope that you stay with us every time you stay in the area.  Please come visit us soon!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: Poor quality rooms bedspread was smelly and old! Floor carpet  needs cleaning, pillows are very small! Worst breakfast ever, very small room people waiting.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest - Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our property.  We are saddened to hear that you were not completely satisfied with your stay at our hotel.  We are in the midst of a major renovation encompassing not only the rooms, but the entire breakfast room as well.  We hope that you will come stay with us again and give us a chance to satisfy you in every aspect of your stay.    Sincerely, The Management

Summary: The hotel was serviceable. The room was nicer than I anticipated. But the breakfast was underwhelming and it was farther from Disney than we anticipated. The shuttle was small (10-12 seats) and ran infrequently, once an hour. We ended up walking to the park our first day because we didn't get a seat on the shuttle. Overall, average and pretty pricey for what you get.
Manager Response: Dear Brian - Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our hotel.  We are sorry that you did not find your stay completely satisfactory.  We are starting a renovation on our breakfast room and we hope that you come back to find it acceptable to your standards.  Please know as well that the shuttle will always pick up people that are not able to fit on at the time of departure, so no one needs to walk.  Please come back and stay with us again and give us a chance to meet your every need.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: This hotel is by far the best one in the area and location it's in. Right by Disneyland, clean, helpful. And Karin "hope i spelt that right" at the front desk is just amazing and very helpful. You can tell when someone wants or doesn't want to be at work. And she makes you feel like you're at home. Thanks everyone, and thank you quality inn!
Manager Response: Dear Tyler - Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and taking the time to review our property.  We are so pleased that you were satisfied with your stay here.  We are even happier to hear that you recognize the customer service on which we pride ourselves here at the Days Inn.  Customers like you make it worthwhile for the entire staff.    Please come stay with us again whenever you are in the area.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: Staff was great, location to Disneyland was great, shuttle service was great!  Definitely would stay here again!!
Manager Response: Dear Tanner - Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and for taking the time to review our hotel.  We are so pleased to hear that you had a great experience.  We really work hard to make sure that our staff is here to meet your every need, as is our shuttle and breakfast.  We hope to see you whenever you are in the area.  Please come visit us soon!!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: Can't say enough positives about this so I'll list -can see fireworks from disneyland. It's like they're above the hotel -8 minute walk to disneyland -rooms are big and super comfy  -updated rooms. Beds we're soft.  Sofa beds too in every room -staff provided a great breakfast each day. -5 minutes away from restaurants and snack  -pool and hot tub clean and open  late - Landry facilities available outside anytime -friendly helpful staff - put me and my friends family right beside one another - free parking -tv had movies available every night 4 free. Free shuttle to Disneyland  If you're looking for a close place to Disneyland that's nice and clean..  comfortable but affordable.  This is it. We will be back
Manager Response: Dear Sarah Rose - Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and taking the time to review our hotel.  We are so pleased to hear the nice things that you had to stay about our property - we strive to please our guests and it warms our heart to hear it when you are satisfied.  It is customers like you that make this industry so rewarding.  We hope to see you again whenever you are in the area.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: Very close to disneyland, but the customer service is absolutely horrible. The staff is rude and unapologetic. If at all possible, avoid this hotel at all costs. I will definitely look elsewhere when i come back
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -   Thank you for staying at the Days Inn and taking the time to review our property. We are so sorry that you had a bad experience with our service.  Please know that we strive to please our guests in every way and it seems as though we have failed to meet our own expectations.  We hope that you will come back and stay with us and allow us to show you that your feedback has made a difference.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: When we enter the room it was smell so bad and we get our own freshener we ask the house keeping for the freshener but we dont understand each other because they dont speak english only speak spanish . bed is not good the rest is ok.
Manager Response: Dear Joel - Thank you for staying at and then taking the time to review our hotel.  We are sorry that you feel that our room was not clean and fresh - that is not the Days Inn expectation that we have for ourselves.  Please stay with us the next time in the area and we assure you that we will meet all of your expectations or cleanliness.  We hope to see you soon.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: This Days Inn is so very well maintained and staffed. Our room had no odor (a common problem, I find.) Everything worked & was updated (USB outlets!) The bathroom was recently renovated, well lit & ventilated. I will be staying here next time! (Shuttle to the parks too)
Manager Response: Dear Dennis - Thank you for staying at and then taking the time to review our hotel.  We are please that you noticed and enjoyed our renovations.  We pride ourselves on trying to improve ourselves with each visit so we hope that you stay with us again.  We assure you that we will do our best to meet every need.    We hope to see you soon at the Days Inn.  Sincerely, Then Management

Summary: Everything was just fine for the most part. The room was average, having a shuttle to and from Disneyland was nice, but... coming back from the parks one night a pipe burst in the room next door and started leaking into our room and soaked our luggage and stuff on the floor. When I went to the lobby to tell a staff member, I realized that my call to the lobby wasn't being picked up because he was picking up the phone and dropping it back on the hook to hang up because he was with another customer. After explaining the situation with our room and asking to switch rooms, he said several times in a demeaningly condescending voice saying, "So you wanna check-out?" And then almost threatened me saying everywhere else in town is booked. After consulting with my family and friends to
Manager Response: Dear Cassie - Thank you for staying at and taking the time to review our hotel.  We are so sorry that you had a bad experience staying at our hotel.  Because of the flooding, we were trying our best to handle a stressful situation and it seems that we did a poor job of customer service at that time.   We pride ourselves on making our guests feel welcome and we hope that you will give us another chance to make you feel that your are our top priority.  Please come visit us again when you are in the area and we will show you that we appreciate your business.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary Heading: Only stay becasue of the location
Summary: Only stay at this place for the fact that its close to the Disneyland and they have a courtesy shuttle. Other than that nothing really stand out. Good luck asking for extra coffee or filter or condiments .. they said they dont have it. Terrible service!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Sandy - Thank you for staying at and taking the time to review our hotel.  We are so sorry that you had a bad experience getting your needs met here.  We hope that you will stay with us again so we can show you the great customer service that is the norm here at Days Inn.    Thank you, and have a great day! The Management

Summary: Located a half mile from Disneyland's entrance. If you want to walk, you can, or you can ride the provided shuttle. Keep in mind that the shuttle has very limited hours and is a van that accommodates about 13 guests, so it's small. Check in and out were both excellent. The room we had was spacious and clean. The beds were very comfortable. Breakfast was somewhat limited, but was kept well tended and the food was tasty.
Manager Response: Dear Tanya - Thank you for staying at and then taking the time to review our hotel.  We are happy to see that you were mostly pleased with your stay.  We pride ourselves on our service to our customers and hope that you will give us a chance to make sure that EVERYTHING is perfect the next time you stay with us.  Please come visit us soon at the Days Inn.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary Heading: My overall Hotel experience was good, in the future I will...
Summary: My overall Hotel experience was good, in the future I will probably not be using this Hotel though. My family and I were going to Disneyland, so we were hoping we could check in and then just go to Disneyland.  We got there around 11:30am and we were told check in was at 3:00pm this was a real bummer.  We ended up walking to Disneyland and then having to check in when we got back around 10:30pm  I'm not willing to do this again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -  Thank you for staying at and then taking the time to review our hotel.  We are pleased that your actual experience with the hotel was satisfactory, but saddened to hear that you were not happy with our check-in policy.  Please know that it is standard for hotels to check in at 3:00pm and some even have check-in at 4:00pm.  We hope that our hotel and our service will persuade you to come stay with us again the next time that you are in the area.  Sincerely, The Managment

Summary: This place was recently remodeled. The hotel staff was very friendly. And it's only .5 miles from disneyland
Manager Response: Dear Jerry - Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  We are pleased that you noticed our recent renovations; please know that we have plans to improve the Days Inn more before we are finished.  We look forward to your next visit and hope we can continue to meet your expectations.  Sincerely,  The Management

Summary: My wife and I, had a reservation at motel 6 but apparently we are banned from the location, for complaining about customer service too much, but we found this motel at the last minute, and I am very pleased that we did. All of the amenities that came with it, as well as walking distance to the park entrance, you couldn't get any better than that. We will definitely be back, and sending plenty of people your way! Thank you:)
Manager Response: Dear Brandon - Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  We are pleased to hear that you were satisfied with all of the amenities that we had to offer.  We try to make our guests' stays as comfortable as possible and we are thrilled to read your positive review.  Please visit us again soon when you are in the area.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: Nice, quiet hotel within reasonable walking distance of Disneyland. Great breakfast, shuttle available, free parking. Wifi connection would drop out and come back from time to time, but was reasonably fast when it was connected. Good value overall.
Manager Response: Dear Steve - Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  We are always looking for things that we can work on to improve your experience.  We will be sure to check our Wi-Fi connection to see what we can do to make it more consistent.  We look forward to having you stay in the Days Inn again in the future.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: The hotel was close to Disney and the price was good.  It was walkable to Disneyland, but took about 15 minutes.  They have a shuttle that runs once an hour to and from, which was nice!  The other good things:  Parking was free, the hotel was clean, the beds were comfy.  There was a breakfast that left some things to be desired, but there was cereal, some oatmeal packets, bread for toasting, and some soggy waffles.  The photo on the website depicted a much better breakfast.  If you are a light sleeper, the walls are pretty thin.  We could pretty easily hear the kids next door melting down (long days at Disneyland will get ya!), but we were all pretty deep sleepers, so it didn't bother us.  The ice machine was also broken, but again, that's something we were able to work with.
Manager Response: Dear Brittany - Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  We are always looking for things to work on to improve your experience with us.  We are going to be remodeling our breakfast room in the near future and hope that it will meet your expectations next time that you come.  Please come stay with us again after the remodel and see what we will have done to improve your experience.    We look forward to serving you again. Sincerely, The Management

Summary: Arrived to hotel at 1pm on a Thursday after a long drive. Parking lot was empty. Asked if I could check in early as we were going straight to Disneyland. Staff said no. There had to be rooms available. Also shuttle hours were horrible! Ok in the AM but evening hours didn't work for us. Too far to walk both ways. Ended up using Uber about 4 times.
Manager Response: Dear Carrie - Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  We are always looking for ways to improve our service and meet our guests' expectations.  We are sorry that you were not able to check in early.  We try to accommodate guest requests for early check in when possible, but often the cleaning staff has not yet finished with the rooms.  Our shuttle hours were designed to make transportation easier for our guests; we are sorry that they did not work that way for you.  We would love the opportunity to have another chance to meet your expectations and hope that you would stay with us again.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: Great and fun stay! Family thoroughly enjoyed our room. Comfortable and clean beds, great couch, USB ports a plenty. Continental breakfast was great. Hotel staff was very pleasant and accommodating. Will be staying at this hotel every time we visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Customer -  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  We are so pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Please know that we are always working on improving our services so that you can always look forward to a great experience at the Days Inn.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: This is a very nice hotel to stay at, it very close to Disneyland and they drop &  pick you up. Makes it nice that you don't have to pay for parking.
Manager Response: Hi Gwenp809 -   Thank you very much for taking the time to review our motel.  We are pleased to hear that you had a great experience here at Days Inn.  Our shuttle is provided to make things easier and more cost effective for our guests and we are happy to see that it helped your party in that way.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in the area.  Sincerely, Eugenia

Summary: Great location. Spacious and comfortable guestroom. Toilet had issues flushing and maintenance never showed up to fix it. Breakfast was lacking. There was no eggs or any other protein just waffles, toast and cereal. And they made the waffles one at a time.
Manager Response: Dear Jessica - Thank you for taking the time to review our motel on Tripadvisor.  We are happy to hear that you were comfortable in your room and that it was convenient for you to get around.  We apologize if you found our breakfast to not be adequate.  We will be renovating the entire breakfast area in the near future and hope to be able to improve on what we offer.  Please visit us again soon and give us a chance to meet your expectations.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary Heading: Super conveniently close Hotel to Disneyland. No seriously I think the walk from the Disney parking lot is further away.
Summary: We stayed in a King size room and it was super spacious.  It had a great couch to sit on and it was very relaxing. The bathroom was a good size and had great water pressure. The bed and pillows were ideal for a tired body, no seriously I didn't want to check out I was so comfortable. The only negative was that I wish the TV was perhaps bigger and not weird channels but it was a minor issue.   The channels had like dots in the number so it was annoying trying to go to the channel that I wanted. For example, TLC was like 64.67 so I had to go to type 64 on the control and go up until it hit the .67. This was only a problem because I couldn't use the previous/last feature on the remote.   The breakfast selection was decent. We got there close to the end of breakfast and I still had
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest - Thank you for taking time to review our motel.  We are pleased that you were pleased with your stay at our Days Inn.  We are constantly working to make things better so the next time you return your stay will be even better.    Sincerely, The Management

Summary: When I asked about the shuttle service I was  laugh at in my face because I thought the shuttle was more frequent when I told them that I was handicapped and I requested a later pick up time they said they could not accommodate although during my stay I only saw about three other vehicles and I never saw one person on the shuttle I really do think that they were just trying to save costs and not use it at all it was a real bummer
Manager Response: Dear Ms. Copp - Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  I am sorry to hear that you had a bad experience with the shuttle that we provide for our guests.  We try to provide the shuttle to make it easier for the guests to access Disneyland and it seems that we did not meet that goal in your case.  We are always striving to improve our performance and meet guest expectations.  We hope that you will give us another opportunity to better your experience the next time you are in the area.    Sincerely, The Management

Summary Heading: Nice hotel and won't break the budget
Summary: The room was spacious and clean. The front desk attendant was not overly friendly but wasn't rude either. For the $ it was a nice room
Manager Response: none

Summary: The breakfast was not breakfast, there was only white bread and cereal. The containers for the bacon/sausage were empty. The employee stood behind the counter, with no anticipation to refill what was already empty.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very close too our destination could have walk but they had a free shuttle and it was on time and very nice drivers aloha
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice updated rooms. Terrible customer service!  No ELEVATORS! Terrible Parking!
Summary: Being a Disney annual pass holder we usual decided to go last minute and we always arrive in the wee hours of the morning due to traveling with our 1yr old and having an 8hr drive to get there. I called the same day I booked this room to confirm that it was ok to arrive between 2-4am depending on traffic and stops with the baby. They insured me it would be no problem and my room would be there waiting since we paid for the night before we would be checking in. I then called the day of to check in at 7pm as we were on the road headed to LA to confirm whoever was working the night shift knew we were still coming and to confirm our late check in again. The women said it was no problem she saw the note and she would even charge my credit card for the first night so that the room
Manager Response: Hello Ms. Hibbard -   Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to offer feedback.  We apologize for your poor experience at check-in.  We can only imagine how upset your were when you were kept waiting in the cold at that late hour.  We strive to meet guest preferences whenever they have expressed and we obviously did not rise to your or our own expectations.  We have since talked to the front desk clerks involved and emphasized the need to expedite things for our guests, especially at that hour.    Please know that we will continue to work on our communication between front desk clerks and on our customer service as we go forward.  We hope that you will give us a chance to prove that we are able to improve the things that we lacking during your last visit.  Best regards, Management at Days Inn

Summary: This hotel is basic bed is nice and firm,  breakfast is simple, WiFi connection was choppy.  I think it was good value overall.  The rooms could use a refresh as everything was a little worn.  We only slept here so it was not a problem.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was close by Disneyland which was nice. It offered complimentary breakfast but the seating area was small. A shuttle is also offered, but keep in mind it's like a mini van bus that doesn't hold a lot of people. So take into account the wait time for the "shuttle." Overall, it wasn't bad for the price you pay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great housekeeping service! Great location! Nice parking space! Just wished that the curtains offered some darkening inside the room
Manager Response: none

Summary: The shuttle service was limited in the morning and evening and not much in between.  Their vending machine wasn't kept stocked so it was empty for water.  The key card kept losing ability to open the door.  I wan't aware of the continental breakfast until arrival and not given the internet information until the next day when I asked.  Granted we checked in later in the evening because there was no shuttle from Disneyland after am drop offs and later in evening to be able to return without walking the 15-20" back to Days Inn.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great for our Family trip to Disneyland
Summary: This hotel was just right for our family of 6 needing 2 rooms. Not fancy but in our budget. Included a simple continental breakfast with 4-6 cereals, yogurt, bread to toast & waffles pre made by an attendant so you don't have to wait for people to figure out how to make them. Pool was heated & open in November. Shuttle ran AM & PM, just not all day, but sometimes an afternoon run. Staff was very helpful & friendly. No complaints, just not a fancy place but right price. Next door to Shakey's Pizza, less than a mile from Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room was clean with comfortable beds for 4 adults. It was convenient with a shuttle to/from Disneyland. The free breakfast was ok but no meat or eggs. Customer service was very good. The hotel manager met us at check-in and staff was very helpful. I would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Expected 3 star rating, no real issues
Summary: I stayed 1 night in a 2 queen bed unit. The unit was OK for an overnight visit. Due to high turnover I wasn't expecting much by the way of the unit. Luckily the linens and bedding was comfortable. Room was relatively clean except for stains on the sofa from obvious gest spills. The bathroom us fine except I am not a fan of bathroom doors having small louvre openings on them. Parking is kind of tight if you have more than 1 vehicle. There was also a complimentary continental breakfast with cereal, bread, etc which I didn't try. I wanted something a little more substantial for breakfast. Plenty of restaurants and shopping nearby. The location and proximity to Disney can't be beat. There is no charge for parking and you could walk to disney.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Come for 3 nights for disneyland, there is a complementary shuttle and a short walk to the park, however, the beds were uncomfortable leaving a restless night sleep. The breakfast is very minimal. I am lactose and tolerate and they had nothing to accomidate those. Also it is 1 car per room so my friend who was staying with me had to park in a restraint parking lot hoping to not get her car towed. They would not accommodate her. Absolutely rude! Very disappointed.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel was neat and clean and the staff helpful.  I also like that the park is only  about 1/2 a mile away and they provide a free shuttle. The breakfast has a few items cereal, toast, waffles, yogurt
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great hotel with nice amenities. Not a bad walk to and from the park and they have a shuttle available for free too. Continental breakfast was nice and the pool was great too! I was very pleasantly surprised by the rooms. This will definitely be a place we stay at in our future travels to Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We enjoyed our stay!!!  The room was clean and updated!!!  The breakfast was good--we really liked the nice breakfast lady--she kept the area clean and supplied!!!  The hotel is .7 miles from the entrance to Disneyland--I would drop my family off and then walk back to the park.  Everything went smooth and we had a good time!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Our room had cockroaches, for which the hotel manager blamed me. The room where the continental breakfast was held was d
Summary: Absolutely the worst hotel experience ever. I will not only never recommended this hotel,but will warn all of my family and friends to stay away. I have contacted the health department to inspect this filthy facility.

Summary: Stayed at this place about two years ago and told myself I'd never go back. But since I'm a Wyndham owner and this is a family group hotel, I thought perhaps it's gotten better. Well, I was pleasantly surprised and rewarded with a great, affordable stay. The upgrades are very nice and proximity to Disneyland is so worth it.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Scheduled a visit from Oct 26-30th. When we arrived, the counter clerk "AJ" told us our cards declined. Two cards declined seemed funny. He suggested we canceled our stay. The way he said it was like we were lacking income. We went to the Welsfargo to grab all cash with a $100 deposit we were forced to deposit EVERYTHOUGH our cards held pending transactions for Days Inn. When we got in the room it looked like a hot mess. My bed had footprints on the bed still. We took pictures of everything. Showed AJ as well. Went to Disneyland and found out WE HAD ROACHES IN THE ROOM. We exchanged the rooms.  Outside of all that everyone else was nice. The breakfast is probably the worst of all the hotels I've ever stayed at.  Days inn in Anaheim isn't on my list of hotels to stay at again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Room was clean. Beds were excellent. Shuttle to Disneyland was perfect. Overall great place. Pool looked nice but we had no time to swim.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Surprised how nice it was for the price. Brought our grandkids for the weekend to Disneyland. Pool was nice. They had a blast. Not too much choices for breakfast  but we're not big breakfast eaters so it was perfect. The room was large and very clean. Everyone was very friendly. They have a shuttle to Disneyland but we just drove ourselves. There's a Shakeys Pizza bright next door. Would stay here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was a very nice clean Motel. The staff except one person was very friendly.A good place to stay for the dollar
Manager Response: none

Summary: Days Inn & Suites Anaheim at Disneyland Park is a nice place for the money to stay while at Disneyland close within walking distance and they provide a free shuttle to and from Disneyland. The room had 2 queen beds and the fridge kept everything cold and the microwave was a plus. Big plus was watching the Disney fireworks from the parking lot a  it was clean and updated, in the morning there is free breakfast and coffee.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good place to sleep near Disneyland
Summary: We were in town for a wedding at the Disneyland hotel. We booked a double room and it was clean and updated.  Two queen beds. A couch that could double as a toddler bed and still room for a pack and play for the baby. The fridge kept everything cold and the microwave was a plus. Big plus was watching the Disney fireworks from the parking lot
Manager Response: none

Summary: Well, for starters the free shuttle that was suppose to go to Disneyland that was suppose to arrive to the front of the hotel arrive 15+ min past the expected 7:40 a.m. pick up that was listed on the paper I received when checked. After having waited over 15 min., there was no room for me and my cousin. So not only did we wait, but we ended up having to walk to the park because the van was filled. I wouldn't be so bitter about this had we not waited so long for the van. Also, I don't think I've ever been to a hotel where you can't print boarding passes. Overall, the hotel room was clean and I have no complaints about the room, but the additional service was cheap and could have been much better.

Summary: The facility was obviously receiving some upgrades, and it showed the care that the staff had for those who came to the facility.  We felt that the money we spent was well worth it.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Ants invaded our room during this stay. We told the front office and they offered us 20% of our next stay. Why would you want to come back to room with the ants?
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed for our disneyland trip. Decent hotel for the price and they are still remodeling to improve, which is good. Walking distance to Disney which saves on parking fees. Only issue I had was the breakfast was a bit lame and the lady working it wasn't the most friendly or the best personality. But overall good stay and would recommend to others.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel 5 times this year, we are season pass holders to Disneyland, and love the conscience of this hotel, but the last time we went we were checking in late (3am) and the man working had the worst customer service I've ever experienced. He takes to me so rude & had a attitude the entire time.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Decent, clean room at an affordable pricing. Room looked recently remodeled and clean. Kids enjoyed the pool and were able to watch the fireworks show from the pool. Great price and included several amenities that other hotel chains charge extra for. Will definitely come back here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I almost always stay at Days Inn Harbor when I visit Anaheim 4-6 times a year. It is a convenient walk to Disneyland, free breakfast, I feel very safe, and the staff treats me like family - always remembers me! This is the best bargain for your money if you are visiting Disneyland - plus with the recent renovations, it can't be beat. HUGE rooms. ALL the amenities - fridge, microwave, pool - I have stayed here frequently over the last four years and they always strive to improve. Minor problems from time to time have ALWAYS been solved in a timely manner, courteously and kindly. It's not luxurious but more than adequate, worth every penny for the price. A solid bargain. Totally recommend.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Enjoyable stay, went for a wedding anniversary. Staff at the front desk really friendly. Shuttle driver not friendly and rude. Breakfast is pitiful. Overall a good stay. Would recommend hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had a late check in and the front desk was very polite in saving a room for us as i had called to let him know i wouldnt be checking in until almost midnight. The hotel was about a 15 minute walk from disneyland which was awesome since we were just going to the mickeys halloween party. We didnt try the continental breakfast. The room was very clean. Parking was a bit tight, so i wouldnt recommend moving your car in the evening. Overall i would stay here again for the great price.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Good price.  Comfortable rooms. Clean.  Very close to park.  We walked everyday.  Breakfast really should be called a snack.  No eggs?  No breakfast.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The front desk rep. was very friendly and so was their shuttle drivers to and from Disney. The room was very clean the pool and hut tub was very clean. Breakfast was great and the attendant serving in the breakfast room was very nice and friendly. The breakfast room was clean as well. I will definitely stay here in the future.
Manager Response: none

Summary: As annual pass holders at Disneyland, this has become one of our go-to hotels to stay at in the area. Clean rooms, nice (heated) pool and jacuzzi, super close to Disney. The only complaint we have is their breakfast opens too late for us to utilize because we like to be in Disneyland at the opening rope drop. If we stay to eat breakfast at the hotel, we would miss it. If you're not Disney nerds like us, you shouldn't have a problem.

Summary Heading: Not the best but ok if you spend al day at Disneyland!
Summary: This place was ok for the price compared to everything else around Disney however it is very run down and out of date. It was as clean as it could be however it has a lot of wear and tear. The customer service wasn't overly helpful, gave the answers when asked but weren't really approachable. The wifi was also slow and just didn't work at all sometimes.   Best thing was that there was a bus stop straight out the front that took you right to the front door of Disneyland.   The noise was also loud with the air con and being right next door to a fast food  place. Next time I would pay the little extra and stay somewhere else!
Manager Response: none

Summary: your property is very clean . employees very friendly and helpful . parking was a problem because other cars were parked in two spaces . we had a comfortable stay.

Summary: Short trip to Disney, great location, great price! Clean room and super comfortable bed. Needs better parking options!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I loved my stay here @ Days inn & suites Anaheim at Disneyland clean and modern, my girls loved the mickey mouse pool great stay and will be staying there again
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Reasonably priced and close to Disney
Summary: My husband, 6 year old son and I stayed here from Oct 2-4.  We were originally booked at Best Western Pavilions but changed reservation when we found this hotel for $40 cheaper with similar amenities.  The heated pool and hot tub were nice after a long day at Disney.  The shuttle was nice although be aware that the hours are limited. (does not run between 11:30-5:30, 5:30-8:30) The rooms were spacious and it was nice having a microwave and refrigerator.  My only complaint is that the air conditioner was noisy and it took a long time for it to cool properly.  Overall, we had a good stay and would stay here again.

Summary: This place had a very bad customer service. A rep that didn't know what she was doing at front desk and charged me $30 more than what my rate said. She wanted me to leave without any confirmation of the problem being solved and she was extremely rude!!!!!! Never staying here again.

Summary: This hotel is not at all set up for wheelchairs or scooters. Their shuttle has no way of getting you to Disneyland you have to wheel it up and over and over pass, in order to get to Disneyland. The people were very friendly. I just wouldn't choose to stay here again.

Summary: I reserved my room for $140 tax included then when I checked in I was charged $187. In addition the tv would not turn on.

The room was nice size and I was happy with it and noticed it was updated since the last time I stayed there a few years ago. The air conditioner was not working so I called the front desk and was told they would have

Summary: Great stay! Affordable, it has a shuttle to the parks, front desk representatives were very attentive, rooms were nice spacious and comfortable I will definitely come back again!!!!

Summary Heading: Basic Accomodations for a Disney Trip
Summary: No complaints.  I would not want to live at this Days Inn, but for a trip where all my waking time was spent at Disneyland, it was inexpensive and perfect.  Pool is heated and shaped like Mickey's head.  AND you can see Disneyland's fireworks from the pool.  Breakfast is provided in a room above the office.  But if you eat gluten free you are mostly out of luck.  Hotel is within walking distance of Disneyland.  Be warned that you need to cross a very busy Ball Road and the entrance and exit ramps to I-5.  But there are crosswalks.  Would definitely stay here again.

Summary: Great stay put the wifi didnt work all well and also the remot control of the tv, sometimes change Channel

Summary: Remodeling was great because we stay there everyone our family goes to Disney . Rates are great

Summary Heading: Great location to stay for Disneyland
Summary: Great place to stay when going to Disneyland.  Free parking, Free shuttle, and walking distance if you don't want to wait for hotel shuttle. Not too thrilled about breakfast.  Usually you can make your own waffle but they make them and they sit and not too good.  Otherwise it's very basic.  Small parking lot

Summary: Was a great location! Hotel was nice! However shuttle services stopping for several hours midday was not helpful.

Summary: I really like how close this place is to Disneyland, and the shuttle service you guys provide. I also really appreciate that I was allowed to leave my car there even though I was already checked out. However, there was no conditioner for after I shampooed my hair.

Summary: Good value given the price and proximity to Disneyland. I was previously staying at Extended Stay. Beds were much more comfortable at Days Inn. However when we got there the office was closed, all of the lights were turned off and there was no One who works there to check us in. We knocked on the windows and door and after about 45
Manager Response: im aware about your situation your reservation was a non-guaranteed reservation on a sold out night, that's why your reservation was canceled. we did try to contact you and sent email notification to provide us a credit card so we could authorize at least the first night to avoid cancellation but we had no response, therefore we had no liability to keep the reservation. fortunately are agent kept a room aside and we were able to accommodate you on your stay. yes to assure the safety of our staff we do close our main doors at 1am and operate through a windows on the side of the hotel. The air conditions had towels under them to collect the water leaking from them outside of the majority of the rooms.

Summary: Worst experience of my life. I arrived at hotel 2am. The person was sleeping. I waited for over 3 hrs with my family in a different city. Had to book a another hotel. Internet would drop off every once in a while but just went to lobby to reconnect.   The walk was about 15 minutes. Our girls were 7, 8 and 11 and had no problems. Summary Heading: Huge inconvenience no hot water for a day 1/2

When I asked for a compensation I was told only 10% was allowed which is highly insulting! Being a service member / dependent. The cost of the room were pricey to begin with which we had no problem paying but to have to endure 2 separate occasions where cleanliness and personal hygeines is preventable is not acceptable.
Manager Response: i do apologize for the inconvenience we are making some changes and improvements to assure the best experience possible. unfortunately i did not find any other reports about the same issue. therefore it seems to be isolated, so i'll be looking into what caused this issue.

Summary: The rooms were fine, the staff courteous.  But, the shuttle is a disaster. The driver was always late. We rode the shuttle six time and not once was he on time. The driver(s) let people stand and sit on the floor. Which is against California state law.
Manager Response: Thank you its a pleasure to hear you enjoy your stay our team works hard to achieve the highest standard and i do understand your concerns about our shuttle we are in the process of making some changes but at this point its a free limited shuttle.

Summary: The room was great, loved that it was newly remodeled. The decor was beautiful. My only problem because they had remodeled we only had one light in the room over the table and the bathroom light. Low level light does not work well for me, couldn't read anything on the far side of the room. I asked the front desk for a lamp to put between the beds he said he'd check on it and that was the end of that. I spent two weeks in low light almost dark.
Manager Response: thanks for the feedback we are still trying to tweak and assess all the modifications but im glad you enjoyed you're stay

Summary: All OK but shower, shower lacks foot traction and/or grab bar.  My wife slipped and fell because of this.
Manager Response: i don't seem to have any reports about the incident but thank you for bringing this to my attention, ill be looking into what we can do to avoid issues like these. my apologies to your wife and hope she's OK.

Summary: Enjoyed my stay. Hotel room was clean and close to Disney land.  The shuttle to Disney land was perfect.

Summary: asked for a rollaway bed and did not get it. was not told of limited availability. breakfast room had syrup spills on carpet. sticky feet. realize it is a very high volume motel so close to Disneyland, but still not nearly as pleasant as other Days Inns.

Summary: This property did not have enough hot water when my family and I tried to take a shower in the morning. My husband took a shower first, it only got like warm. My shower was hot. But then my son took a shower and it was cold. Did not Mage for a great start to our morning.
Manager Response: i do apologize for the inconvenience we have been working hard on making modifications on some parts of our hotel this could have caused the issue.

Summary: The room was decent however the front desk staff was not friendly. We showed up early to see when check in was prior to going to Disneyland and the desk staff pointed at a sign and shooed us away. After midnight, our toilet began having problems. It would not flush on command but instead would stop and go. Because it was so late at night we did not contact the staff assuming maintenance would be gone, checking out early the next morning we informed the person and she was saying we should of reported it immediately and may be responsible for charges. We explained it was after midnight and where unaware that was an option nor did we use the toilet and she just rambled and said okay we'll see. I understand hotels can hike up their prices due to their location to Disneyland, however
Manager Response: im glad you enjoyed the room and want to thank you for submitting you're feedback ill be addressing this to our staff and making the appropriate assessment to this matter please accept my apologies inconvenience you had on check-out.

Summary: Air conditioning did not cool, front desk receptionist switched our room without any fuss,  which was great. We had a great view of the Disney fireworks,  loved that! Overall, was a comfortable stay.
Manager Response: well thank you for taking time from youre busy day and submitting you're feedback im happy you enjoyed youre stay with us. yes at this point we offer a continental breakfast, a simple breakfast to start you're day. We are thinking of expanding our breakfast in the near future. im sure you'll enjoy the new changes.

I called again and as the guy was telling me to hold I interrupted to tell him about the guy at the door. Initially, he said...yeah and i'm busy with a line of people in here...but he then told me not to open the door and he would check it out. It's also a bit annoying that reservations at 1800 days inn won't honor an online price and they give you a much higher quote. It depends who you get. Summary Heading: Updated comfortable rooms, clean heated pool, nice breakfast
Summary: We moved to this hotel after a poor experience at Ramada West.  This hotel is about a 10 minute walk to Disneyland main gate - or a quick bus trip. There was a free shuttle to and from Disney, but it did not travel mid-day. The rooms were just renovated with new paint, beds, and bedding.  There was a bar fridge and microwave in the room. We were very comfortable here.  The pool was clean and WARM, unlike many around here who have unheated pools.  The breakfast room was large, with a reasonable selection and quantity of food.  Staff were pleasant and helpful and workers doing renovations never bothered us.  We could see the fireworks from Disney in the parking lot. This was a good place to stay.

Room key failed every single time trying to get into room. EVERY single time !! Kept it in separate pocket away from batteries, other cards, cell phone, made no difference. Went to front desk to ask about nearby car rentals and girl at front desk seemed annoyed I was bothering her. She said one was closed so I asked if she could look up any other ones. She did and started to give me a phone number. I said it will cost me to call as I am not from US. I asked if
Manager Response: none

Summary: Rooms were nicely redone. Shuttle was nice but has a big break in between pick ups that were inconvenient. You cant check in until 3pm and you cant get shuttle until 5:30pm. Had a handicap room that did not have a handicap shower. Regular tub shower without and bars in place to get in and out of tub.

Summary: The room was very nice,  the beds very comfortable, we had a very nice stay even with construction going on.

Summary Heading: Room was decent, served its purpose. There were sitting...
Summary: Room was decent, served its purpose. There were sitting chairs in room that clearly needed to be replaced. The shuttle to and from the park made up for it. And the parking was bad, half of hotel is under construction so half the parking is blocked off.

Summary Heading: Hard beds and no eggs,hash browns or sausage for breakfast.

Summary: This hotel is the only place my family and I stay when we go to Disneyland. It is literally across the highway from the park and the free shuttle service from the hotel to the park is very convenient. I also enjoy being able to see the Disney fireworks show from my hotel room when I do not stay in the park until then. It is a mid-range, family hotel and you should not expect anything other than that. The rooms are clean, bathrooms well stocked, free breakfast, and free park shuttle. All combined a lot of bang for your buck.

Summary: The hotel is undergoing renovations big time. The room description listed safes, but no safe in the room, I asked the front desk and they said they may not have installed them yet. Our parents room was handicap accessible, but they didn't have any safety bars in the shower to help them and they didn't have a safe in their room either. The new carpet was nice so no black feet. For the free breakfast, they got rid of the yucky scrabbled egg with cheese whiz and replaced it with a waffle, but they make it for you. Wish they had fruit other than apples, maybe bananas. Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good service and clean rooms! Undergoing renovations.

Summary Heading: Great price and down to earth good people

Summary: The location of this hotel is great! Close to Disneyland. You can walk if u choose to. Only thing I didn't like was that it was VERY noisy. I had an event the next morning and left my kids with family. Stayed here with the intention of getting a better night sleep and it was worse. I only got 2 hours if that because the people upstairs were up until past 2am. The guy at the front desk was annoyed when checking people in and annoyed when I asked questions about the area and how to get to my event. Overall, I felt this was one of the worst experiences in a hotel and I've stayed in worse looking places.

Summary Heading: In dire need of cleaning and updating

The breakfast was about what you would expect from a dirt-cheap motel, with overripe fruit, yogurt cups and dry cereal.  There was one employee in the breakfast area to stock everything and run the waffle iron for guests (no DIY).  There probably should

Summary: The days inn is a nice hotel to stay at and its not to far from the Disneyland park. I like how at night you can watch the fire works go off while you stand in the parking lot motel.

Summary: I have stayed at this place before and the shuttle bus ran multiple times. Unfortunately this time the shuttle to Disneyland only ran a few times a day, and no times in the middle of the day so you could go back to your room and rest after being at the park all day.  This I think should be advertised on the site because I would have spent the extra I had to pay to take cabs back and fourth on a hotel with proper shuttle service.

Summary: We've stayed at this hotel twice now. Once in a mini suite and this time in a regular room. Both times the hotel has met our expectations.the rooms are clean and the beds are comfortable. The hotel staff is very friendly. There isn't any early check in but if you get there early they will let you park there and take their free shuttle to the parks. If you get there to late for the shuttle it's less than a 10 min walk to disneyland from the hotel. Breakfast at this hotel was good. It included fruit, waffles,oatmeal, yogurt, cinnamon toast and several drink choices. Overall, for the price and proximity to the parks, good luck finding a better deal than this. My family plans on staying again soon.

Summary: For the most part it was a good hotel the only negative thing is there free shuttle it doesnt run all the time it runs from 7:40am  - 10:30am and then again at 5:00pm - 5:30pm  and then 8:30pm - closing of the park,  so we walked which it took us 10 minutes, the parking is alittle small, they do have a continental breakfast but we never ate there,

Summary: Room was clean, you get what you pay for. Next to Disneyland which is great. Bathroom tub flooded easily-drain might have been old. You can tell hotel is definitely outdated, but it was decent. Don't expect Vegas style hotel.

Summary: They are in the process of renovations, but the hotel as my 7 year old put it the next day when we moved on to a new hotel, "Please don't make us stay at a yucky hotel again." We didn't bother calling the front desk as we got into our hotel late from Disney New Year's Eve and all of the kids were tired so we just snuggled into the beds and made it work. Overall I would not hesitate to stay here again,  but if you are looking for a 5 star hotel this is not the place.

Summary Heading: It felt like a rat hole

Summary: Love this hotel, my wife and I always stay here when we go to Disneyland! Everyone that works here is very nice and the rooms are simple and comfortable. I have never had any cleanliness problems at all!

Summary: Unfortunately this hotel has gone seriously downhill. I stayed here four years ago and it was an okay hotel - today it is terrible!! The staff is completely unhelpful if a problem arises - when you find "friends" in your hotel room (and yes I mean of the bug variety), you are on your own. I'd recommend bringing bug spray and save yourself the hassle of dealing with people who cannot handle anything other than taking payment info. If you want to count on the shuttle - don't. It is never there except after the park has already opened or if you want to skip the nighttime fireworks shows. The walk to the parks is short, so that is definitely your better option and the best benefit of this hotel. But with so many choices nearby, I would recommend visiting ANY other hotel - this one

The alarm clock made random noises--I think it was picking up transmissions from the cell phone in the next room due to improper shielding. The toilet leaked, and it looks like they have tried to fix that before.

Summary Heading: The hotel was adequate but we were disappointed that the...

Summary: Clean and spacious room,shuttle to disneyland,free parking and free breakfast all in budget price!exactly  what we needed!

Summary: The only small problem we had was that the shuttle had very inconvenient times to Disneyland. The hotel is old, but they have worked to keep it from being run-down. If you're observant, you can see where they've caulked and re-caulked and painted over immature patrons' handiwork. Manager Response: none

Summary: I chose this hotel because I was going to be going to Disneyland on vacation on a budget with kids. In 10 minutes we were at the hotel changing to get ready to go in the heated outdoor pool and relax. The hotel was almost fully booked, yet we would float in the pool or relax in spa while watching the fireworks with hardly anybody else there. I would really recommend this hotel.

Summary: For the price this is an excellent deal! Older building however remodeled and clean, comfortable beds, mini fridge, microwave, nice towels and personal care products. It is a 1/2 mile walk to the park over a freeway overpass which is a nice warm up since you'll most likely put in 10 miles a day anyway but we did take the complimentary shuttle a few times that has LIMITED morning and evening pick up and drop off times. Nearby mini marts for water and snacks plus a pizza place next door. Did not use the pool.

Summary: Our room was clean and personnel was friendly. Towels are rough on the body- not for sensitive skin. The shuttle service is very limited and not available during much of the day. The lobby was being redecorated (I witnessed the new furniture being delivered) so it was bare and the guest computer was non-functioning.  Breakfast was better than I expected (waffle maker being operated by hotel staff person, yogurt, apples, bananas and then the usual continental spread). The only hiccup was we needed to
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we are happy to know that our hotel exceeded your expectations  and yes on special events during and after a convention weekend can cause taxi delay's throughout the city. but I'm glad you have a great stay overall. Summary: Driving down to LA Thursday I knew we would be checking in late.  I attempted to call three times to advise of our late arrival.  Twice I was placed in hold and finally hung up after over 25 minutes on hold.  The third time I finally made it through and advised we would be late.  Upon arrival, check-in was seemless.  When we entered the room the first thing we noticed was that the slide lock was broken.  This is unacceptable no matter what.  The next day our room was not cleaned.  We did not have the privacy notice up.  On the second day, our room was cleaned but no new towels were provided.  We had only one and the bed wasn't made....  I have stayed at this property four times and the others were far superior to this one.  At this point I am not sure if I would do so again.  My

Summary Heading: Not a five star resort but served its purpose
Summary: This was not the Marriott nor was it the grand Californian. But this inn was clean, close to Disney parks parking lots, food, gas, and most importantly QUIET! For a hotel that was virtually packed full the walls were wonderfully sound proof. Comfortable beds and clean sheets and good pillows. The shower was a big grungy but it's old, it's expected. Perks were a microwave and fridge plus laundry very easily accessible. Free breakfast saved us a good chunk of money. Overall would stay here again.
Manager Response: We appreciate the five star review after your recent stay with us at Days Inn and are delighted to know that your room, recent updates and amenities all met your standards and that you will be returning again soon.

Summary: Horrid establishment. This was booked by a family member while we were to be in town for a convention. The whole place looks like the foundation is about to break beneath your feet. The door doesn't seal completely closed, light actually shines through where it should have a seal. The air conditioner is louder than a generator. There are holes in the bathroom wall where they moved a towel rack but the holes were never repaired and it just looks tragic and distasteful. Oh and a personal favorite... The black mold on the upper walls above the shower and a shower curtain that had mildew. We left our do by disturb tag out on our handle when we left in
Manager Response: I'm very sorry to hear we fell short of meeting your expectations during your stay with us.  We do guarantee each of our guest 1 parking space, also we do not charge for parking like other hotels do. But unfortunately our parking lot is limited, we cannot accommodate additional vehicles in our property. I do apologize for any confusion or inconvenience this has cause you. We take our guests’ comments and concerns very seriously. We are in process of renovation and will make sure management is aware of these issues.

Summary Heading: Beds were very comfortable.  Rooms were clean and had...
Summary: Beds were very comfortable.  Rooms were clean and had plenty of room. The service was great. It was close to Disneyland. I will definitely stay here again.

Summary: I don't have any complaints. My friends and I didn't spend much time at the hotel but the moments we were there it was clean and enjoyable.

Summary Heading: Will never stay in Days Inn again!
Summary: We stayed in this motel twice, on the 28th and 31st of October 2015.  The first night was okay, the premises are not well kept but the second night we stayed was horrible.  The handle on the sink facet fell off in my husbands hands, he killed several cockroaches during the night, the van that transported us to Disneyland was filthy and every warning light possible seemed to be on.  We choose to hire a taxi to get back to the room that night because the van was so nasty!  I will never stay in a Days Inn again!

Summary: We were overall very satisfied. We appreciated the large suite, the helpful housekeeping (she cleaned quickly while all 6 of us were napping!) and the hot tub and pool. The sofa mattress was uncomfortable, we had to put it on the floor for the kids, but then again I've never met a sofa mattress that WAS comfortable.  Mini fridge and microwave helpful. The breakfast.was probably the worst part of our stay; we considered it a supplement (small hard bruised apples) and had planned to purchase groceries anyway. The free shuttle was great, the staff pleasant. It all worked. We would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Daysinn, we are glad we met all your standards and that our staff did everything to insure you had a great stay. we are making some changes to the hotel and our continental breakfast is one of them. We hope you visit us again and check out our new renovation.

Summary: We stayed here for a couple nights for a Disneyland vacation. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The shuttle to Disneyland is very convenient as is the location of this hotel. The rooms are outdated but clean.

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for

It's possible to walk to the park - might take 10 - 15 min. to get to the spot the shuttles leave you. Summary: This hotel is just ok if you are going to Disneyland and will be there all day. We had nice beds. I was not impressed with the front desk staff. Rude on 2 occasions and was no help when there was no hot water in our room.

Summary: Pros Walking distance to Disneyland Good value for money Great beds Daily housekeeping Continental breakfast  Big room Free shuttle to Disneyland Fireworks from Disneyland can be seen from the motel room  Cons Our room was very noisy as we were near the dining room - we were woken up every morning at 7 am by people/kids discussing what they wanted for breakfast. Summary: It is hard to rate this motel as it has both good and bad features.This is an old fashion motel that is  close to Disneyland. The nightly fireworks display can be seen from the pool area so the kids really enjoyed that. The staff was pleasant and accommodated our request to have all three of our rooms next to each other which was nice for our multi generational family. The major problem is that the property is old and needs updating .It appears the housekeeping staff tries but the shower heads, moldy shower curtains and the badly stained carpet should be replaced.

I am a single mom and this hotel fit right in my budget. New beds and mattress, remodeling bathrooms and new paint would make this hotel 5 star.

Summary: We were upgraded to a suite without even asking, which was very nice and generous.  But unfortunately right outside the room was the ice maker and soda machines.  The noise of the machines running was fine and barely heard inside the room, but the noise of the hotel patrons getting ice and hanging out in front of the machines was very loud.  Myself and my two year old were awaken many times during the night and quite early in the morning.  I mentioned it to the hotel desk when I checked out, but "sorry about that" was all I got in return.  Great hotel as long as your not in a room near the ice machines.  Great hotel for a trip to Disneyland.  In walking distance to the parks.

Summary: We stayed here on our way back from a cruise and we were planning on going to Disneyland. This hotel shuttles to and from Disneyland which is great because then you don't have to pay for parking. The property itself was ok. The pool was heated. The room was clean except there were some ants in the bathroom. Didn't notice them anywhere else. The breakfast was relatively alright. It had toast, omelettes, yogurt, cereal and bagels. All in all it was a good hotel in a good location and was a good price.

Summary: Great value for price. Breakfast was more substantial than most in this price range-included a hot entree like eggs each morning. The bathrooms needed work. We had two rooms. Neither shower drained well and the shower head spurted in multiple directions.  Pool was large enough and had a shallow end for my little ones to enjoy. There were always towels available at the pool. I will probably stay here again the next time I go to Disneyland.

Summary Heading: What a way to celebrate News Years

The room was clean, not worn out as others have suggested.  The children enjoyed the head pool and hot tub at night.  The hotel has plenty of parking spaces.  The breakfast is basic, but we shopped at Von's and supplemented our needs.  We also were able to take food into the park.  We packed breakfast and got an early start.  Remember is you want luxury be willing to pay $$$$.  Cab ride is $10 one way.

Summary Heading: Will stay here again on my next trip to Disneyland
Summary: We got a double queen room with fridge, microwave, and coffee maker. It was clean and tidy. The breakfast was just OK, the cheese omelets were terrible, would have rather had the standard waffle make or frozen waffles but all of the other stuff (cereal, toast, coffee, juice) was fine.  We were there for 8 nights and the bed was rather firm (not unusual for a motel, as were the pillows) so went to a Walmart about 1.5 miles up I5 and bought a couple of cheap softer pillows.  Went to use the computer in the office one day ($4 hr to use) as I needed to print an admission ticket, it was broken but the hotel clerk printed it for me for the same $4. The staff was friendly and
Manager Response: none

Summary: I would recommend this hotel because it offers a shuttle to Disneyland and they offer eggs with cheese for breakfast. The only problem I had was when I went to breakfast at 9:50 a.m. they were already cleaning up the food. The next day I went at 9:55 a.m. and all of the food was put away. They told us breakfast was until 10 a.m. not 9:50 or 9:55 a.m. The woman cleaning up wouldn't even get a yogurt for me. She said it is 10 a.m. and we looked at the clock and it was not 10 a.m. It was 9:55 a.m.

On the downside: housekeeping barged in on us three times (even after yelling, "Just a minute" at the door), had some seedy-looking people staying there the same time we were there (wasn't sure if any drugs deals were going to happen).  Then there was the people next door banging and making noise all night (fight, maybe?)  The breaking point was the shuttle to Disneyland park. Manager Response: none

And for breakfast if that's what you want to call it, there wasn't anything just bananas and cereal, last year we at least had donuts. and muffins.. The shuttle saved us few bucks by avoiding the Disneyland parking. The room was large enough for a family of 4 and it was comfortable. I might have got a better room, because, many reviewers were not happy with the room they got (complaints about the paint, carpet, and other issues). Room was cleaned and maintained well every day. We didn't noticed till we checked out that the calendar/hour was on the counter and we thought we checked the park hour already. Anyway, it's ok.

Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your memorable trip to Disneyland are staff works hard every day to provide excellent service. Give us a call next time your planning you’re next trip. We would love to have you again.

If you did not get there by 7 it was all gone except milk and bread. The cereal was soggy before the milk. I would not recommend this place to anyone. Only good thing was how close it was to Disney we walked back after instead of waiting for the small van for over an hour because of the amount of people he had to take back to the motel.

And they charge 3 times, instead of one..I was going to the office almost everyday. Finally they fixed it, but just because I caught it!!!
