The grounds of the property looked nice. The continental breakfast was okay. When we got there at 8am there was only one yogurt left and the oranges that were sliced were very dried out. The lady helping in the room was nice though. We checked out that morning and checked into a different hotel down the road. We won't stay there again.

The air conditioner kept shutting itself off after a few minutes because the curtain was creating a barrier that wouldn't let air into the room unless it was held back against the window.  This caused the thermostat to think the room was the desired temperature.  When we called the office to complain, they sent a maintenance man to our room and one of the first things
Manager Response: thank you for your feedback our shuttle runs once every hour on the half and if it is over crowded will will take another trip and its about a 10min wait not an hour.  Your remarks will be shared with the management team at the hotel. Comments such as yours benefit our areas of our hotel operations.

We had to change rooms three times to even get a connection. Once connected it was slow even for a DSL connection, which it looked to be. It was impossible for me to perform normal functions with it. I ended up using my phone as a hotspot because it was soooooo much faster.  The rooms were clean. The staff was relatively helpful but several problems were not really solvable for them. An example is that the batteries in our door lock ran out our first day so the keys
Manager Response: First of all, thank you very much for your recent stay at our hotel. I am so sorry to see you did not enjoy your overall experience with us. When I called, they sent me an email explaining that they are not liable for discomfort and shared the contact info of the local owner, who never cared to take my call. Will never stay in any other Days Inn property, no matter what.
Manager Response: Thank you for your most recent feedback regarding your stay. We apologize if items in your guest room had not been functioning at the time of your arrival. Thank you for making us aware about the door lock and the bath tub all been resolved but ill be looking in to your reservation.

My only complaint was the free wifi...it did not work while in the room, I had to go outside if i wanted to go online and being from Canada it was all i had to connect with the outside world
Manager Response: Thank you for taking out the time and sharing with us your experience with us i see u had an issues with our internet to resolved this we will be upgrading our antennas  to handle the overload of guest trying to connect at the same time year so hopefully when you return you will have a much better experience with us

Summary: We would stay again.  Our room was clean, and comfortable, and very quiet.  The pool area was clean as well.  The parking lot is a little tight, but then again we were in a full size pickup. The staff was very friendly and helpful.  It is not within walking distance to Disney, but they do offer a free shuttle.
Manager Response: We strive to provide the best possible service and experience and it is always great to hear from our guests on how we are doing. We will make sure and share your wonderful feedback with our staff !We sincerely hope you will give us another opportunity to extend our usual hospitality again in the near future.

Summary: I enjoyed my stay at the Days inn for the most part. I was a bit grossed out by the bathtub, hadn't looked scrubbed near the drain, and when I tried to bath my aching body from a long day at Disneyland, the bathtub backed up and gross things came out of the drain. Bath was a no go, shower is better to use. BRUCE was the best worker there, very nice and professional.
Manager Response: Great to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. I am proud to know that my staff was accommodating and compassionate and I will be sure to share your review with my team. If you ever need accommodations in the near future give us a call.

Summary: The place really needs to pay a good handyman to go in and fix things up. Fixtures, bedding, etc all seemed old and worn out. The hair drier blinked all night long, so we had to unplug it. Hope they have some updates planned soon.
Manager Response: yes we are scheduled for a full renovation this year so hopefully if you return you will have a much better experience with us

Summary Heading: Stayed here 10 years ago and the room were nice. Came back and it seems like they have let the place go a little.
Summary: A/C units didn't work good, room was always hot Drywall was falling apart Bathrooms need a remodel Close to the resort and food  Decent price
Manager Response: Your remarks are being shared with the management team at the hotel. Comments such as yours benefit our system in many ways. We work very hard to maintain the highest standards of excellence in all areas of our hotel operations.

Summary: Was ok..I was just tired and I wanted a bed...but was so noisy..u can heard people from other rooms taking a shower ...couldn't sleep at all..lack of parking..price a little too high for the terrible service
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback with us i hope the nose did not disrupt your  trip to Disneyland are staff works hard every day to provide excellent service i understand the noise can be a issue in the summer time as we are always sold out.but next time just give us a call we'll find a resolution for you. Should your travel needs bring you back to our area please do not hesitate to contact us

Summary: This hotel is conveniently located near the Disneyland Resort.  The hotel property seems weel-maintained and has friendly and efficient front desk staff.  The room is comfortable and appropriate for the price.
Manager Response: thank you for taking the time out and letting us know about your experience during your recent stay with us. I speak on behalf of myself and my staff, we thank you for your sincere recommendation of our hotel. As I know all my staff strive to ensure they provide customer service to all of our guest during

Summary: We were not sure what to expect after we booked this hotel, some reviews were bad and we were a little scared and because we had booked the non-cancellation price we had to stick with it.  It was better than what we had expected.  We had 2 Queen beds and they did seem smaller than a queen bed after sleeping in a king for years but we made due.  It is within walking distance, about a 15 - 20 minute walk and has a shuttle.  There is a pizza / chicken restaurant next door and the food was really good. There is gas stations and convenient stores all around so you could pick up snacks.  If you have a car which we did, we found the local Target and a Viva 99 cent store within a 10 min drive down the road so that was handy.   There was a microwave and fridge in the room so that was
Manager Response: It was a pleasure to have been of service to you We are delighted to know that our services were to your utmost satisfaction Your appreciation of the property, and the food will go a long way in motivating all of us and strive harder to exceed expectations Thanking you once again and look forward to seeing you here again at the hotel

Summary: I arrived and went into our room it smelled very strongly with a chemical smell and the TV did not work.  They gave us another room.  Both the sink and bath tub drains were plugged.  We had ants and the came and sprayed, which did not help.  This place is noisy.  About the worst stay I have ever had.  The carpet was dirty.  The room was very dirty.
Manager Response: At the outset, please accept our sincere apologies. It is rather disappointing to learn that you did not enjoy your stay We have taken immediate corrective action to ensure that all points raised by you are rectified and do not occur ever again.Please email or call me directly, next time you plan on visiting, so that we can make your stay more pleasing & memorable

Summary: Requested early check in, got there two hours early, wouldn't let us unless we paid a half nights stay.  No restroom to change our clothes after long flight said we could at the restaurant next door. Hotel was ok, close to Disneyland free shuttle but none during mid day. Ok place to stay if nothing else available.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking your valuable time to post an review i understand you had an issues checking-in early  if do arrive early to our property we do offer early check-in but only on availability and for a fee of course. im sorry if there was an inconvenience  Thank you once again and we hope you will give us another opportunity to make up for you next stay

Summary Heading: I will NEVER stay at days inn again.   And will be...
Summary: I will NEVER stay at days inn again.   And will be cancelling everything do with your company this week.  The room was horrible. My son got sick from your breakfast. The shuttle is required by law to have functional seat belts but didn't.  There was mold on the bathroom floor and let's not even mention the carpet.   The worst experience ever.
Manager Response: please accept our sincere apologies. It is rather disappointing to learn that you did not enjoy your stay due to the reasons mentioned above.  We do have our processes in place to ensure every guest need is catered to and encase there is any glitch; we are always willing to make up for it in more than one way. Our Endeavor is to have every guest leave our hotel wearing a big smile on their face after a comfortable and a memorable stay. In your case we have fallen short of your expectations and our standards. We hope you give us another opportunity to serve you and you would notice the difference

Summary: Location is great.  The building is ancient.  A remote is given to you on check in along with a $35 warning if you don't return it.  Didn't control the tv, and the buttons worked sometimes.  Couldn't give the thing away if you tried.  The only way to turn the tv on and off was to unplug it from the wall. The creaks and moans from the walls made you wonder if there was an impending collapse. Otherwise, the room was fairly clean. This is a $40/night place, with Disneyland so close, bump it up to $50.  Too bad the regular rate is $100...
Manager Response: i just want to thank you for your feedback It is really regrettable to know that we fell short in so many aspects and that is certainly not the standard of service. we sincerely apologise once again and thank you very much for the feedback. We hope you will visit us again and give us another oppurtunity to be able to meet your expectations.

Summary: This roach infested hotel should be shut down by the health department! There were squished bugs all over the room, bugs flying around, blood stains on our sheets, no mattress covers, the beds spread were stained and older than me, mold was in the bathroom, etc. it was by far the most disgusting place I have ever stayed! Not to mention there is no refrigerator in the room, my son was yelled at for taking two waffles, they knock on your door early in the morning to get their two towels they give you. The pool is dirty and has a sign informing people not to throw TP in. It was a horrible experience for us! We were at Disneyland and counting down the days until we could leave. I didn't think Days Inns were so cheap.
Manager Response: truly disappointed to know that you had an unsatisfactory stay at our hotel Please accept our sincere apologies  We have taken note of all your points/comments and corrective steps are taken to ensure we do not repeat the same again It is really regrettable to know that we fell short in so many aspects and that is certainly not the standard of serivce and food that we provide to our guests.

Summary Heading: Price and free shuttle sold me
Summary: I booked a last minute surprise trip to Disneyland for my 4 year old daughter. I stayed at the hotel for 3 nights, a Monday through Thursday. I found this hotel 1 week prior to our stay for a great price and since it was just her and I traveling, I chose this hotel since it offered free shuttle rides to and from Disneyland.   The rooms are in great need of a complete renovation. The carpets are dirty, the bedding is old, the fridge and microwave were on it's last leg and needed to be replaced. I only kept our drinks in the fridge and was surprised they were chilled enough to drink. The air conditioner barely kept the room cold enough, the room was always very muggy. The bathrooms was clean but the tub was super old and flaking and the ceiling had water stains. But I always had
Manager Response: We thank you for taking you time and sharing your experience of our hotel. we are a family base hotel we try our best to accommodate each of our guests accordingly i understand u had some questions and remarks yes we do require our to fill out a slip to return the remote upon check-out this ensure us we  encounter every guest upon check-out are breakfast has been upgraded since your trip and yes we took out the donuts and about our shuttle are driver trys to maintain order up on boarding so no cutting our shuttle runs once every hour on the half but if it is overcrowded it takes multiple rotation its only a 10min wait We hope you will consider visiting us again and allow us another opportunity to serve you again

Summary: The room was very dark, very basic, but very large: 2 queen beds, a pull out couch, small fridge and microwave and bathroom.  Nothing special but affordable for our large family.
Manager Response: We are delighted to know that our services were to your utmost satisfaction It was a pleasure to have been of service to youThanking you once again and look forward to seeing you here again at the hotel

Summary: Good location, 10 min walk to disneyland. Hotel needs updating, looks worn down, breakfast was good. Hotel advertises free shuttle to disneyland, but many people leave in the am and eve at the same time and the van only holds approx 10 people and especially coming back from disneyland, many people rush in to get to the van depending where it stops so eventhough you might have been the first in line to wait, you may not get in. The van does come back to take everyone, but you could end up waiting more than 1/2hr.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very nice and clean hotel, within walking distance to D-Land or easy shuttle bus which made it convenient.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure to have been of service to you We are delighted to know that our services were to your utmost satisfaction Thanking you once again and looking forward to welcome you back

Summary: After a long car ride, i found this place very easy to sleep, it was very nice since i had a cot it was even better. And you can see the fireworks every single night, though for those trying to sleep it is probably difficult. Pool was amazing and so was the sleep along with the friendly service. Maybe if the beds arent comfortable you should get a cot because it WAS very very nice. It is Very clean but there is a very small bathroom. Only big issue was the breakfast needs to be a lot bigger than it is, but it does have donuts so i cant really complain.
Manager Response: We are delighted to know that our services were to your utmost satisfaction Your appreciation of the property, will go a long way in motivating all of us and strive harder to exceed expectations Thanking you once again and look forward to seeing you here again at the hotel

Summary: Room smelled moldy, bathroom was dirty. Dust on crevices in door mold or dirt on wall in bathroom. Bathtub faucet falling off with mildew or mold . Was a last minute booking , front desk was not helpful will not stay again
Manager Response: At the outset, please accept our sincere apologies. It is rather disappointing to learn that you did not enjoy your stay We are renovating a part of our resort and redoing the rooms our endeavor is to have every guest leave our resort wearing a big smile on their face after a comfortable and a memorable stay. In your case we have fallen short of your expectations and our standards. We hope you give us another opportunity to serve you and you would notice the difference.

Summary: From the moment we checked in it was a bad start. Check in is at 3pm and one of our rooms was not even cleaned. We waited 33 minutes outside until they finished cleaning the room. To top it off after we checked in they sent us to our rooms without the room keys! We assumed someone was going to help us but they did not so I marched back questioning why we did not get our keys. The other employee was baffled and was not apologetic about it. Second, I spoke to someone 3 hours before check-in and confirmed we had adjoining rooms which she confirmed. Come time to check in, she tells us there are none and that she couldve been the only one I spoke to since she was there all day. Ummm, you think? I couldve showed her my call log to confirm but I did not want to push it anymore. As I
Manager Response: We thank you for taking your time posting ur review I regret that we were not able to give you adjoining rooms.  we do have limited amounts of adjoining rooms.we do not charge a fee for these particular rooms but they do have to be available on availability on on arrival. unfortunately we do not make any advance reservation on adjoing room. im very sorry this has caused you any inconvenience but i do want thank you for bringing the matter to my attention.

Summary: Online rated 4 stars, not sure how it got them. The room ,carpet, walls just everything was not clean. The sheets on the beds were too short, pillows were lumpy, flat and the bed uncomfortable. Linens were gray and smelly, toliet seat was broken. We were to have a nonsmoking room, drapes and bedspread smelled of smoke. Wifi none, only if you pay! The shuttle ( run down van ) does not have any  working seat belts and we had 12 people in it. The breakfast which was offered (and I use the term breakfast loosely) was upstairs above the office which is not ADA (no elevator on site). How can they get away with all the code violations! Sad review for Days Inn,won't ever use them again!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Not the Best! Not the worst.
Summary: No hot water to the rooms when we arrived. Room key had to be replaced 5 times as it would only open the door a time or two and then not work even after it was specifically kept awat from cell phone and any magnets, etc.....complimentary b-fast was bare-bones. ZCouldn't get a receipt when we left as their "system" was down.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The boiler went out, so no hot water, there is no access to...
Summary: The boiler went out, so no hot water, there is no access to WIFI in rooms, system down at check out.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Carpet needs cleaning or replacing, looks very old! Had difficulty keeping faucet from dripping and hot and cold water were reversed! It appears that black mold was caulked over in the bathroom. Bathroom fan was very noisy!  Electrical outlets were loose!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: When we booked, the confirmation stated 2 Queen beds  We...
Summary: When we booked, the confirmation stated 2 Queen beds  We had doubles. They stated free Wi-Fi  But my son and his friend had to go to the main lobby to get on then the system was slow.  Free transport to Disney  the van was very old- the bench seats where loose.  Very nice drivers but one morning no one was available
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room cleanliness was extremely poor.  The walls were dirty and could use a fresh coat of paint.  The floors were dirty in the corners.  The floor next to the bed had Cheetos left over from the previous guests.  The chairs were stained and dirty.  Overall it appears to be an older motel, however, they need to spend some extra time with cleanliness of the rooms.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed 3 nights. The room was adequate, not that clean. The hotel is old. The pool furniture is generally worn out. The hot tub didn't work at all. The internet didn't work very well and we were always getting disconnected. But the reason we stayed was the price, and it was within walking distance to Disney Land. We likely won't stay there again. I guess you get what you pay for.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Small rooms. Not that clean. Close to Disneyland. Very nice...
Summary: Small rooms. Not that clean. Close to Disneyland. Very nice hotel staff. You get what you pay for. I would stay again only because of the staff, pool, and how close it was to Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: room had old food under the night stand. The bed spreads...
Summary: room had old food under the night stand. The bed spreads were old faded and worn out. The furniture is also old and in bad condition.walls were patched with spackel but not repainted. Cockroaches in bathroom. Bathtub was so stained we did not let the kids use it. The room just felt dirty, and nothing in the room matched or even looked good.This place really needs to be refurbished.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The hotel was ok, it's old and needs a lot of TLC and...
Summary: The hotel was ok, it's old and needs a lot of TLC and upgrades. We stayed there two tonights and three days. At the time of check-in they told us that someone Had called in and cancel our reservation which was not true. Luckily they had rooms still available. Felt like we were at a motel than a hotel. The continental breakfast they started to clean up early it was supposed to end at 10 o'clock, we got there at 9:30 and they had old fruit and muffins. Sleeping arrangements were okay. The beds were moderate, pills were too soft. Furniture in the hotel room are very old and broken down. Bathroom ok but my 6'2 husband it's the dust and dirt along the top of the bathroom ceil. The walls are very thin. Constantly hearing people walking, laughing, opening and slamming doors,  sound
Manager Response: thank you for taking the time on posting your review It is really regrettable to know that we fell short in so many aspects and that is certainly not the standard of serivce and food that we provide to our guests. we have changed our breakfast we hope you will consider visiting us again and allow us another opportunity to serve you again

Summary: We were told there is an elevator, there is not. Loud bathroom fan, could not turn on light. Loud AC. Loose plugs would not hold chargers, Phone did not work,  Internet password on SMALL piece of paper in lobby.  Poor WIFI connection.  Some staff were helpful, others not. Limited, crowded parking.  We are done with Days Inn.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Mold and mildew.  Shower handle was falling off the wall.  "Continental" breakfast was bagged bagels in small room that looka like its never been cleaned. Rings in the toilet. Sink that wouldn't drain.  "Disney transportation" is run down van without working seat belts. Thin walls kids screaming.
Manager Response: none

Summary: No wifi in rooms. Shuttle not enough trips. Not 2 blks. From Disneyland . Pool hours to short. Stay open later. Coffee colored water. If you Re going to make coffee MAKE COFFEE! Thank you for Starbucks .
Manager Response: none

Summary: the check in  went ok but when needed to log into the internet was unable to do so  . called the front desk and he said because all the guests were trying to log on also it was slow.  we tried for about an hour and just gave up.also one of my guests was gonna show up later that night and was told he couldn't park car because it was full  but it was not. the bed creaked every time u turned around
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Hopefully all Days Inn properties are not like this one!
Summary: My adult daughter chose this as it is close to Disney and has a shuttle. Our stay was for 3 nights. This is more like an older two story motel with outdoor entrance to each of the rooms. Old is ok, dirty is not. They held our reservation as we came in after midnight.  The room had dirty carpeting, drapes, and smelled of a combination of old cigarette, bleach and mildew. Sheets were well bleached. While the rooms are supposed to be non-smoking, people were standing in front of their rooms smoking, requiring walking past and through the smoke to get to our room. We signed the form to check out a remote for the tv. The on/off button had been removed from the tv so the remote was a moot point.  There was a piece of the wall under the sink cut out and on the floor. You could see the
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: I enjoyed the close proximity to Disneyland, as that was...
Summary: I enjoyed the close proximity to Disneyland, as that was the reason for my trip. Staff was courteous
Manager Response: Thank you always nice we made a family Disneyland trip We hope you will consider visiting us again

Summary: Rented two rooms at discount rate.  When we go there they only had one room and it was not at the discount rate.   There computer could not find the other room until they did a up on the computer.  I could show them the email on my phone and they still did not give us the rate and the right amount of rooms.  So we stay at the higher rate.   Could not get another room at the last min.  The desk clerk was not friendly.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Basically you get what you pay for. I paid something around $66/night for a room with two double beds, small old mini-fridge and mini-microwave...and that's about it. Put it this way, they loan you the TV remote and charge you if you don't return it. Was it clean? the main parts yes, but don't use a white glove or go anywhere near the corners. Would I stay here again if going to Disney, yes since I have kids and I had no worries about them messing anything up or breaking anything because it was already old and falling apart anyway. Would I stay here on business or adult vacation, not even close.  Pool is nice & is heated, it is nice that they have washer/dryer on site if needed, parking is free, continental breakfast is decent and you can walk to Disney or wait for the free
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for in this case.
Summary: The price was right, and we didn't plan on stay in the hotel much so we went for it.  They looked like they may have been in the middle of remodeling, so maybe others have had a better experience. Next time I will go for a nicer hotel.  It was a bit depressing.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Best price in area for walking distance to Disneyland and a free shuttle to the park. Free breakfast as well. Room is good enough for sleeping, clean, and pool / hot tub are great. We will stay here again when visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: thank you for taking your time to post an excellent review of your stay with us recently We are delighted to know that your children really enjoyed the stay  We thank you for taking your valuable time to post an excellent review in TripAdvisor

Summary: I booked weeks before trip annd even went in at 9am to let then know we were in town. Couldnt check in til 3pm didnt have our rooms ready. Requested ne,t to each other and still didnt get that way. This made us upset after long hours of walking at disneyland. There breakfast danish were hard. Dissappointment with this stay
Manager Response: 1st of all thank you for your review i have made changes to our breakfast for a better experience and yes we took out the danish and donuts and about the check-in hours, check-in is at 3pm we do offer early check-in but only on availability at a fee. check-out is at 11am and check-in is at 3pm that give housekeeping enough time to prepare ours rooms. im sorry this has cause u any inconvenience on your stay. We hope you will visit us again and give us another oppurtunity to be able to meet your expectations.

Summary: The location was great, shuttle was good but the times were not accommodating. Breakfast was good for my family. Rooms need help as well as the front desk staff. They are very rude no care in the world. They are getting the low pay so they are not giving it their all for the customers. We had 1 gentlemen that was somewhat helpful but not great. For a large chain it is awful the way they treat the paying guests. You get what you pay for.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: nice place and close by Disneyland
Summary: We came here for 3-4 days and the price was good, the room nice, bed good to sleep on, bathroom okay. Never got to try the swimming pool, to busy. Front desk staff was nice and helpful. The free shuttle was nice, especially at the end of a long day and the driver was so nice and got us  to Disneyland quickly but carefully. The van only holds about 9-12 people at a time but he did a round trip in about 10 minutes..Walking to Disneyland was not  a long distance either. Would  stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Well we checked into our rom and while I started to unloa dthe van, my wife said we are not staying in this room. There was ands all over the washroom. I went down and told the desk clerk. He said sorry. ANd gave us keys for another room. Well it didn't have ants, but the carpets were very dirty, the drain stops in the bath tub and sink didn't work. The place should get a good cleaning. The sidewalks were sticky form pop or juice spilled all over them. The swimming pool was o.k., but they were always out of towels. The jacuzzi tub was decent. I did enjoy that. The complimentary breakfast was decent. The Shakey's pizza next door was very good. Not that bad of a walk to Disney, maybe 10-15 minutes.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The TV was barely working. It was in and out of color and...
Summary: The TV was barely working. It was in and out of color and black/white. The housekeeping came and got our towels and then later brought them back. As if there was not enough towels to supply right away. The jacquzzi did not make any bubbles. And breakfast was toast with no butter, bagels, muffins and cereal. Not much selection.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Carpet shreds all over bathroom floor and full trash can of the debris. White powdering stuff all over carpet between beds. Desk clerk announced my room # outloud...which is against industry standards. TV did not work, even with directions from front desk.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: I guess you get what you pay for?
Summary: ok first, the 10 minute walk to disney land was convenient. but...everything else was not too good. hmm, the ants crawling over our bathroom floor, pretty sure there was mold in our room, the bedding was ripped with almost looking cigarette burns in them. They bedding was OLD and DISGUSTING. Just small things that added up. would not stay there again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here before and thought we'd give them another try. Was ok. It is not the Ritz. If you expect it, you'll probably be disappointed. However, it's ok, it's next door to Shakey's and close to Disneyland. If you just want something cheap to sleep in while you spend your time out and about, it's ok.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Donuts in boxes which seems un-cleaned for weeks. Insuffeciant servings and menu. Overall no-breakfast is better than what we see there & Un-clean, dirty OLD room carpets
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Room was a little outdated and carpet was stained. The...
Summary: Room was a little outdated and carpet was stained. The bathroom shower/bath fixture was falling off and water was leaking into open space so they will have issues in the future. The king bed was good but the sleeper sofa was horrible. The shuttle to disneyland was fantastic and drivers were excellent - always on time. The hot tub- pool was very nice (hot tub did need a good cleaning). It looked like they were updating some of the rooms which is needed. Overall it was OK- price was good.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staying at this hotel could be summed up with the word, "average". That doesn't mean you won't want to stay there, but you should at least know what you're getting into. The beds are old and springy. Lighting is inconsistent. Everything about it reminded me of staying in motels in the 80's. Nothing seemed updated. But, all things considered, it worked for a place to crash while we were in the area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: To be told that we can't even get in our room until 3 o'clock is ridiculous! To sleep on the third pull out bed was atrocious. We basically need to just stay there for no more than 10 hours in to leave for the next day and to be told in order to get into our room early we had to pay for half a day? It was a terrible service and a terrible room for how much we paid for it we will never stay there again!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great location, good price. Nice old motel, just don’t...
Summary: Great location, good price. Nice old motel, just don’t expect the tashmahal for the price. Close to Disney, I would stay again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our reservation at this hotel was made months before our visit.  When we arrived at the hotal and checked in the front office staff was bluh to say the least, and the rooms were aweful.  Thank God I had extra blankets in our car because the thought of sleeping in those sheets still makes me shiver.  The bathroom was filthy and the breakfast was a joke.  I would not ever stay here again and have told several people planning trips to stay away!  IF WE HAD NOT BEEN SO LATE LEAVING DISNEYLAND AND SO TIRED WE WOULD HAVE LEFT
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was a great stay for my family and I. Even though it was a busy weekend with the Tinkerbell run it was quiet. We were still able to see the fire works which the kids enjoyed. They shuttle was a great help to and from the park. We will return and recommend
Manager Response: thank you we really appreciate it  looking forward to welcome you back

Summary: Days Inn lost my reservations and they did nothing to help me. I had my conformation email and I had to call the company I reserved it from and they proved to me that it was sent to days inn. The room had a half a bottle of shampoo like it was left over from the person who stayed before me and that lead me to believe the housekeeping doesn't clean their rooms very poor job of cleaning. The tv was broken the volume would go up and down in extremes to the point it was not worth watching it. We love the day's inn in San Diego it is our first choice but after this experience I don't know if I would ever give them a penny of my hard earned money again
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel was one of the best priced ones for the area (very close to Disneyland). The shuttle to Disneyland picked us up just off the hotel property so that was nice and convenient. The breakfast was seriously lacking. If you are looking for a full breakfast make other plans.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here because it was close to all. We were going to CHA at the convention center and really wanted something close. The hotel its self if dated, but clean. The people who all work there are very very nice and polite. We were put on the second floor the first night, but had problems with the internet so they changed our room to the first floor. Still had problems with the internet, but it was fine, after our days ended was too tired to go online anyway. The breakfast was free and set up in an area they had. They served cold cereal, toast, donuts and danish I believe, but being a vegan I didn't really look. For fruit it was oranges, very green bananas and they cut them in half which really stinks because  all I could eat there so I took some back to my room. the bananas
Manager Response: alway love to hear you enjoyed your stay looking forward to welcome you back

Summary: Worst place my family and I have stayed at in the Anahiem area!!! We returned from an entire day at Disneyland to find our room was infested with roaches. We saw 10 of them from babies to adult roaches. Immediately called front desk and they sent their maintaintaince guy who came to our room 10 mins later with Raid and started spraying the entire room. We were in the middle of bringing our dinner back to the room and when all the roaches were out and started hiding as soon as we flipped on all the lights on in the room. Front desk said they had no more room for us and I would have to talk to the hotel manager for a discount/refund! This place needs to be tented and they need to get new carpets. The Disneyland "shuttle" was a 10 passenger van, so you likely had to wait when coming back from Disneyland since there were lots of people waiting.  We didn't
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: This was the worst hotel.  We had to ask for towels...
Summary: This was the worst hotel.  We had to ask for towels everyday even after they cleaned our room.  There wasn't even a wash cloth.  If the hotel tells you they are just down the street from Disneyland- Not true.  Every time I called the front desk the person couldn't speak english so the only answer to everything was no!!  We get to the hotel early so we could swim and hang out and the pool is closed the front desk said it would be opened later but that never happened.  The breakfast was terrible I think they went and got the day old breakfast from the hotel down the road and served it.  Our toilet seat was broken as well.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The bathroom knob was falling off on both sides of the bathroom door. There was little water in the toilet. The carpet needed to be cleaned and replaced. The furniture needs to be replace looks like it’s from the 70’s. The parking spaces are to small.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel is clean and the staff is friendly. The price is good and location is good. It is value for the price.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Just across the freeway from Disneyland, this hotel was clean and met our needs. The no frills breakfast (mostly assorted rolls and such) and coffee was a quick, easy way to start our day.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very close to DL, plus a free shuttle and very friendly staff makes this a great place to spend a few days. I highly recommend it.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Very disappointed, picture on line is very different than...
Summary: Very disappointed, picture on line is very different than actual place. Location is over the highway not a quick walk shuttle was a van not big enough for our 10 person party. Breakfast was very limited. the shuttle had no ac and the check engine light was on the whole time. Pool was very dirty. Rooms were older.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The most horrible service I have EVER had
Summary: I was there for a homeschool convention and I have my assistant with me.  Four grown women (all of whom have families, and all who visit Disneyland from time to time)  So yes we were on a business trip but we also ALL return to the area with our families.  BUT - NONE of us will EVER stay at this place.  EVER, and ALL of us (5 families worth) will tell others to NEVER stay here.  They are not honest and they treat women horribly.    I have worked conventions for 14 seasons, and at the reservation ALWAYS first ask if they can receive my boxes.  At which point I tell them approximately how many boxes and what size most are.  I ask if there is a fee to receive those boxes.  If a hotel says they charge, I thank them kindly and move on to my next option.  This is the FIRST question I
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Worst hotel I've ever stayed in
Summary: The hotel was beyond fithy. The matresses were yellow the carpets were disgusting. The wall were covered in filth. The showers were yellow and cracked. I had no hot water and took Ice cold showers. The breakfast was a joke. There were roaches in the pool. This hotel might as well charge by the hour that's how bad it is. Beyond gross
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Room was fine, breakfast was meh
Summary: The room was clean and the beds were fairly comfortable. Breakfast was kind of sucky, not much variety and nothing hot. It was barely worth going to
Manager Response: none

Summary: Best features - close enough to Disneyland that we could walk to/from, but hotel did have an hourly shuttle which was a huge benefit.  Very nice pool and hot tub, which my kids loved. Room itself though wasn't very nice. Little rusty and run-down; bed was made with two flat sheets so the sheets came undone every night and my husband woke to find himself sleeping on the mattress (gross!). We should have asked for an upstairs room--the people above us were up at 6:30 every morning and you could hear every step they took. Very annoying, Was a good price, but I'd check around find a different hotel next time.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nasty, lady at front desk during the day is beyond rude. And we were never told about a free shuttle, we asked and bought a pass
Summary: The rooms were dirty , the property was dirty . The lady at front desk snapped at me because I told her we didn't have any towels  in our room and she said" and you won't until the girls get done washing them" she couldn't find my name in the computer but when I brought out my Priceline voucher she miraculously knew who I was without looking at the computer screen( I think she just felt like being honry? They don't heat the pool in June and it was freezing, there was tons of chlorine in both the hot tub and the pool. There was chocolate milk spilled from Granny's kitchen to iur room and no one bothered to clean it up for two days. There were people next to us that were so noisy and sounds coming from their room made you think you were in a hotel that was rented by the hour.
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconveniences you encountered during your stay with us. Along with our General Manager, we have reviewed your comments and we have taken the appropriate actions to ensure a situation of this nature will not be repeated in the future

Summary Heading: I've stayed at this Days Inn since I was a small child...
Summary: I've stayed at this Days Inn since I was a small child going to Disneyland with my family.  Things weren't quite the same this trip.  Our room was dirty after the front desk was told after asking about our room specifically if it was clean.  The rooms themselves had many cracks and holes in the wall.  There was a little too much chlorine in the pool and hot tub.  The continental breakfast wasn't as stocked as I remember it being in past visits, and I go there right as it opened.  The temperature control was just fine, and the beds and showers available and fine (even though the sink had hot and cold water in opposite dials), and since that's all we needed, no need to make a fuss.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comment concerning your stay with us. I appreciate you taking the time to post your comments we are working hard on having ours rooms updated

Summary: We were looking for something close to Disneyland. A big plus was the free shuttle to the Park, saving us parking costs and a lot of extra walking. Older property but the pool area is attractive. Continental breakfast was bare bones.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words from your recent post on Trip Advisor. We appreciate you taking the time to share your satisfaction. Never hesitate to contact us should you ever need assistance in the future.

Summary: The maid staff was really nice and even helped me carry some stuff up the stairs due to no elevator. Breakfast was decent. Less than 15 minute walk to Disneyland.  Shuttle service available but once every hour. Pool was heated which felt great. Beds were clean but the overall look of the room was dirty with stains on floor and chairs. We had to move rooms because the a/c kept breaking. We had to store our stuff in the office bc we had to get out of the room and I went to get something out of my bag and the office lady in a rude voice told me to wait in the lobby bc it was their office. Overall I would come back if some updates were made.
Manager Response: I appreciate you taking the time to post your comments. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconveniences. you experienced I am disappointed we failed to give you the fine accommodations and considerations we strive for. we will be reviewing some of ours rooms for updates

Summary Heading: The room was average.  The carpets and bed coverings felt...
Summary: The room was average.  The carpets and bed coverings felt greasy, as if many years of people using them have taken their toll.  The hotel definitely needs an update.
Manager Response: We apologize you were not satisfied with the condition of the hotel during your stay. We appreciate you taking the time share your experience. Your comments are valued, and your suggestions will be used to consider improvements

Summary: This hotel is one of the worst that I have ever stayed in. Our room was non-smoking, yet reeked of stale cigarette smoke. We then decided to take a break from the muggy, hot room and go swimming in the hotel's pool only to find that it was heated in the middle of June. The pool was also cloudy and filled with floating hair, you could smell the chlorine from across the complex. Speaking of chlorine, all the bed sheets and towels smelled and felt like they has been washed in the muggy, nasty pool. The ''continental breakfast'' consisted of sour bread, stale cereal, over-ripe fruit, and bland muffins. The hotel also offered free wi-fi. Ha, no. The entire four days we were there, it definitely did not work once. The only nice thing I can think of is that housekeeping made the beds
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments on TripAdvisor. Unfortunately we were having issues with our free WIFI. Our system was purchased in January so being new you would think there should be no issues myself and my staff are not computer technicians we do out best and call the IT department for help. We sit patiently for help and give honest answers to what we know. At anytime if we were to be asked we would accommodate guest by using our back computer we never have a problem with this or printing boarding passes, forgotten vouchers, directions etc

Summary Heading: On a Budget - this is your place
Summary: The room was clean, bed was comfy, staff was helpful and friendly.  Rooms could use some cosmetic work.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing you positive experience at Days Inn. Our hotel is always looking for ways to update all it's services and packages to ensure guest are satisfied with their stay. We look forward to having you, your family and friends stay with us on your next trip to Anaheim. Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Canceled reservation BUT was still charged
Summary: Had reservations but called and cancelled days before the penalty. I was told I would not be charged, only to see they charged my card anyway on the arrival day. Still have not seen my refund.  Have called and spoke to several people and I keep getting the run around. If I don't see a refund I will NEVER even think about booking at ANY Days Inn again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I will rate this a 3 star hotel. I have stayed in far worse and some much better; but, there is value here if you are on a budget.  This is a good location and has great freeway access but don't be deceived. Those who say it is a 10 minute walk to Disneyland are delusional. I am a fast walker and it took me 20 minutes to get to the drop-off entrance. So if you are tired coming back from the parks, you may want to rethink Disney's $15 parking. The shuttle is small and you will compete with a bunch of other folk.   Some have complained about the mustiness of the rooms so I took a bottle of Fabreeze which we did not need. The AC strained but kept the room adequately cool.  Security is good. There is a safe but you will need a key from front desk. The entire complex is enclosed like
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking your time and sharing your resent experience at Daysinn. I'm happy to hear that my staff were friendly and helpful. I appreciate you pointing out hotel cleanliness. It is always a pleasure knowing our guests loved their stay. Thank you so much for staying with us, and we look forward to taking care of you during your next stay!

Summary: Gross motel. Gave me the creeps. We killed 5 bugs, including one on my bed during our short stay. There was a large chunk of wall cut from the bathroom sink area and not properly replaced, holes in the blankets, broken drawer hanging down, shower head sticking out 3 inches from the wall. Clearly the time spent cleaning and maintaining the motel is not sufficient. This motel was the biggest downer of the entire Disneyland vacation trip for us. NEVER staying here again, despite the friendly staff.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The internet kept crashing which was a pain in the you know what. The beds were very comfortable and the location were great .
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking time to post your feedback.  I understand you had a great stay with us. I'm sorry to learn that your experience some issues connecting to our internet. I have taken to ensure the issues will be resolved we have made some correction adding another antenna for a better wifi signal . Thank you so much for staying with us, and we look forward to taking care of you during your next stay!

Summary: When we checked in, the man at the front desk checked us in just fine, but then when we got to our room, it was being cleaned. So, I went back to him & he gave us another room, and was very nice about it. No big deal. The room was clean and breakfast was alright. HBO & On demand was in the room. We didn't even bother with the shuttle because the park was so close by! Nice hotel for a short stay & cheap price.
Manager Response: I am delighted to hear that you were happily satisfied with your stay. I appreciate you taking the time to compliment us on our hospitality, cleanness and service. We strive to provide our guests with clean, comfortable accommodations and great customer service we look forward to taking care of you during your next stay!

Summary Heading: Great and Disneyland is Right over the small bridge
Summary: The amenities given by this day in is pretty standard. The beds were comfortable and they had a small continental breakfast in the morning. The best part is that it is really close to Disneyland. They have a free shuttle that leaves every hour to Disneyland, as well as it being only a 7 min walk to the front entrance of the park. The room rates are very reasonable. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for writing such wonderful comments and feedback about our  Daysinn. Your kind words make us strive to give the same experience to each and every guest. It is always a pleasure knowing our guests loved their stay. Thank you so much for staying with us, and we look forward to taking care of you during your next stay!

Summary: Days Inn, in my mind, is a 3 star motel. But this place is better than that. It was meticulously clean, staff immediately available for all requests, they had a nice little contintental breakfast for us. I really enjoyed it. Its close proximity to Disneyland only made it that much nicer. It was a 10 minute walk or a quick hop in the car over there. My only complaint really is with the shuttle service, which is only a regular van, and runs only once an hour. The van was frequently over-full, and had to make 2 runs or more to accommodate the guests.
Manager Response: well thank for taking the time to review are hotel, you are right this not just a Daysinn. Our team at Daysinn makes every effort to deliver upon the high standards we have set ourselves. We strive to ensure our guests recognize the facilities and services we provide as offering a high level of value and a warmly memorable experience. Again thank hope to see u again

Summary: We had very few problems with this motel. Pros: The housekeeping staff was amazing. The front desk staff was very friendly. 10 minute walk to Disneyland. Free shuttle. Free Continental Breakfast. Cons: The shuttle service only comes once an hour and there are so many people waiting to use it, that you end up waiting even longer. We ended up just walking back. The shuttle had two broken seat belts, so I felt pretty unsafe riding in it. There didn't appear to be an elevator for the handicapped.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at Daysinn. We value all forms of guest feedback as an opportunity to continually improve our facilities and services for our guests. im glad you enjoy your stay with us i have reviewed you comments about our shuttle and ill be making some changes to correct this. I do hope we will have the occasion to welcome you back again and to exceed your expectations on your next stay.

Summary: A decent place to stay if you're looking for cheap motel near Disneyland. You can walk to and from the park if needed. The wifi did have a very poor signal and rarely worked for us though.
Manager Response: We appreciate your kind words about our staff. I will be sure that they hear of your review. I apologize for the wi fi not working during your stay. We have been working on this for some time and we do have a back up. I am sorry that we were not able to fix this during your stay. I will talk to our employees about informing everyone about our back up passwords. I hope that this does not prevent you from staying with us in the future.

Summary: If you want to visit Disneyland, the save 20% on a 3 night stay makes the Days Inn excellent value. I don't really see much reason wasting $200 per night on a room when you can get this as low at $60.  About the only reason you would stay here is to go to Disneyland and the park has very long opening hours ranging from 8am to 10am for opening and 8pm to midnight for closing - so you don't really spend that much time in your room other than to sleep.   I had no complaints about the room - 2 queen beds, air conditioning, small fridge, microwave, cable tv, table with 2 chairs, combined bath/shower and extra storage around the basin.  Cleaners did a good job on a daily basis and put a nice touch of folding the hand towels into a shell shape.  If you want to save money on dinner,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience here at Daysinn. I am delighted to learn that you truly enjoyed your stay with us and that the services of my team met your expectations. Thank you for pointing out how clean and comfortable your room was and that continental breakfast also met your expectations. We take great pride in the service that we provide and work diligently to ensure that each and every person that stays at Daysinn has a great time. Give us a call directly on your next stay for the best available rate.

Summary: The hotel was just OK... The carpets need a Very good cleaning or New was kinda musty smell! Customer service sucked!!! It says call 24hrs aheAd of time if ne problems. yet they were going to charge me full price if i pushed back my stay 1day! I accidentally left my blanket & they wanted to make me pay for the shipping!!! Thought they would at least be courteous enough to send it for me
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on TripAdvisor following your recent stay with us at Daysinn. I understand that certain aspects of your stay were disappointing and would like to take this opportunity to apologize for any inconvenience this has caused you. Direct reservations have the ability to cancel or modify reservations 24hrs before your arrival date also keep in mind room types and rates will depend on availability. Unfortunately we don’t have an establish shipping company therefore guests are required to arrange shipping arrangements.

Summary: Nice rooms, spacious, good ammenities, close to DisneyLand.. loved every bit of it.. can even see the DisneyLand fireworks from balocny :-)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking your time and sharing your resent experience at Daysinn. I'm happy to hear that great experience with us and met your expectations. It is always a pleasure knowing our guests loved their stay. Thank you so much for staying with us, and we look forward to taking care of you during your next stay!

Summary Heading: small flying bugs all over, I have killed one fly, lot of...
Summary: small flying bugs all over, I have killed one fly, lot of fruit fly even I sprayed lysol and left the room,4 hrs after we came back, theres some more flies.Room smells like back-up septic tank.
Manager Response: I have reviewed your comments and every possible measure will be taken to ensure that the issues will be investigated and resolved in the near future. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience you experienced. I am disappointed to note of the experiences that you had encountered and would like to sincerely apologize for all the inconvenience caused and that we have failed to meet your expectations during your stay at Daysinn I do hope we will have the occasion to welcome you back again and to exceed your expectations on your next stay.

Summary Heading: Blood splatter, spider, and pee smells......oh my!
Summary: Well, let's begin by painting a picture of the scene. We walk up the creeky stairs and nowhere are there signs to find your room. We finally burst into our room and the smell of urine and other bodily fluids overwhelmingly gush out of the door. We take a look at the wall and there it is ....a big fat spider! Finally we get accustomed  to the smell and we get in bed and turn on the Tv from 1999.  We  look at the ceiling and we saw what appeared to be blood splatter!!! It very well could have been ketchup, so we decided to laugh about it and go to sleep. Long story short, DO NOT STAY HERE!
Manager Response: I am very sorry to hear you did not leave Daysinn with a positive memory as my team and I strive to make sure everyone departs the Daysinn having had a great time and enjoyed their stay. Thank you again for your feedback and I am disappointed to note of the experiences that you had encountered and would like to sincerely apologize for all the inconvenience caused and that we have failed to meet your expectations during your stay at Daysinn.

Summary Heading: Our stay was ok, very quite and great location. The problem...
Summary: Our stay was ok, very quite and great location. The problem we had was that the iron wasn't working and very bad smell came out from the sink.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thanks you verry much for your positive review and I apologize for the two issues you mentioned. We recently purchased many new irons and will ensure to replace (if not already done) your room as to not have this problem.  we are also researching the odor you mentioned as we have not heard this issue in the past. Thank you for bringing to our attention. We thank you for poiting out the sleep quality was great. Our new beds are enjoyed by most. As you pointed out our location is great to Disney as well as many restaurants in teh area. We look forward to your next visit and please conact us directly if we can assist you.

Summary: There shouldnt be an extra charge for room on the ground floor Breakfast items were not of good quality
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your comments We are very sorry to hear that you did not enjoy our continental breakfast and unfortunately are lower floor rooms have a slightly higher rates then are 2nd floor rooms for convenience. Next time i would recommend giving us a call to arrange combinations. We are sure your next visit would be more pleasurable

Summary: The room was dirty the carpet was filthy! The Reseptionist was rude! It was a very unpleasant experience!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your comments, we are sorry to hear that you had a disappointed experience. Possible measure will be taken to ensure that the issues will be investigated and resolved in the near future.  Are team works hard to deliver a Safe, clean, warm hospitality to all are guests.

Summary: The service was excellent, the people were very nice and very helpful. we were not far from Disneyland but this Days Inn had a shuttle to take us to and from Disneyland. the only Bad thing was the Van was small and it was first come first serve and the other guest crowded!
Manager Response: Your kind words make us strive to give the same experience to each and every guest. It is always a pleasure knowing our guests loved their stay. Thank you so much for staying with us, and we look forward to taking care of you during your next stay!

Summary: The staff were great. Shuttle service was nice, eventhough I was on my son's timing. So we walked to Disney and back during most of our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking your time and sharing your resent experience at Daysinn. I'm happy to hear that my staff were friendly and helpful.We take great pride in the service that we provide and work diligently to ensure that each and every person that stays at Daysinn has a great time

Summary: The room felt musty and had an odor. The carpets felt sticky under the feet. There was a spider in the bath tub when we first checked in. The bathroom door would stay half-closed so we had to use the trash can to keep it open. The continental breakfast was pathetic. Coffee was watered down and there not a lot of selection. They cut one banana  in 3 pieces, maybe so no one can take them. I found that unsanitary.  Otherwise, the motel was conveniently walking distance to Disneyland and there were many places to eat around the area.
Manager Response: I have reviewed your comments and every possible measure will be taken to ensure that the issues will be investigated and resolved in the near future. It is truly unfortunate that we failed due the floorboards and the quality of your sleep and I truly apologize for that. It was our pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope you can give us a chance to gain you back as a customer in the near future.

Summary: Great stay. Very nice hotel. Location is perfect for visiting Disney. Rooms clean, and comfortable. All the staff we met were very friendly and helpful.Would definitly recommend this property.
Manager Response: What a wonderful review!!! Thank you so much for taking time to post your excellent feedback about Daysinn here on Trip Advisor. I am delighted to learn that you truly enjoyed your stay with us and that the services of my team met your expectations. Thank you for pointing out how clean and comfortable your room was and that continental breakfast also met your expectations. We take great pride in the service that we provide and work diligently to ensure that each and every person that stays at Daysinn has a great time.

Summary: there were cockroaches in our second  room and our first on the cable dint work, and the breakfast wasn't as good  and shuttle was early and didn't wait for people when they pick up from Disney land wasn't happy
Manager Response: Thank you  for your feedback and I am disappointed to note of the experiences that you had encountered and would like to sincerely apologize for all the inconvenience this has caused you and that we have failed to meet your expectations during your stay at Daysinn, are Team makes every effort to deliver upon the high standards we have set ourselves. Possible measure will be taken to ensure that the issues will be investigated and resolved in the near future. Are team works hard to deliver a Safe, clean environment to all are guest  again I apologize for any inconvenience you experienced.

Summary Heading: A REAL review from a REAL family.
Summary: This hotel was terrible. I have multiple pictures of mold throughout the whole room, the front desk man on weekday nights was rude and just didnt care about my needs or concerns. It plainly states free airport and Disneyland shuttle on the website. This is also not the case. We booked this room 4 months ahead of time for 5 nights, the service and mold was so bad we actually checked out after 2 nights and went to another hotel. WE WALKED 2 miles to a better hotel at 11 PM, a family of 5. i cannot express how bad this hotel was. I honestly cannot think of one ok thing about this hotel. from the shuttle service, mold, rudeness of front desk to the free generic stale breakfast cereal. i can honestly say that i WILL NEVER stay at another Days Inn or Wyndam Worldwide property again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at Daysinn. We value all forms of guest feedback as an opportunity to continually improve our facilities and services for our guests. Our team at Daysinn makes every effort to deliver upon the high standards we have set ourselves. We strive to ensure our guests recognize the facilities and services we provide as offering a high level of value and a warmly memorable experience.

Summary: Chose this for location, shuttle and breakfast included.  Shuttle did not run at needed times, breakfast was lame.  Rooms cheesy and dirty.  People smoking everywhere, including employees.  Loud popping noises right behind hotel at about 9:40 Pm- we finally figured out it was probably the fireworks for Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review on Trip Advisor. I am disappointed to note of the experiences that you had encountered and would like to sincerely apologize for all the inconvenience caused and that we have failed to meet your expectations during your stay at Daysinn.

Summary: Where to begin? The staff was unfriendly the room was sooo outdate and rundown.  The repairs were obvious and poorly done.  The sheets were stained.  The towels were old and bleached to a yellow color.  Their shuttle to dineyland is a cargo van and fills up quick so be there early! (And the seat belts r all broken). They do have free breakfast but it doesn't make up for all the short falls. The road noise is awful and the pillows are hard.  The mattresses are old and rutted. Just gross, gross, gross.  Spend more and go somewhere else.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on TripAdvisor following your recent stay with us at Daysinn. I understand that certain aspects of your stay were disappointing and would like to take this opportunity to apologize for any inconvenience caused. A courteous, friendly and caring attitude is what Daysinn staff usually gets praised and recognized for and it is disappointing that we have failed to provide these service levels on this occasion. I will use these comments for on-going staff training, Daysinn improvements and to better ourselves for all our future guests. I apologize for any inconvenience you experienced and I am sorry to hear that Daysinn wasn’t your type of hotel.

Summary Heading: We arrived late nite so we decided to go straight to bed...
Summary: We arrived late nite so we decided to go straight to bed.  In the morning, we noticed how dirty the carpet was, it also had several burn marks.  The shower head was very loose and we only got drips of water when taking a shower.  The faucet in the sink was too hard and we couldn't get hot water.  The box spring on the bed was exposed as the sheets were too small for the bed.  I would not recommend this Hotel at all!  The hotel clerk on arrival was very nice, however, the assistant manager a I checked out with was very rude.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at Daysinn. We value all forms of guest feedback as an opportunity to continually improve our facilities and services for our guests. Our team at Daysinn makes every effort to deliver upon the high standards we have set ourselves. We strive to ensure our guests recognize the facilities and services we provide as offering a high level of value and a warmly memorable experience.

Summary Heading: Very helpful staff.  Missed shuttle and they went right...
Summary: Very helpful staff.  Missed shuttle and they went right back for us.  Only stayed one day but let us pack through the next evening.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for writing such wonderful comments and feedback about Daysinn on TripAdvisor. I'm so happy that we were not just your last minute accommodation, but also that Daysinn was a fantastic place to stay. I am delighted to hear that you were happily satisfied with your stay.

Summary Heading: Room was fine..however there was nothing that my diabetic...
Summary: Room was fine..however there was nothing that my diabetic husband Could have for breakfast so we ate elsewhere.  We were on a 1st floor room and heard the people above us walking...a bit disturbing,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review on TripAdvisor. I'm pleased to hear that you liked our spacious room and that staff were excellent, welcoming and friendly. i understand youre husband is diabetic and couldnt have anything from our continental breakfast. we are working on that and will be resloved soon and for the nose issue i would recommend calling our front desk they can take care of that.

Summary Heading: Great hotel to stay at for Disneyland Resort
Summary: The one thing I LOVE about this hotel is free shuttle rides to Disneyland! You can also watch the Disneyland fireworks from the hotel.
Manager Response: I am delighted to learn that you truly enjoyed your stay with us and that the services of my team met your expectations.I am pleased you were given great service from the staff and you were happy with your stay  We hope you will return to daysinn in the future and we will ensure our driver will be there to assist you in your next trip.

Summary: Good location, free transportation to Disney not what was expected - was stranded at park when shuttle did not arrive one hour after park closed.  Many families had towalk or take cab back to hotel - Hotel staff just said sorry - better communication of service needed.   Otherwise room was what we expected for the price.  Hotel needs update.  Service at breakfast poor when compared to BestWestern breaffast.
Manager Response: Thank you  for your feedback and I am disappointed to note of the experiences that you had encountered and would like to sincerely apologize for all the inconvenience this has caused you and that we have failed to meet your expectations during your stay at Daysinn, are Team makes every effort to deliver upon the high standards we have set ourselves. Please accept my apology for the issues you faced during your stay.
at least Thank you for taking the time to rate your stay

Summary: The room wasn't the cleanest. The towels and sheets could all be replaced. Especially the towels they are over used and ready to be thrown away. It would be nice if bags for the ice bucket were refilled and the dressers bottom in the drawers wasn't broken. Also I don't like that the made would organize my things. It really bothers me. One day my boyfriends tooth brush was lined faced down touching the sink. Its very unsanitary, gross, and should not have happened. I'd appreciate if I can place my things where I do choose and not have them moved. The bus shuttle system to Disney is not great either. They only go at one time every so often and sometimes leave too early. Most hotels have shuttles when they are needed by guests so that no waiting or over planning around someone else
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking your time and sharing your resent experience at Daysinn.i understand you had a misunderstanding with our shuttletimes. well it runs once every hour on the half before and after the park closes. A printed copy of our shuttle schedule is givien to every guest upon check in with exact times of departure and arrival times. next time i would recommend contacting our front desk for detailed information. Again I would like to apologize for any inconvenience you experienced and I am sorry to hear that we haven't met your expectations.

Summary: The hotel is conveniently located near Disneyland with convenient shuttle service and easy access to the parking structure for those with annual passes.  Rooms are clean and roomy and the beds are comfortable.  The  pool and jacuzzi are clean and available.  And parking is not a problem.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review on Trip Advisor. I'm pleased to hear that you liked our spacious room and that staff were excellent, welcoming and friendly. 'm so happy that we were not just your last minute accommodation, but also that Daysinn was a fantastic place to stay. I am delighted to hear that you were happily satisfied with your stay. I appreciate you taking the time to compliment us on our hospitality, cleanness and service. We strive to provide our guests with clean, comfortable accommodations and great customer service

Summary: It is a very good option if you are just about to visit Disney, it is pretty close and location is convennient.
Manager Response: Your kind words make us strive to give the same experience to each and every guest. It is always a pleasure knowing our guests loved their stay. Thank you so much for staying with us, and we look forward to taking care of you during your next stay!

Summary Heading: A nice hotel in a good location for Disneyland
Summary: Having read some of the reviews about this hotel I was nervous before my stay - and had even looked at moving my booking but I'm glad I didnt !! We had 3 ground floor rooms, for 5 nights. The rooms were all clean and well maintained, had a coffee maker, microwave, safe and fridge. The breakfast was ample, including fruit, bread, bagels, doughnuts, croissants, juice, coffee and 3 types of cereal. The swimming pool and jacuzzi were heated, and beautifully warm - great for the children. We found the front desk staff to be friendly and helpful. The free internet was patchy - but worked well in the breakfast room. The only thing I would alter is the size of the shuttle bus. It only goes once an hour, and holds about 10 people, and as it was holidays there were always more people
Manager Response: What a wonderful review!!! Thank you so much for taking time to post your excellent feedback about Daysinn here on Trip Advisor. I am delighted to learn that you truly enjoyed your stay with us and that the services of my team met your expectations. Thank you for pointing out how clean and comfortable your room was and that continental breakfast also met your expectations. We take great pride in the service that we provide and work diligently to ensure that each and every person that stays at Daysinn has a great time.

Summary: $89. dollar room with a $119. + charges cost....hotel is old, dingy, outdated, not clean, noisy, wi-fi didn't work  , room to room calling didn't work from our room ....busy weekend most area hotels were booked....wouldn't stay here again, multiple lights didn't work,  unknowledgeable  staff , too much to list....save yourself the trouble and stay somewhere else...we sure will
Manager Response: Thank you again for your feedback and I am disappointed to note of the experiences that you had encountered and would like to sincerely apologize for all the inconvenience caused and that we have failed to meet your expectations during your stay at Daysinn

Summary Heading: Ok if I only paid for 1 room as I got
Summary: The room was clean and the staff was friendly! Although unhelpful for what I needed. They gave me a phone # to call that was worse!! I got disconnected 3 times and they were not able to help me anyways! I had to call in the morning and I still am being charged for 2 other rooms that were not used even though I called asap to take care of the problem!!!  Then there was no hot water pressure at all!!! I did report the problem and they went to service it but didn't work at all. Location was great, shuttle driver was super nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review on Trip Advisor. I'm pleased to hear that you liked our spacious room and that staff were excellent, welcoming and friendly.  Unfortunately the experience you had at your 3rd party provider is off ours hands there is very little we can do in that regards But I would recommend booking directly though us on your next trip

Summary: Every staff member we came into contact with during our stay was extremely rude. There was some sort of a mix up with the reservation so it didn't say I needed I handicap accessible room when in reality we did. The man at the front desk acted like we were inconveiniencing him by asking for a downstairs room because my mother is disabled and can't climb stairs. He told me it was my fault for not reserving it right, and there was nothing he could do but cancel our reservation. I had to threaten to call the AMA before he magically had an open room on the bottom floor for us. The woman at the front desk the following morning snapped at my wife because she asked if we could put our stroller in the shuttle van to Disneyland. My 19 month old ate a muffin in the room and there were
Manager Response: I have reviewed your comments and every possible measure will be taken to ensure that the issues will be investigated and resolved in the near future. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience you experienced. I do hope we will have the occasion to welcome you back again and to exceed your expectations on your next stay.

Summary Heading: The room was limited with supplies, such as towels and...
Summary: The room was limited with supplies, such as towels and toilet paper, pillows. I requested extra and there was less then the first night. breakfast was donuts and the coffee cups with miniature size.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking your time and sharing your resent experience at Daysinn. i  hope your trip was a memorable one Thank you so much for staying with us, and we look forward to taking care of you during your next stay!

Summary Heading: Overall, the stay was satisfactory. There were two serious...
Summary: Overall, the stay was satisfactory. There were two serious downsides. The first was that the WIFI, ironically free by the way, was slow and very intermittent. I would recommend this facility if you weren't going to use the WIFI, otherwise, find another place. The second was the "Continental Breakfast". It was minimal and of poor quality.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at Daysinn. We value all forms of guest feedback as an opportunity to continually improve our facilities and services for our guests. I'm sorry to learn that your experience with us did not meet your expectations with the two issues we are working hard to correct these problems and hope your next vist will exceed your expectations

Summary: The room was big enough for the 6 of us.  A little dark as it was tucked in a corner.  As with most places we have stayed, the carpet is not the best and the sofa cushions could use some cleaning.  The room has a microwave and fridge which worked fine.  The bed sheets were clean and we all slept well.  We could not connect to the free WiFi.  Don't know if it was the location of the room or what. Did not use the hotel shuttle.  We drove to Disneyland which took a couple of minutes.  This hotel was a little to far for us to walk to Disneyland.
