We usually stay at a hotel within walking distance of Disneyland but they were all booked.  This was a satisfactory substitute and would consider staying again if cost is an issue.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review on TripAdvisor. I'm pleased to hear that you liked our spacious room and that staff were excellent, welcoming and friendly. I am delighted to learn that you truly enjoyed your stay with us and that the services of my team met your expectations. Thank you for pointing out how clean and comfortable your room was and that continental breakfast also met your expectations. We take great pride in the service that we provide and work diligently to ensure that each and every person that stays at Daysinn has a great time

Summary: We had a wonderful time at Day's Inn. We would have preferred a Jacuzzi in our room, otherwise we had a great stay. It was close, clean,And loved it. We try and stay at Day's Inn.  Thank You:)
Manager Response: Your kind words make us strive to give the same experience to each and every guest. It is always a pleasure knowing our guests loved their stay. Thank you so much for staying with us, and we look forward to taking care of you during your next stay!

Summary: Hotel was very close to Disney Parks. Clean beds and bathroom. Hot water pressure was like a drizzle but it was ok.  I would stay here again and recommend friends.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for writing such wonderful comments and feedback about Daysinn on TripAdvisor. I'm so happy that we were not just your last minute accommodation, but also that Daysinn was a fantastic place to stay. I am delighted to hear that you were happily satisfied with your stay. I appreciate you taking the time to compliment us on our hospitality, cleanness and service. We strive to provide our guests with clean, comfortable accommodations and great customer service

Summary: very good experience, loved the fact that the room we stayed in had a litle refridgirator and microwave! we will definately return and recommend it to our friends and family!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for writing such wonderful comments and feedback about Daysinn on TripAdvisor. I'm so happy that we were not just your last minute accommodation, but also that Daysinn was a fantastic place to stay. I am delighted to hear that you were happily satisfied with your stay, and hope to see you back soon.

Summary Heading: No internet in the room was very dissapointing and inconvenient
Summary: One of the main reasons I chose this hotel, besides its proximity to Disney was because it was supposed to have internet in the rooms.however the internet connection was terrible and 95% of the time we didn't have one.
Manager Response: Thank you  for your feedback and I am disappointed to note of the experiences that you had encountered and would like to sincerely apologize for all the inconvenience this has caused you and that we have failed to meet your expectations during your stay at Daysinn. We have taken measure to ensure internet issues don’t occur. Also I would like you to review our business type’s rooms they are the best located rooms in our hotel for fast and reliable internet connection.

Summary: need  to be remoldeled big time,need,s fresh carpet fresh everything,but a mile away  disneyland,there,s breakfast,,,was  a diet so if your on a diet it was great.....lol...the pool was heated that was great  in the end of march.....so just slept and left.... no big deal ,if eveything is all booked up  ,but i wouldnt spend two nights......give it one star for the heated pool ,and ceral and donuts,, oh yea  orange juice.......
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at Daysinn. We value all forms of guest feedback as an opportunity to continually improve our facilities and services for our guests. Our team at Daysinn makes every effort to deliver upon the high standards we have set ourselves. We strive to ensure our guests recognize the facilities and services we provide as offering a high level of value and a warmly memorable experience. We are also sorry to hear that your stay at Daysinn was not 100% and we have taken all of your feedback on board to help improve a few of the things which you have stated.

Summary: The trip was nice and Days Inn was very close to Disneyland, it was nice to have a shuttle to and from Disneyland at all hours in the morning and night. Overall great stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your generous compliments about the staff and for taking the time to share your comments with us.It was our pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope you can give us a chance to gain you back as a customer in the near future.

Summary: Prior to staying here, we stayed in San Diego at a Howard Johnson Hotel. It was a complete HELL hole! When we arrived at the Days Inn, we instantly fell in love. We loved the Disneyland shuttle, the continental breakfast, the excellent staff, and the cleanliness of our room. We will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Your kind words make us strive to give the same experience to each and every guest. It is always a pleasure knowing our guests loved their stay. Thank you so much for staying with us, and we look forward to taking care of you during your next stay!

Summary: The room was adequate, but not perfect. The room was very dirty.  However, very close to Disneyland!h
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at Daysinn. We value all forms of guest feedback as an opportunity to improve. We strive to ensure our guests recognize the facilities and services we provide a value and a warmly memorable experience. Hopefully on your next stay we will surpass your expectations.

Summary: I had to fight to get a bottom floor room because I had handicapped people and they don't have an elevator (and don't mention that on their site). There was also no towels at all in the room. We were give incorrect shuttle times which wasted over an hour of our time. There should also be more shuttles to Disneyland instead of the once per hour currently. The room was ok and the value of the room is good but this place needs more work and their staff better trained and they need to learn to be more helpful.
Manager Response: Unfortunately handicapped room are required to be arrange and reserved ahead of time, as we do have limited availability on assessable handicapped rooms. I would recommend visiting our direct site at daysinn.com it fully detailed with are double queens, king side beds, business, and our extended size rooms are handicapped rooms are also listed. Upon check-in our guests are informed about our services with a printed shuttle times and hotel map breakfast times and etc…  Thank you  for your feedback and I am disappointed to note of the experiences that you had encountered and would like to sincerely apologize for all the inconvenience this has caused you and that we have failed to meet your expectations during your stay at Daysinn, are Team makes every effort to deliver upon the high standards we have set ourselves. To ensure our guests a high level of value and a warmly memorable experience.

Summary: Overall, the stay was just OK. Nothing special or anything extra to be found here. It is a great location alternative for Disneyland trips as it is well within walking distance. Shuttles were late and too small to fit everyone at once. Breakfast was very minimal. I've stayed at better Days Inn's in the past.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on TripAdvisor following your recent stay with us at Daysinn. We value all forms of guest feedback as an opportunity to continually improve our facilities and services for our guests. I do hope we will have the occasion to welcome you back again and to exceed your expectations on your next stay.

Summary: it is worth it for the price $79 a night and its a clean hotel. We love our stay here and we highly recommend it.
Manager Response: I am delighted to hear that you were happily satisfied with your stay.Thank you very much for writing such wonderful comments and feedback about Daysinn on TripAdvisor. We take great pride in the service that we provide and work diligently to ensure that each and every person that stays at Daysinn has a great time.

Summary: Excellent service  everything was clean and the staff was friendly        great experience I'll go back again and I recommend
Manager Response: well what can i say thank you very much for writing such wonderful comments and feedback about Daysinn. I'm so happy that we were not just your last minute accommodation, but also that Daysinn was a fantastic place to stay.

Summary: We stayed three days at this hotel to go to Disneyland. The price was good and the staff was nice. It is a basic room without many frills. We could hear the people walking above us but it was not too bothersome. The towels could have been better and the place could use a coat of paint but it was a decent hotel for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at Daysinn. We value all forms of guest feedback as an opportunity to continually improve our facilities and services for our guests. It was our pleasure to have you as our guest. I do hope we will have the occasion to welcome you back again and to exceed your expectations on your next stay.

Summary: This motel was chosen due to location (close to Disney for conference), and because shuttle and breakfast was included.  The shuttle did not run early enough to get to the conference, so there was the added expense of taxis daily.  The breakfast was mostly sugar and carbs- we skipped it each day (and went to Starbucks across the street- this is the only "Excellent" portion of this review.  The room had peeling paint, ugly/old decor, and a sink that smelled like mold/mildew/grunge.  On Friday evening, it sounded as if there was a gunfight outside, but we discovered the fireworks were being shot off right behind our room, but since our window was facing the parking lot, we couldn't even see the show.  Doors/windows facing outside- no interior hallways.  Rickety outside stairs/no
Manager Response: I have reviewed your comments and every possible measure will be taken to ensure that the issues will be investigated and resolved in the near future. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience you experienced. I do hope we will have the occasion to welcome you back again and to exceed your expectations on your next stay.

Summary: We chose this hotel for our trip to Disneyland because it had the best online deal. We had never stayed with Days Inn before. The staff is ok there not friendly but they are not rude. We were hardly at the hotel except for sleep.The room was good comfortable bed and good cable. The "free" breakfast is alright its basically what you would eat at home if you did not have much time to eat. The only problem we had is that we were on the same level were the breakfast was served so there kids and adults running by talking loud or shouting.  Overall i would stay here again if they had the same online deal.
Manager Response: We are also sorry to hear that your stay at Daysinn was not 100% satisfied. i would like to sincerely apologize about the nois, but i am delighted to learn that you truly enjoyed your stay with us and that the services of my team met your expectations. It was our pleasure to have you as our guest we will love to have to back, give us a call directly for the best available rate on your next stay.

Summary Heading: staff was nice, location ideal but room was not very clean
Summary: Beds were comfortable. Bed spread was old and dirty. Carpet was so dirty that my children's feet were black within minutes of arrival. My 4 yr old was on his knees bedside to play with toys and when he stood up the tops of his feet were black. Towel racks dirty and towels were small and rough like sand paper. Pool doesn't open till 10am which we thought was rather late. WiFi signal was very weak. Shuttle and proximity to Disneyland were ideal and staff was very friendly and helpful. Great rate.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on following your recent stay with us at Daysinn. I understand that certain aspects of your stay were disappointing and would like to take this opportunity to apologize for any inconvenience caused. I have reviewed your comments and every possible measure will be taken to ensure that the issues will be investigated and resolved in the near future. It was our pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope you can give us a chance to gain you back as a customer in the near future.

Summary: To my pleasant surprise, DAYS INN was fantastic:check in,continental breakfast,comfort of room, YES!
Manager Response: It is always a pleasure knowing our guests loved their stay. Thank you so much for staying with us, and we look forward to taking care of you during your next stay!

Summary: I was nervous prior to booking our room; after reading some of the reviews. I figured I would give it a try anyway... I was very pleased with my stay. The room was clean and comfortable. The price was very fair. We had plenty of hot water, clean sheets & towels.  My kids enjoyed swimming in the heated pool. I definately will stay here over Motel 6. It's nice to have a microwave, refrigerator, wifi, and shuttle to DIsneyland without being charged. Motel 6 charges for Everything!!!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your generous compliments im very happy to know Days inn has meet your expectations during your stay with us, are Team makes every effort to deliver upon the high standards we have set ourselves. To ensure our guests a high level of value and a warmly memorable experience. i hope you chose us again on your next trip to Disneyland and not motel 6.

Summary: The bathroom shower hot water barely dripped out  The toilet seat was broken, and it looked like there was mold around the caulking of toilet seat   I wasnt expecting much for the price...but it was very poor quality .
Manager Response: I have reviewed your comments and every possible measure will be taken to ensure that the issues will be investigated and resolved in the near future. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience you experienced. I do hope we will have the occasion to welcome you back again and to exceed your expectations on your next stay.

Summary: the room was clean, the beds were comfortable and the breakfast had donuts! what more could you ask for!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking time to post your excellent feedback about Daysinn. I am delighted to learn that you truly enjoyed your stay with us and that the services of my team met your expectations.We take great pride in the service that we provide and work diligently to ensure that each and every person that stays at Daysinn has a great time.

Summary Heading: you get what you pay for
Summary: We had to request a room change because the side of one of the beds was wet. You can hear every step taken by the occupants above. The rooms are run down and out of date. A complete overhall is needed. The location was really close to the park and the shuttle drivers were punctual.
Manager Response: Thank you  for your feedback and I am disappointed to note of the experiences that you had encountered and would like to sincerely apologize for all the inconvenience this has caused you and that we have failed to meet your expectations during your stay at Daysinn, are Team makes every effort to deliver upon the high standards we have set ourselves. To ensure our guests a high level of value and a warmly memorable experience.

Summary Heading: staff was friendly. it would have been nice to have a few...
Summary: staff was friendly. it would have been nice to have a few more pick up times from disney later in the evening. we ended up walking 2 nights.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for giving us wonderful review. I am very sorry to hear you had to walk 2 nights i'll be taking every possible measure to ensure this doesn't happen again. our shuttle depart once every hour on the half on normal pack hours. 30min before it opens and 30min after it closes. . I do hope we will have the occasion to welcome you back again and to exceed your expectations on your next stay.

Summary Heading: The hotel was terrible. The shower head was falling off the...
Summary: The hotel was terrible. The shower head was falling off the wall and all the bathroom walls had severe water damage. Our family will never stay with Days Inn anywhere ever again. We were very disappointing. The walls were so thin, we could hear our neighbors talking constantly. The TV remote did not work even when they tried to fix it.
Manager Response: I have reviewed your comments and every possible measure will be taken to ensure that the issues will be investigated and resolved in the near future.Thank you  for your feedback and I am disappointed to note of the experiences that you had encountered and would like to sincerely apologize for all the inconvenience this has caused you and that we have failed to meet your expectations during your stay at Daysinn

Summary Heading: Not what I expected from Days Inn
Summary: I have stayed at other Days Inn hotels in California and New York and none have been like this.  First the location was really good and not difficult to find.  Here are the cons of our stay: 1.  The couch in our room was filthy - it had stains all over it and we covered it with the comforter from the bed; 2.  The shuttle they offer, while free, only runs every hour and sometimes every 2 hours.  Given the price we paid and having stayed at other hotels in the Disneyland area...we found the Motel 6 was cleaner and better then the Days Inn.    We were disappointed and will probably not be staying here again unless they do an entire remodel or get new furniture.  I should have listened to the reviews more closely.  Well live and learn.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your concerns with the hotel. All comments good or bad are taken very serious in order to help us to give the best service we can provide. All issues are recorded by front desk, housekeeping and even maintenance.We work constantly to improve the quality of our product and services, and to ensure that every experience with us is warm and enjoyable

Summary: We went to Disneyland and the hotel was the best price option for us within walking distance of the park. However during our four night stay we did not receive towels from house cleaning once. They came in and took the towels on the floor, but did not clean/tidy the room including not emptying the garbage. Our sink was also clogged from the minute we got there, but it was not worth the trouble for us to complain. The people at the front desk were kind and the continental breakfast was fine. My advice is to spend an extra $10-20 a night and pick a hotel closer with better amenities and rating.
Manager Response: Please accept my apology for any inconveniences you experienced during your recent visit at our Days Inn. Our success is measured by our guests having a pleasant stay.  And by that we strive to provide excellent service and accommodations at an affordable price.  I am sorry for the events that took place while you stayed with us.  My team and I always shoot for a 100% but sometimes fall short.  Sometimes the control over certain events is harder than others to prevent. I sincerely hope you will give us another opportunity to extend our services in hospitality.  If you have any questions, please contact the hotel.

Summary: the place needed a little bit of cosmetic touch ups but overall a great place for a vacation. Very kid friendly and convenient in proximity to Disneyland and such a great deal for budget conscious families
Manager Response: What a wonderful review!!! Thank you so much for taking time to post your excellent feedback about Daysinn here on Trip Advisor. I am delighted to learn that you truly enjoyed your stay with us and that the services of my team met your expectations.

Summary: To be honest, we left.  There was no way I was going to stay in that room.  It reminded me of a seedy motel in a movie, with kids screaming in the pool area until 10:00pm and their parents hanging off the 2nd floor balcony yelling, smoking and drinking.  The rooms were gross and smelled like mold.  I pulled back the bed spread to look at the mattress and box springs and they were stained and dusty.  We just left without even asking for our money back and found a nice clean hotel about a mile away.
Manager Response: I have reviewed your comments and every possible measure will be taken to ensure that the issues will be investigated and resolved in the near future. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience you experienced.

Summary: the room smells like a damp underground garage! No  wifi in room actually at all (you have seen signals but can not log on and if you are luck to log in ,it is unsteady and slow like a snail). when you open the light in the bathroom, it sounds like a jet taking of all the staff is poke faced the shabby computer in the lobby will charge you 4dollar! Free shuttle is the only merit.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on TripAdvisor following your recent stay with us at Daysinn. I understand that certain aspects of your stay were disappointing and would like to take this opportunity to apologize for any inconvenience caused. A courteous, friendly and caring attitude is what Daysinn staff usually gets praised and recognized for and it is disappointing that we have failed to provide these service levels on this occasion. I will use these comments for on-going staff training, Daysinn improvements and to better ourselves for all our future guests.  I apologize for any inconvenience you experienced and I am sorry to hear that Daysinn wasn’t your type of hotel.

Summary: Needed to find a room for the night unexpectedly.  This was a great price for myself and my three children.  Room had 2 beds, was very nice, clean and comfortable.  Only complaint was the bathroom fan was very noisy in room 207, but that was only a problem when trying to not wake the children during morning shower.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for writing such wonderful comments and feedback about Daysinn on TripAdvisor. I'm so happy that we were not just your last minute accommodation, but also that Daysinn was a fantastic place to stay. I am delighted to hear that you were happily satisfied with your stay. I appreciate you taking the time to compliment us on our hospitality, cleanness and service. We strive to provide our guests with clean, comfortable accommodations and great customer service

Summary: We were there to go to Disneyland and meet family and friends for dinner. We arrived at the hotel to check in and get ready to head out to dinner (we were meeting other people there) But the check in took forever...our initial room had a dead battery and they had to come open the door for us, it took a long time for the guy to come and help us with that. Once in our room, he said he would send someone up to fix the battery problem, we told him we were in a hurry to get ready and out of there, but they sent someone up while we were getting ready, I told him to come back when we were gone in about 10 mins. a request that he seemed put out by.  Eventually they decided they would move us to a different room, which also took a long time...they didn't even seem to care we requested to
Manager Response: Thank you  for your feedback and I am disappointed to note of the experiences that you had encountered and would like to sincerely apologize for all the inconvenience this has caused you and that we have failed to meet your expectations during your stay at Daysinn. measure will be taken to ensure that the issues will be resolved

Summary: I stayed here with my mom for a long weekend at Disneyland.   Pros:  Location. It's  about 1/2 mile from the parks. Shuttle. Comes every hour on the half hour; I stress how great this is in the evening, when you're tired. Price. We paid about $60/night.  Front desk. There is always someone to help you, even if they forget to follow-up (more on that below). I left my coat in my room after checking out, and they held it in the reception until I came back for it.   Cons: Sound proofing. You can hear every car, footfall, and handrail grasp. This didn't bother us, but if you're a light sleeper, be wary (and not weary ;0] ). Service follow-up. The coffee pot in our room was broken when we arrived. We reported this the first night, but nothing was done about it, even though we stressed
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at Daysinn. We value all forms of guest feedback as an opportunity to continually improve our facilities and services for our guests. I'm pleased to hear that you liked our spacious room and that staff were excellent, welcoming and friendly. Unfortunately the experience you had at Daysinn haven't met your expectations and you left Daysinn with big disappointment. Please accept my apology for the issues you faced during your stay.

Summary: The location was right next to Disneyland and close to the freeway, which was nice. The bathroom was disgusting. The shower did not drain and the faucet was barely attached. I decided against taking a shower that night. There were bugs and hair on the bathroom floor too. Walls are paper thin so sleeping was pretty difficult. I would suggest paying a little more to stay somewhere much better.
Manager Response: I have reviewed your comments and every possible measure will be taken to ensure that the issues will be investigated and resolved in the near future. It is truly unfortunate that we failed due the floorboards and the quality of your sleep and I truly apologize for that. It was our pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope you can give us a chance to gain you back as a customer in the near future.

Summary Heading: Not as close to Disneyland as they say it is
Summary: The good thing was the room was nice and big and it was clean. However you can hear everytime someone turned on the water and people upstairs, I had a very hard time falling asleep. Then the TV went out and we asked for people come to fix it, we waited an hour, nobody came, and we ended up leaving. And my biggest complaint is when I called to reserve I asked how close it was to Disneyland, they said 2 lights, but they "forgot" to mention it was 2 long lights which were up and over the freeway, I didn't even want to think about if I had kids what I would do. If they would have told the truth I probably would have accepted and dealt with it, but they lied to get a customer and therefore I will not have repeat stay, especially because there are so many other hotels to stay around
Manager Response: I am so sorry to hear we have failed to meet your expectations. I do want to thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us as this tells us what an Amazing opportunity for Growth we have. I will share your comments with my staff and ownership to cure such defaults hoping no one experiences such a horrible stay. Thanks again!

Summary: My fiancé and I stayed here back in September. Days Inn was absolutely perfect for us. The shuttle operated once an hour, but the park is only a 10 minute walk away. Every day but one, we decided to walk to and from the park to save some time. On a budget, this is the place to stay. The continental breakfast here was better than it was at The Tropicana where we stayed most recently. Sure it is not super fancy. You do get what you pay for, and then some. My fiancé and I will be staying here again so long as another trip is in our budget.
Manager Response: Your kind words make us strive to give the same experience to each and every guest. It is always a pleasure knowing our guests loved their stay. Thank you so much for staying with us, and we look forward to taking care of you during your next stay!

Summary Heading: unsatisfactory stay and unfavorable management attention
Summary: The ac was too noisy and the carpet smelled badly, the second room i was changed to had a bathroom tub drip.  The shuttle service was not adequate to the number of people waiting, people became hostil.  Management was indiferant to the problems to the extent the manager stated that if we did not like it, to go
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to comment about your most recent experience at our hotel. I am terribly sorry your experience was not a pleasant one; our main goal is to have guest happy and I am sorry we failed to meet your expectations. It is very clear you would not give us another opportunity and I am sorry. I wish you the best of luck on all your future trips and lodging experiences.

Summary: The towels were so rough I had to dry myself with the  hair dryer and the carpets also needed to be cleaned. Also the sheets kept coming off the bed the shower head was terrible it felt like there was way to much pressue.
Manager Response: I apologize for your feeling that the room was dirty. I will go through our housekeeping procedures and review our training for the staff immediately. We have a carpet cleaning schedule that we try to hold to, however this has been an extremely busy few months. I will make sure that we are more observant with scheduling extra cleaning. Thank you for bringing this situation to my attention, guest feedback is extremely important for this very reason. I hope you can come back soon and see the rooms freshly cleaned carpets!

Summary Heading: The room was ok, the shuttle services to disneyland was...
Summary: The room was ok, the shuttle services to disneyland was great.  Their TV sucks, its a very old tv, looks like 20 years old. And there was no good channels available, no cable.  That is so cheap.  They should update all their appliances, its very old, I don't even know how to work it.  Their TV has no recognizable channels.  And the guy who checked us in was friendly, but looks sloppy.  Try to look more professional! Such a bad impression!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review on TripAdvisor. I'm pleased to hear that you liked our spacious room and that staff were excellent, welcoming and friendly.  We have updated are tv's with 32in lcd  to most of our rooms also changed service provider. I do hope we will have the occasion to welcome you back again and to exceed your expectations on your next stay.

Summary: Chose this hotel for the location to Disneyland, rates and the free shuttle to the park.  Traveled 400 miles in the car and arrived to check in around 6pm. Was informed by the clerk that the boiler was not working so the hotel has no hot water and that the part needed "should" be available tomorrow. No hot water??  No shower?? And how does housekeeping clean sufficiently with no hot water? I asked that the clerk contact another Days Inn nearby and see if they could accommodate us. He did and informed us that the cost would be more, I asked if he could negotiate that given the no hot water situation and was told no, sorry. What in the world? Where is customer service? After much complaining on my part my bill was reduced by $25 dollars and the hot water was fixed by the next
Manager Response: Thank you  for your feedback and I am disappointed to note of the experiences that you had encountered and would like to sincerely apologize for all the inconvenience this has caused you and that we have failed to meet your expectations during your stay at Daysinn. in this case a boiler giving out is not an everyday thing the problem was resolved the next day and we issued discounted rates to all our guest who requested it .This is the first time it has occurred and the last we have made a few to avoid this problem again. I do hope we will have the occasion to welcome you back again and to exceed your expectations on your next stay

Summary: No HOT water the last 2days we stayed. The last day no manager was available and your hotel only gave me 50%off for the lasy day. Was not a good wau to do business. The day we were to see relatives, we could not take showers. My husband had to wash his hair in cold water and my grandson rinsed of in the pool! Bad deal. Not real happy. No manager! The front desk said he was on vacation.  (during holiday season! I think not) especially since your hotel is just a few blocks from disney land!
Manager Response: Thank you  for your feedback and I am disappointed to note of the experiences that you had encountered and would like to sincerely apologize for all the inconvenience this has caused you and that we have failed to meet your expectations during your stay at Daysinn. in this case a boiler giving out is not an everyday thing the problem was resolved the next day and we issued discounted rates to all our guest who requested it .This is the first time it has occurred and the last we have made a few to avoid this problem again. I do hope we will have the occasion to welcome you back again and to exceed your expectations on your next stay

Summary: Room had spider webs on the ceiling, paint peeling in the shower and the shower faucet was falling off.  Breakfast was just stale donuts, cereal and bread.  If your looking for a cheep room close to Disney, this is for you. Just don't expect too much.
Manager Response: I am very sorry to hear you did not leave Daysinn with a positive memory as my team and I strive to make sure everyone departs the Daysinn having had a great time and enjoyed their stay. Thank you again for your feedback and I am disappointed to note of the experiences that you had encountered and would like to sincerely apologize for all the inconvenience caused and that we have failed to meet your expectations during your stay at Daysinn.

Summary Heading: Worst Days Inn I ever visited
Summary: 1st room given smelled horrific. Staff let us choose from 4 other available rooms afterward. Chose the room with least stench. Room was dirty, a/c very noisy, sink drain slow/clogged, bedding very itchy, Internet unusable.
Manager Response: I have reviewed your comments and every possible measure will be taken to ensure that the issues will be investigated and resolved in the near future. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience you experienced. I do hope we will have the occasion to welcome you back again and to exceed your expectations on your next stay.

Summary Heading: I was there with y sister in law; she has stayed several...
Summary: I was there with y sister in law; she has stayed several times at your Inn; always to go to Disneyland for christmas; always clean; comfy; one complaint; the pillows were hard as rocks; will carry mine
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at Daysinn. We value all forms of guest feedback as an opportunity to continually improve our facilities and services for our guests. I do hope we will have the occasion to welcome you back again and to exceed your expectations again on your next stay.

Summary: the Days Inn was a good place to stay. We stayed here when we went to Disneyland with our 2 kids. The only thing I did not care for was the front office. It smelt really bad! Other then that had a nice time
Manager Response: It is always nice to hear that we were able to help make our guests vacation a happy one. We are always working on the property and changing things in small ways. We hope to see you soon so you can tell us what you think. I dont really know what to say about the smell at the front desk.

Summary: I was never informed of a deposit because i was paying cash, and needed an extra $100 i didnt have. Room key didnt work on three attempts to get it right. The shower was made for a peson no taller than 4 foot tall. Putting kids in the upstairs foom and hearing them run around all night. This was my birthday I was spending with my daughter. I am not sure if I will ever stay there again. We travel somewhere every month and use hotels every time.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review on Trip Advisor. I'm pleased to hear that you liked our spacious room and that staff were excellent, welcoming and friendly.  Unfortunately the experience you had at Daysinn haven't met your expectations and you left Daysinn with big disappointment. Please accept my apology for the issues you faced during your stay.

Summary: For 55.00 a nite I guess you can't expect much.  shower curtain was fallling apart, walls were dirty, corners on bathroom floor had a collection of something.  Lets just say i put lots of towels on the floor.  Left my cell charger.  Front desk could careless.  It was like I was talking to a robot. "I am sorry you are responsible for shipping"  ok i said, but can you at least put my cord in a envelope? "I am sorry you are responsible for shipping" he repeated.  I said I am in Oregon.  once again," I am sorry.....bla bla  bla....It wasn't worth the hassle.  I spent the 20.00 dollars to buy a new cord.  I guess joining the Advantage program will at least get me 40.00 dollars back on my reservation.  On another another note the beds were like rocks.  i might have sleep on the
Manager Response: I have reviewed your comments and every possible measure will be taken to ensure that the issues will be investigated and resolved in the near future. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience you experienced. I do hope we will have the occasion to welcome you back again and to exceed your expectations on your next stay.

Summary Heading: Ok for Low income people but has it's problems
Summary: This hotel is OK we went to this hotel for a trip to Disney Land the room we stayed in peeling paint, the bath room door didn't lock, the phones message light was blinking and Front desk could not turn it off so had to unplug phone to stop the blinking, not enough bath towels in room, WIFI was poor could not get internet in room not that much and to use the business centers computer in the front lobby you had to pay $4 an Hour which i was not going to do. The Pool was awsome and very warm but the Hot Tube had a little green color and after getting out of the Hot Tube we had a weird Smell so had to go shower it off..
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your comments, we are sorry to hear that you had a disappointed experience. Possible measure will be taken to ensure that the issues will be investigated and resolved in the near future.  Are team works hard to deliver a Safe, clean, warm hospitality to all are guests.

Summary: Upon arriving at our room at around 12am Thursday night we were happy to be off the road and ready to get some rest. I inspected the room which at 1st glance appeared ok. I went to the restroom and when I came out I noticed 2 big cockroaches on the wall ( I believe it was room 133) which I killed right away. After being sick to my stomach I inspected the room for more which I found somebody before had already smashed and killed on the refridgerator.There was a facilities guy on site which didn't seemed surprised of the cockroaches. I went to the front desk and demanded my money back,but the night time staff told me I had to wait until the following morning to talk with the manager. He gave us another room which seems like they don't rent out which is next door to front office.
Manager Response: I have reviewed your comments and every possible measure will be taken to ensure that the issues will be investigated and resolved in the near future. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience you experienced. Unfortunately the experience you had at Daysinn haven't met your expectations and you left Daysinn with big disappointment. Please accept my apology for the issues you faced I am very sorry to hear you did not leave Daysinn with a positive memory as my team and I strive to make sure everyone departs the Daysinn having had a great time and enjoyed their stay. Thank you again for your feedback and I am disappointed to note of the experiences that you had encountered and would like to sincerely apologize for all the inconvenience caused and that we have failed to meet your expectations during your stay at Daysinn.

Summary: The rooms were great for the price - we wouldn't want to pay more just to get more.  Would like to have tipped shuttle guys, but they provided no friendly service, just opened the door and drove - no conversation.  The van needed to be larger to accommodate families and strollers (we got left behind and they had to come back).  Very easy to walk in 15 minutes with our 8 and 9 year-olds.  No extra toiletries were available at front desk as sign in room stated (I was looking for Q-tips).  WiFi was extremely slow but never really worked the entire 5 days.  You have 4 new mail, click on one, and never see it.  That was it for WiFi and I spent over an hour trying each night!  Great view of LOUD fireworks from the pool/jacuzzi each night.  Took only 30 min. to get to Univ. Studios on
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at Daysinn. We value all forms of guest feedback as an opportunity to continually improve our facilities and services for our guests.We are also sorry to hear that your stay at Daysinn was not 100% and we have taken all of your feedback on board to help improve a few of the things and grow

Summary: How can you imagine that in a hotel close to Disney where a lot of families stay for fun and use the room to eat, sleep can have so much Cockroaches!!! and the answer for that was: do you need to kill them?
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to comment on TripAdvisor about your most recent unpleasant stay with us. I am so sorry we failed to meet your expectations. We genuinely appreciate your feedback and will do all we can to improve these areas. Thank you and we hope to gain your trust sometime in the near future.

Summary: What a great value.  Would recommend to anyone going to Disneyland.  It is close, has FREE shuttle that runs hourly and ON TIME !!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words. We do try to pay attention to detail in the rooms and so should every Choice hotel. I am happy to hear that you will continue to stay with the Choice brand in the future. Thank you again.

Summary: Looked nice on the outside but our rooms were not as clean as you would have expected them to be.  Found dog droppings by side of the refrigerator in one of our rooms.
Manager Response: 22.	I apologize for your feeling that the room was dirty. I will go through our housekeeping procedures and review our training for the staff immediately. We have a carpet cleaning schedule that we try to hold to, however this has been an extremely busy few months. I will make sure that we are more observant with scheduling extra cleaning. Thank you for bringing this situation to my attention, guest feedback is extremely important for this very reason. I hope you can come back soon and see the rooms freshly cleaned carpets!

Summary: Great location,quiet and restful, the rooms were the right size and the parking was good. Just down from disneyland too. the shuttle bus was very practical and runs and picks up ontime
Manager Response: I cannot thank you enough for your high praises. I am definitely sharing this review with all of our staff. There are not words to say how much fun you were to have stay with us. I can only hope that you will be returning to the area again soon.

Summary: Shuttle drivers were AWESOME, great tips and friendly! We hope they're being paid well. They were the most helpful staff we met there.  In our room the fan in the bathroom was loud and sounded broken. Internet service was TERRIBLE and frustrating. :( It was spotty and inconsistent, wifi kept shutting off. TV was old, scratchy and hard to watch and the power button was missing. Dresser pull was missing. Housekeeping staff did an amazing job (went above and beyond the call of duty).  Consider investing in a new washer and dryer, worked fine but very old.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on TripAdvisor following your recent stay with us at Daysinn. I understand that certain aspects of your stay were disappointing and would like to take this opportunity to apologize for any inconvenience caused. A courteous, friendly and caring attitude is what Daysinn staff usually gets praised and recognized for and it is disappointing that we have failed to provide these service levels on this occasion. I will use these comments for on-going staff training, Daysinn improvements and to better ourselves for all our future guests.

Summary: The location was great....within walking distance of D'land plus easy access to the major roads in and out of the park....really good shuttle service as well. Very much enjoyed the breakfast....hours were great plus we were even let in a little early on our checkout day before we left for the airport!!!  Staff was always pleasant and eager to help and you can't beat the price! We will definitely be using this hotel on our next visit :)
Manager Response: It is always nice to hear that we were able to help make our guests vacation a happy one. We are always working on the property and changing things in small ways. We hope to see you soon so you can tell us what you think.

Summary: there was mold all around the bathroom sink, the shower head was loose and barely came out of the nozle. The room is in serious need if renovations.
Manager Response: We appreciate you staying with us and sharing your comments. I am aware Unfortunately the experience you had at Daysinn haven't met your expectations and you left Daysinn with big disappointment. Please accept my apology for the issues you faced during your stay. I am sorry you did not leave Daysinn with a positive memory I have reviewed your comments and every possible measure will be taken to ensure that the issues will be investigated and resolved in the near future.

Summary: First off, the man at the front desk was not friendly and did not make us feel welcome. When we entered the room, we noticed a lot of things. The deadbolt on the door was broken, the microwave did not work at all, the sink was dripping all night and kept us up, the shower handle was falling off, and the smoke detector was detatched and hanging from the ceiling. The bed was very comfy though. But, the breakfast was horrible. All there was was orange slices, cereal and milk, and one piece of toast. Also, the tv had about 15 channels and they were all in spanish.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to share your comments regarding your stay at our hotel. It is through your comments and suggestions that we can know how well we are living up to our standards. We apologize that our staff was not urgent in responding to your requests. We have addressed your concerns to each corresponding department and corrective action has been taken; am sorry that interrupted you from having a pleasant stay. I hope you visit us again soon; we will be delighted to be your gracious hosts again on your next trip to Anaheim

Summary: overall the stay was overall ok. I wished the rooms would of been a little cleaner. Centrally located.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing you positive experience at Days Inn. Our hotel is always looking for ways to update all it's services and packages to ensure guest are satisfied with their stay. We look forward to having you, your family and friends stay with us on your next trip to Anaheim. Thanks again!

Summary Heading: PErfect for families trying to save!!!
Summary: Hotel has everything u need, the shuttle is A+ bkfst is just basics, but we don;t really eat in teh AM that much!!! overalll I liked it for all the money I saved.
Manager Response: I am so happy that you were able to save those extra dollars with us. We understand how expensive traveling can be. We may not be able to lower our rates due to the heavy competition in the area but we can cut out those extra charges. It is always nice to know that we helped out. Hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Our stay at the days in was bitter sweet.    Great service, great location, great accommodations.  However, around 1:30 AM, just outside my door there was a full on rocous of people having loud conversations, and loud crying children. A simple night guard or employee would have politely reminded everyone of quiet hours after 10 pm would have been sufficient.   Emphasis on this at check in would also help.
Manager Response: THANK YOU very much for sharing your visit to Days Inn on Tripadvisor. Your comments are appreciated very much. Our goal as a hotel is to have positve feedback from all guest. All staff including myself try very hard to welcome and take care of all guest to the best of our ability. We are very proud to work here at this hotel and your comments prove this. We look forward to your next visit. Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Ack!... I guess you get what you pay for...
Summary: I am not a picky person when it comes to hotels.  I don't need a luxurious place to sleep, just somewhere that is comfortable, safe, has friendly service, and clean.  None of this was the case.  When we arrived there was no guest service agent to be found.  I waited approximately 10 minutes before someone would come and assist me.  She wouldn't even look at me direclty or say hello for that matter.  I knew we were early for check in, but I just wanted to inquire about the readiness of our room.  I was promptly and rudely told, "I have no rooms available."  My family and I left for awhile, came back and shocklingly our room was ready 30 minutes early.  During the whole check in process the agent was short, would not look at me directly and hurried me through the process.  I did
Manager Response: I have reviewed your comments and every possible measure will be taken to ensure that the issues will be investigated and resolved in the near future. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience you experienced. I do hope we will have the occasion to welcome you back again and to exceed your expectations on your next stay.

Summary: great location.  hotel is nice.  maid service was poor as they they forgot to clean one of our rooms twice and we were not there from 7am to 5pm each day.  our other room - they forget to leave clean towels after taking away dirtcy towels.  upon check out we asked if we could have our airline tickets printed out and they said no.
Manager Response: THANK YOU very much for sharing your visit to Days Inn on Tripadvisor. Your comments are appreciated very much. Our goal as a hotel is to have positive feedback from all guest. All staff including myself try very hard to welcome and take care of all guest to the best of our ability. We are very proud to work here at this hotel and your comments prove this. We look forward to your next visit. Thanks again!

Summary: Here are the chief complaints. When I arrived around 8pm to check in there was nobody in the lobby to greet me. The guy showed up about 7 minutes later with his dress shirt untucked with a tie. We went to the room and the first noticable thing was that the carpet was filthy. The carpet was dark brown and you could still see the heavy traffic marks. The tub leaked for both the nights we stayed and I informed them at check out. I didn't complain because that is not something I like to do, but since you sent the survey i thought why not.
Manager Response: Thank you  for your feedback and I am disappointed to note of the experiences that you had encountered and would like to sincerely apologize for all the inconvenience this has caused you and that we have failed to meet your expectations during your stay at Daysinn, are Team makes every effort to deliver upon the high standards we have set ourselves. To ensure our guests a high level of value and a warmly memorable experience.

Summary Heading: One night I wont forget... for all of the wrong reasons
Summary: I arrived at the hotel at around 2:30-3:00 AM and was able to check in without any problem. The clerk was very helpful and we even got an upgrade to a king sized room. That's where the good ends.... When my girlfriend and I went to our rooms we discovered that the T.V. did not work. We also found out that the microwave didn't work. The bathroom looked like people were still doing construction and grouting and tiling the floor and walls. We fell asleep in beds that felt like I was sleeping on a cardboard box and sheets that were as rough as sandpaper.  At 6 or 7 AM (3 hours of solid sleep), my girlfriend and I were woken up by several kids and adults being very loud on both levels of the hotel. I understand that most guests are there to visit Disneyland and that the kids are
Manager Response: I have reviewed your comments and every possible measure will be taken to ensure that the issues will be investigated and resolved in the near future. It is truly unfortunate that we failed due the floorboards and the quality of your sleep and I truly apologize for that. It was our pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope you can give us a chance to gain you back as a customer in the near future.

Summary Heading: not as bad as people say it is...
Summary: Seriously, I don't know what people expect for $50 a night. If you want a nicer hotel, pay more money. If you're traveling with kids, I can see not wanting to stay here, but if you're going with friends or adult family members (I was traveling with my sister) and just need a place to sleep, it's fine.  The room was clean (and had an almost overwhelming smell of air-freshener, but I prefer that to an overwhelming smell of filth) and the beds were comfortable enough. I had to fiddle with the AC plug to get it to work, but that's a minor complaint. The WiFi is pretty useless - I was able to connect to the network without a problem, but loading a page (other than the default Days Inn page) was frustrating and near impossible. Again, it's not like I came here expecting the Ritz like
Manager Response: I have reviewed your comments and every possible measure will be taken to ensure that the issues will be investigated and resolved in the near future. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience you experienced. I do hope we will have the occasion to welcome you back again and to exceed your expectations on your next stay.

Summary: ADDITIONAL INFORMATION: Out of curiosity I looked up other Days Inns in the area.  There is this one, at 1111 South Harbour Blvd, and another one at 1042 Ball Dr..  They are very close.  It appears that they use the same description of what's available for this one and combine it withe the other one.  Hence the confusion of shuttle availability.  This one HAS a shuttle; the one on Ball Dr. does not.  I would not attempt to walk to Disney Land from this location.  Also, I know that they use the SAME reviews for both locations.  Explanation - I saw the same reviews on both hotels.  So, there is a problem of knowing which hotel they are reviewing.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing you positive experience at Days Inn. Our hotel is always looking for ways to update all it's services and packages to ensure guest are satisfied with their stay. We look forward to having you, your family and friends stay with us on your next trip to Anaheim. Thanks again!

Summary: I booked this days inn thinking it was a different hotel. I was surprised to find this hotel better than the other. I will be staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for writing such wonderful comments and feedback about Daysinn on TripAdvisor. I'm so happy that we were not just your last minute accommodation, but also that Daysinn was a fantastic place to stay. I am delighted to hear that you were happily satisfied with your stay. I appreciate you taking the time to compliment us on our hospitality, cleanness and service. We strive to provide our guests with clean, comfortable accommodations and great customer service

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for.......
Summary: Perfect spot with great employees....not the cleanest, but worth the money spent.  Pool was gross....ended up being a staging area to sleep and quickly shower....then head to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know of your recent experience at our hotel. I am sorry we failed to meet your expectations. We have discussed this situation with our maintenance department and corrective action has been taken. We hope you give us another opportunity to serve you sometime in the near future. Thanks again for sharing!

Summary: Good hotel for price and walking distance to Disneyland. But I wont stay here again. Old, smelly, dirty floors, no early check in.. Made us wait 3 hrs for our room and we had 2 toddlers w us. Breakfast was good though and the free shuttle to and from Disneyland was worth it,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at Daysinn. We value all forms of guest feedback as an opportunity to continually improve our facilities and services for our guests. Our team at Daysinn makes every effort to deliver upon the high standards we have set ourselves. We strive to ensure our guests recognize the facilities and services we provide as offering a high level of value and a warmly memorable experience. Thank you for your generous compliments about the staff and for taking the time to share your comments with us.

Summary: I was very disappointed in my stay at this Wyndham property.  My rooms carpet was filthy and stained and terribly worn.  The bathroom shower ran constantly.  The bathroom fan would come on with the light and was extremely noisy.  There was a crack in the bathtub which leaked.  I was quite surprised that this was a Wyndham property.  Not sure if I will stay in another property of yours.  Also it took well over an hour to get back from the park beacuse the shuttle only held 10.  To say the least I felt embarrased in front of my family when we stepped into the room.  We had two rooms.  The carpet in my daugheters room was better but the A/C unit started smoking when they were still sleeping on Friday the 19th morning.  The repairman never showed and they were forced to change
Manager Response: Thank you  for your feedback and I am disappointed to note of the experiences that you had encountered and would like to sincerely apologize for all the inconvenience this has caused you and that we have failed to meet your expectations during your stay at Daysinn, are Team makes every effort to deliver upon the high standards we have set ourselves. To ensure our guests a high level of value and a warmly memorable experience.

Summary: Our family stayed at Days Inn for two nights while visiting California Adventure. One of our two rooms had hair on the pillows and the other room had a broken lock on the door. We couldn't even enter that room. It took two visits from the manager and a visit from maintenance to try and get the door lock repaired. We were finally let into the room but could not lock the door. The second day, we were finally given a new room. One of the rooms a TV that did not work. The breakfast was extremely weak. Our kids were hungry right away. The shuttle to the Disneyland Parks did not even have working seat belts. We will never stay at Days Inn again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review on Trip Advisor. I'm pleased to hear that you liked our spacious room and that staff were excellent, welcoming and friendly.  Unfortunately the experience you had at Daysinn haven't met your expectations and you left Daysinn with big disappointment. Please accept my apology for the issues you faced during your stay.

Summary: We've stayed here before and it was great, but our last stay we had an ants problem and the shuttle is to small for amount of people staying, had to wait for second or third round
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on TripAdvisor following your recent stay with us at Daysinn. I understand that certain aspects of your stay were disappointing and would like to take this opportunity to apologize for any inconvenience caused. Every possible measure will be taken to ensure that the issues will be investigated and resolved in the near future. It is truly unfortunate that we failed due the floorboards and the quality of your sleep and I truly apologize for that. It was our pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope you can give us a chance to gain you back as a customer in the near future.

Summary: great room and hotel for price would definitely stay again. Choose this hotel just for the shuttle, was very convenient, wished it ran a little more often.
Manager Response: THANK YOU very much for sharing your visit to Days Inn on Tripadvisor. Your comments are appreciated very much. Our goal as a hotel is to have positve feedback from all guest. All staff including myself try very hard to welcome and take care of all guest to the best of our ability. We are very proud to work here at this hotel and your comments prove this. We look forward to your next visit. Thanks again

Summary: rates were reasonable, but wifi was really slow and most of the time, we're not able to connect...twice, we had to sit inside the reception area where signal is better than in the room...Baki was really helpful when my family booked a tour to downtown LA.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments on Tripadvisor. Unfortunately we were having issues with our free WIFI. Our system was purchased in January so being new you would think there should be no issues myself and my staff are not computer technicians we do out best and call the IT department for help. We sit patiently for help and give honest answers to what we know. At anytime if we were to be asked we would accommodate guest by using our back computer we never have a problem with this or printing boarding passes, forgotten vouchers, directions etc

Summary: $12.00 for tax per night was a bit pricey! It really wasn't walking distance from Disneyland like they said when I booked the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your concerns with the hotel on Tripadvisor. All comments good or bad are taken very serious in order to help us to give the best service we can provide. Are hotel is about a half  a mile from Disneyland thats about a 10 min walk or so. you can Google it yourself if you like but we also offer our shuttles for free to Disneyland that runs every hour.

Summary: When I first read all of the bad reviews about this hotel, I figured that people were exaggerating...I mean, how bad could it actually be?    Well, this hotel is the worst hotel I have ever stayed in!  I realized that it wasn't going to be a four star hotel, but I at least expected it to be clean!  When we first walked in, I noticed that the deadbolt chain was broken.  The ceiling had cracks in it that had been painted over, and looked like it was going to cave in due to water damage.  The carpet was stained and dirty, and the walls were also dirty.  The tv remote was broken, and when we got a replacement, we discovered that the hotel didn't even have cable (not too big of a deal, since we were going to Disneyland, but still).  The bathroom was dirty, and there were ants in the
Manager Response: I am very sorry to hear you did not leave Daysinn with a positive memory as my team and I strive to make sure everyone departs the Daysinn having had a great time and enjoyed their stay. Thank you again for your feedback and I am disappointed to note of the experiences that you had encountered and would like to sincerely apologize for all the inconvenience caused and that we have failed to meet your expectations during your stay at Daysinn.

Summary: The price was reasonable but the room and property were very outdated.  Old beds, furnishings, and linens.  The shower was cold to just warm.  No hot water at all.  Bathroom towels were very old, rough, and thin.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your comments, we are sorry to hear that you had a disappointed experience. Possible measure will be taken to ensure that the issues will be investigated and resolved in the near future.  Are team works hard to deliver a Safe, clean, warm hospitality to all are guests.

Summary: This is the second year we have stayed here and have had no major issues. They offer a van shuttle service free of charge to Disneyland. If you don't mind walking it is only a 5-10 minute walk to the park with a Starbucks on the way which was convenient. It is a great location, there is a shakey pizza next door  and a gas station on the other side for any little snacks or drinks you may need. For us the biggest selling point is price and location. Facility is a lil run down. Pool area is kind of small,has a small hot tub but the pool was perfect temputure. Biggest complaint for me this trip was the bathrooms. Summary: Got a great price for one night but we won't be coming back. Very run down, carpets didn't look clean, coffee maker wasn't clean. Summary: I was quite pleased with my stay at this Days Inn.  The room was spacious and value was good.  Granted it is not a 5 star hotel, but the cost is not 5 star so can't be expected.  There were a few days when breakfast items ran very low; in fact, many of the things they didn't have, but overall everything was good.  Bathroom walls do need painting.
Manager Response: !!! Thank you so much for taking time to post your excellent feedback about Daysinn here on Trip Advisor. We take great pride in the service that we provide and work diligently to ensure that each and every person that stays at Daysinn has a great time.

Summary: The hotel was a good location to Disneyland! The hotel was ok, we had a few issues. Our room was not ready then the key didn't work when we came back so they moved us to another room. The breakfast was ok, pastry, cereal and bagels. It was good. The room was dated but clean for the most part. The showerhead though was the best out of any Disneyland hotel I have stayed at! The presure was great and able to rinse off very easy! That was a nice surprise! However the towels and bed were hard, the pillows may as well have  been rocks, because they were so uncomfortable! The staff wasn't very friendly and didn't seem to care much. The shuttle wasn't running enough and we only used it once because of it. Summary: We have stayed in many hotels in the Disney area and I would NEVER stay at this hotel again. The airconditioning unit was awful, it was so humid in our room that the clothes we had on that got wet from rides never dried. The air was so thick and gross it was awful to be in the room. Summary Heading: Basic hotel, you get what you pay for!
Summary: This hotel was perfect for me and my solo trip, a great price from priceline, (under $50 a night) a basic simple breakfast in the morning coffee was the most important to me.   And a decent room its a two star hotel, I had no issues, this was perfect to visit Disneyland they do have a free shuttle and you get the schedule when you check in.  If you didnt know how close to Disneyland you are the 9:30 fireworks will let you know, its like king-kong knocking on your door.      If you dont want to wait on the shuttle the ART stop is at the end of the driveway you can pre-purchase a ticket on line.  The ART has several routes you can take to go to most attractions. Summary Heading: Just enough plusses to make this basic, no-frills place worth it.
Summary: We've stayed here several times so we know what to expect. Older rooms in need of a face lift. Some peeling paint & rushed caulk-jobs in the bathroom, older furniture & appliances in rooms etc. Everything was clean though (but the carpet felt a little weird to bare feet so I wore my shoes). Service was courteous & prompt. Free (slow) wifi. Free parking. Free (simple) breakfast. Free (+ tip) shuttle to Disneyland. Decent pool & spa. Comfy bed. One mile to DLR ticket booth - walking distance for us, maybe not for you. Cheapest close place we've found.

Summary: We asked about Disney tickets, they didn't have any 1 day passes. Even though it's advertise in their rooms they sell them there. Once in room- SMELLED HORRIBLE. The shower was falling apart carpets looked like they were never washed. We were next to a house keeping room- no window looked trashed. Breakfast was terrible milk was warm. The breakfast room smelled like a combo of puke and sour milk. Extremely dirty hotel. You can get way better deals closer to the park and the rooms are way nicer. Don't waste your money here!!!!

Summary: you are looking for a cheap hotel - not the Ritz Carlton. if you want to save every penny,  this is the place! lowest priced room in the area + free shuttle + free breakfast + very close to the park.  really only a 10 mins. walk from the entrance - i missed the shuttle once and didn't want to wait the full hour so i took the walk by myself and picked up the family on my own.  the rooms are not luxurious but had a mini fridge to freeze 3 water bottles as well as a microwave to heat up dinners.  the sheets and towels were clean and the pillow case was clean as well.  there are lots of plants in the property so this may attract some insects but none were in the 2nd flr room i was at.  some upgraded cabinets, counter tops, TV, and carpet would be nice but its not my home and if it

Summary Heading: Good Price, Rest is just "so so"
Summary: The positives:    Price, in room fridge, nice staff for the most part. The negatives:   Only have an hourly shuttle to Disneyland and first one isn't until 7:40 am so if you want to get to the park early to get in line or have an early entry day you must walk or take bus.    They also don't have a shuttle run in the 2 pm hour so if youwant a break you must walk back. Pool isn't as nice as it looks in picture, ran out of pool towels and asked for more and after 2 hours still no clean towels. Internet is very very slow.      Continental breakfast is not very appealing, dry, almost stale donuts, a couple of cereal choices and coffee and o.j. Very short shower heads as well, I don't get why so many hotels think their guests are under 5'-2"

Summary: Morning staff was not very helpful, but rooms were good for the price. Breakfast was basic, but clean and well stocked. But it should NOT be served in an upstairs location with no elevator, as it may be inaccessible to some guests.

The staff was friendly and accommodating and were happy to help us when needed. There is a major shortage of parking at night, especially when Disneyland closes. This is because there are two double yellow lines which driving laws do not allow you to cross or turn.   The hotel is not new but doesn't look old and wore down. It is well maintained. Summary: The hotel was an easy walk, even for my 6 yr old. Good complimentary breakfast.  Shakey's Pizza next door for decent food without paying the ridiculous Disneyland prices. The breakfast was pitiful- we gave up after the second morning since the “Continental Breakfast”. It was stale and unappetizing.  We were excited about the in-room
